description: The Corus Radio Android app lets you listen to the complete roster of Corus radio stations from across Canada. The Corus Radio cities include: Vancouver, Calgary, Edmonton, Winnipeg, London, Kitchener, Guelph, Hamilton, Toronto, Barrie, Peterborough, Kingston and Cornwall. Modern Rock, Classic Rock, News/Talk, FreshFM and Hit Music radio are some of the radio formats you’ll find within the Corus Radio family. Some of the stations include: CFOX, Rock 101, CKNW, Country 105, 630 CHED, CISN, Fresh FM, Power 97, CJOB, FM 96, The Beat, 900 CHML, the edge, Q107, and the Wolf. This radio app for Android allows you to browse for the radio station you want to listen to by location or format. The app also allows you to bookmark your favorite Corus Radio station. There is a sleep timer included as part of this app, as well as the option to play the app through your WiFi connection only (if you wish).

description: This is the lite and free version of the app. Limitations are described at the end (see below). Household Budget - is a powerfull and user-friendly application for home bookkeeping that takes care about your family budget. You can also build different charts for any period. Charts can be linear or circle. Supports currencies, accounts, categories and subcategories. Usefull calendar on the main screen. description: Create professional invoices right from your device. Add your client information, a list of invoice items, and Invoice Maker Pro creates a PDF that you can send directly from your device. - Preview invoices directly on your device - E-mail invoices to clients as an attachment - Add and automatically calculate sales tax, or disable it - Track partial invoice payments and view a client's unpaid balance / invoice list - Customize the PDF with your company's logo and other display options - Use any language in the PDF by defining all the words that describe an invoice - Collect your client's signature and show it on the output invoice - Assign unique codes to each client and manually set your own invoice ID - Backup your invoices and clients to the cloud for free - Export your data to CSV for importing into programs like QuickBooks - Generate invoices as estimates to present a proposal to your client - Support for over 100 different currencies - Print your invoice using Google Cloud Print After downloading Invoice Maker Pro, you should enter your company information on the settings screen. You can configure your tax rate, the currency to use, the invoice language, your company logo and language, and more.

Did you know that your mobile can speak Russian? Have Yuri read aloud texts from your e-book, navigation, translation and other apps in a Russian male, high quality and natural-sounding voice powered by SVOX. When combined with TTS-enabled apps, Yuri can: - give directions, allowing you to keep your eyes on the road while you're driving - read a notification containing the caller / sender's name, and read the content of an incoming call / sms / mms / email - read aloud your favorite e-books or pdf documents - help you learn Russian by reading aloud the correct pronunciation and much more… the possibilities are limitless! Browse http://svoxmobilevoices.wordpress.com for a list of compatible apps and voice demos. NEW! Pronunciation correction feature: correct the default output according to your preferences! == INSTRUCTIONS == 1. Install and run the voice app once 2. Install free SVOX Classic Text-to-Speech Engine 3. Go to Android Settings -> Voice Input & Output -> Text-to-Speech settings. Activate SvoxClassic at the bottom of the screen. Select SvoxClassic as the Default Engine. 4. Run the voice app, click “Continue”, then follow the instructions. 5. Your SVOX Voice main screen will be now visible. Don’t forget to try the new pronunciations correction feature (‘pencil’ icon)! 6. Download other free / paid apps to combine our voice with. For example, you could try: Google Navigation (on Android 2.2 and later, only with Navigation < 5.9), Moon+ Reader PRO, Voice Actions Plus, TalkToMe Classic, Book Speech Audio Books, Transzilla, Good Morning, WakeVoice... Browse http://svoxmobilevoices.wordpress.com/faq/ for a list of frequently asked questions. And now … enjoy your new SVOX voice! == PRONUNCIATION CORRECTION FEATURE - HOW TO == 1. Run the voice app 2. Click on the ‘pencil’ icon. The pronunciation correction screen will now be shown. 3. Tap on the Android menu key and select ‘Help’ == NOTES == 1. Google Navigation requires that the Text-to-Speech voice matches the phone language. You can change the phone language in Android Settings -> Language & keyboard -> Select language Compatible with Google Navigation version < 5.9 2. On Android 2.1 and earlier, only some apps, like Google Translation, support changing voices.

Background defocus - take photos in a professional style Let the object in focus stand out. The Background defocus app simulates a shallow depth of field by creating a blurred out background. It captures two photos with different focus settings, which you can bring together to create a photo with one object in sharp focus, against a beautifully blurred background. How to use Background defocus: 1. Start the Camera and select Background defocus as camera mode 2. Tap the object you want to focus on in the viewfinder 3. Tap the camera key to take a photo 4. Change the blur level and blur effect with the controls on the screen 5. Tap the save button Tips for best photos: To get the best results, please focus on an object 15-45cm (0.5-1.5 feet) away and make sure the background object is 5 meter away from focus target and hold camera steady. Results are dependent on device and camera specification.

**Updated for 2015-16 tax year from today's budget** **Now the free version allows you to use previous and future tax years and reverse calculating!** In addition to being a highly accurate UK PAYE tax calculator, this is the only app on the market that lets you work backwards from any figure (tax/ni/student loan etc) to find the gross and give a complete breakdown. Features: * Tax Breakdown * NI Breakdown (time limited) * Pension Breakdown * Tax years supported * 2015/16 * 2014/15 * 2013/14 * 2012/13 * 2011/12 * 2010/11 * 2009/10 * 2008/09 * Student Loan repayments * Pension contributions * Age related benefits * Tax codes (ending in L,P,Y,T or K) * Blind Persons Allowance * Enter figures in Year/Month/Week * View results in Year/Month/Week * Reverse calculate from a net figure * Compare any two sets of figures easily by seeing the differences in the same style breakdown screen * Updates figures live as you type * Save preferences
release_text: 2015.2 - Tax year 2015/16 updated personal allowance from £10,500 to £10,600, and 205 tax band from £32,285 to £31,785 2015.1 - Tax year 2015/16 added from today's budget (March 2014 budget). NI for 2014/15 updated. Student loan repayment threshold correction. Age related allowance correction. 2014.2 - Uses action bar on Android 4 devices Now free version allows you to use previous and future tax years and reverse calculating!

You are the first, last and the only line of defense. Air Strike Classic is an addictive arcade style shooting game with a warfare mission to control the army base, destroy the enemy helicopters & paratroopers, win the battle and get honored. Get set for fast paced action as enemy paratroopers aim to blow up your base. Take control of your gun and rain fire into the skies before it's too late. Make no mistake; you can change the course of history. FEATURES: - Simple and addictive gameplay - Arcade Style - Shooting Game - More than 10 major planned updates - Immersive sound effects and smooth game controls - Campaign mode coming soon - Warfare mood and Patriotic setup - Rival scout as in Paratrooper More: Be a loyal cadet by destroying the rival’s chopper and infantry and saving your basecamp from being bombarded. Air strike Classic, an addictive arcade style shooting game, brings back the patriotic zeal of a loyal scout with a warfare mission.The warfare mission is to control the army basecamp, destroy the enemy helicopters, without letting them discharge any of their jets & paratroopers, win the battle and get honored. Welcome to this fierce battlefield of rival paratrooper scouts and a loyal cadet. In this battlefield, you are a ‘One man Army’ fighting against rival scouts and copters that discharge commandos and for the purpose of protecting your basecamp from being bombard. Get ready for fast paced action as your enemy paratroopers aims to blow your army basecamp. Witness their progression as they get discharge from the fighter choppers and travel in order to bombard the gunner commandos at your basecamp. The mission is simple: either to enhance your patriotic fervor and slam the fighter copter or to die as a loyal cadet. The rival scouts ‘The paratroopers’ that pile up with a mission to blow your base camp forms a team of five to attack the gunner cadet in the basecamp. Play a dutiful soldier and save your basecamp by firing up the skies every second, because the enemy troopers are coming faster than ever! Air Strike Classic offers an awesome gameplay in which you’re constantly involved in the warfare action as the pace of the game gets faster and more exciting every second. Tags: Airstrike, Paratrooper, Battlefield, Scout, Trooper, Strike, Target, Base, Rival, Bombard, Copter

MyTrails Contacts is a companion to the main MyTrails application, which allows MyTrails to offer the ability to look up contacts without relying on the READ_CONTACTS permission, which is widely regarded as a dangerous permission (it would allow a malicious application to harvest all the user's contacts information). This way, users who trust MyTrails can have the full functionality, and others need not worry about the integrity of their contacts.

description: This is an ad free version of the ABG Interpreter available on the market place. This is an arterial blood gas interpreter for use by internal medicine, renal, pulmonary and critical care students, residents, fellows, nurses and therapists. It is a learning tool that can be used to better understand the meaning of a blood gas sample. This software is not clinically validated and is not approved as a tool by any governing body. Clinical interpretation of a blood gas should be done by a qualified physician or equivalent entity. It calculates Aa-gradients and PO2/FiO2 ratios as well as doing acid base interprretation. This application as a learning tool is always open for improvement. Any suggestions are appreciated.
release_text: Now uses atmospheric pressure for Aa-gradient calculations and saves the pressure across sessions once it is used in one calculation. Respiratory compensation for metabolic acidosis and alkalosis is now calculated.

At Sprint we know connecting to the people and things you care about is important to you. That’s why FamilyWall for Sprint was created. FamilyWall for Sprint is a private space where you can communicate, organize, share and even locate…those that matter most. All the benefits of social sharing in a private space. FEATURES ----------------- Activity Wall With FamilyWall for Sprint, you can browse the activity of those on your Wall. Members can post, comment, and like photos, videos, events, notes, tasks and lists. Communicate Send messages, pictures, video & audio, privately to one or several members of your Wall. Organize Organize your family life with a shared calendar, lists, contacts…with an easy daily and weekly planning tracker. Add an appointment to the calendar, and every member of your Wall will be able to see it and keep up with the schedule. You can also share lists and tasks, so that those on your Wall can coordinate and work together efficiently. Remember Keep your best memories in an album that you can easily share with relatives and friends. Browse photos in your Gallery or see new photos posted by other members of your Wall. Locate Members can share their location and view where others have checked in. From Sprint NOTE: If you experience any problems with your Familywall for Sprint app, please don't hesitate to CONTACT US directly at support@familyandco.com .

Won the best award in 2012 Smart App award!! ♥Keep your child’s teeth healthy!♥ It’s important for children to take care of their teeth from a very young age. However, it’s not easy for children to keep their teeth clean. They run away, cry, get grumpy, and sometimes they only chew on the toothbrush. ◈Brush Brush Cocomong not only helps children to brush their teeth, but also helps them to learn various tooth care-related vocabulary◈ 《Key Function》 1. Brush Brush ▶Brush Brush Cocomong in stages. Cocomong teaches the proper way of brushing teeth with a friendly voice. ▶The 3D characters’ lively and detailed actions facilitate concentration. Through three stages of dynamic screen layouts, the child can focus on the app. 2. Brushing Game ▶After eating a meal, children can have a firsthand experience of the process of brushing their teeth by playing an interactive sticker game. ▶While feeding Cocomong, the child will learn what foods are good and what foods are bad for teeth. Brushing Cocomong’s teeth and having fun while doing so will change their attitude about brushing their own teeth. ▶The app allows you to take a photo of your child and make it interactive. This personalizes the learning, making for a deeper learning effect. 3. Story Book ▶The story book contains many enjoyable, picture-based stories. ▶What will happen to Cocomong after eating lots of teeth-unfriendly foods? 4. Flash cards ▶There are 25 tooth care-related vocabulary flash cards. ▶If you touch the screen, Cocomong will read the word. The flashcards contain real pictures which are effective for learning vocabulary. 5. Video ▶You can also watch the “Brush, Brush, Brush your teeth” video. ▶Brush Brush Cocomong helps kids to learn proper tooth brushing technique and to develop a good habit. We here at duducs are doing our best to develop apps that teach children to have good everyday habits. We will continue to develop new applications in the future, so please stay tuned!

Ściągnij aplikację "Kawały i dowcipy o Jasiu", w której znajdziesz najlepsze i unikalne kawały o Jasiu. Wszystkie dowcipy są wbudowane w aplikację, więc do ich przeczytania nie potrzebujesz dostępu do Internetu. Nowe kawały oraz aktualizacja rankingu następuje raz w tygodniu. !! UWAGA !! - Aplikacja NIE wyświetla reklam w powiadomieniach!! Kawały o Jasiu możesz przeglądać na kilka różnych sposobów: nowe, najlepsze, losowe, ulubione. W kategorii najlepsze, kawały są posortowane względem oceny wystawionej przez użytkowników. Sam również możesz wpływać na pozycję kawału w rankingu oceniając dowcip "na plus" bądź "na minus". Oceny aktualizowane są raz w tygodniu podczas aktualizacji aplikacji. Możesz również stworzyć własną listę ulubionych kawałów o Jasiu, wystarczy że klikniesz ikonę "serca z plusem" aby dodać kawał lub "serca z minusem" aby usunąć kawał z ulubionych. Instrukcja obsługi: -------------------------------- - dowcipy o Jasiu możesz ustawiać w określonej kolejności, klikając na: nowe, najlepsze, losowe lub ulubione; - wybierając: wszystkie, nieprzeczytane lub przeczytane określasz jakie kawały chcesz przeglądać; - aby przejść do następnego/poprzedniego kawału kliknij odpowiednią ikonę u dołu ekranu lub przeciągnij palcem po ekranie w lewo (następny) lub w prawo (poprzedni); - aby dodać kawał do ulubionych należy kliknąć ikonę "serce z plusem" aby usunąć kawał z ulubionych należy kliknąć ikonę "serce z minusem" (prawy górny róg ekranu); - aby oddać głos na kawał musisz kliknąć na ikonę kciuka "w górę" - głosowanie na plus lub kciuka "w dół" - głosowanie na minus. Kawały o Jasiu na Facebooku: http://www.facebook.com/KawalDnia Download the app "Jokes and jokes about Johnny," in which you will find the best and unique jokes about Johnny. All the jokes are built into the app, so to read them you do not need access to the Internet. New pieces and ranking update takes place once a week. ! CAUTION! - The application does not display ads in notifications! Jokes about Johnny can view several different ways: a new, best, random, favorite. In the category of the best jokes are sorted with respect to assessment by the users. He also can affect the position of the pieces in the ranking of assessing joke "a plus" or "minus the". Ratings are updated once a week during the update application. You can also create your own list of favorite jokes about Johnny, you just have to click the "heart plus" to add a joke or a "heart-minus" to remove a piece of your favorites. Manual: -------------------------------- - Jokes about Johnny can be set in a specific order, click on: new, best, incidental or favorite; - Select: all, unread or read specify which pieces you want to view; - To go to the next / previous piece, click the icon at the bottom of the screen or drag your finger across the screen to the left (next) or right (previous); - To add a piece to your favorites click the "heart of advantage" to remove a piece of your favorite click the "heart of the downside" (upper right corner); - To vote for the piece you need to click on the icon thumb "up" - vote on the plus or thumb "down" - vote on the downside. Jokes about Johnny on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/KawalDnia

Welcome to Shopping Zen ------------------------- Shoppa is pure online shopping at it's best. Featuring a stylishly-pleasant interface for the best shopping experience with the essential tools you need to shop happily :) After trying Shoppa, you can't shop without it! Shoppa is an ad free, no nonsense shopping app that removes all the noise around online shopping. Shoppa removes all the distractions like barcode scanners, annoyingly spammy product reviews, and biased opinions. After all, don't you want to shop in peace, make your own decisions and discover great products!? Major Retailers, Boutiques, & Mom n' Pops! -------------------------------------------- You get to browse and purchase products from your favorite boutiques and specialty shops, to mega online retailers like Nordstrom, Macy's, Bloomingdale's, Target, and Walmart to name a few. All in one app! The Features: ---------------------- Super easy to use! Browse our "Always Fresh" featured categories, Or simply search for a product to buy it, favorite it, or share it with your friends on Facebook! Quickly compare products to get the best deal! Browse hundreds of products in seconds while adding popular to rare items instantly to your favorites list! Shoppa offers the best in online product discovery while granting shoppers access to millions of unique products from popular and trusted shops online. Products you'll find with Shoppa ---------------------------------- Find your favorite electronics like tablets, computers phones & cameras, to clothing and apparel, home and garden supplies, furniture, toys for kids and adults ;), games, healthy living and grocery items, sports equipment and fitness products, books, comics, magazines, bluray & dvd movies, collectibles, one of a kind gifts, diy kits, etsy products and more! Types of stores featured in Shoppa ----------------------------------- Products from thousands of stores inside like: Old Navy, Nordstrom, Target, Sears, Overstock.com, Etsy, Dillards, Kmart, Walmart, Neiman Marcus, Bloomingdales, Saks, Topshop, Spencers, Wet Seal, Asos, 6pm, Gamestop, Best Buy, Sony, Toys R Us, Office Depot, Staples, Sam's Club, Meyers, Tiger Direct, Newegg, Frys, Geeks, Puma, Aldo, FinishLine, Sneakerhead, Nike Store, J. Crew, Macys, Zappos, Payless, DSW, Footlocker, Shiekh, Modern Design Furniture, West Elm, CB2, Urban Outfitters, Pottery Barn, just to name a few! Some Highlights ----------------- • The only shopping app that was featured at Google I/O 2012! https://developers.google.com/events/io/sandbox (under Mobtapp) • Featured in Motorola's 2012 Motopack • A typical review: "Though I have amazon prime subscription, I have noticed that amazon does not always have the best prices. Thats why I purchased your app so I could in one glance get a feel of what the pricing is across retailers and if I can get a better deal elsewhere. It helps that I can make the purchase from within your app." - by Sudin

description: ** Lots of Street Basketball Big Win Shoot Fun!** *Cool sims basketball, paper trash can shooting skills* Here's a sims basketball shooting game with a difference. How are you shooting skills? This is NOT a best real basketball game by the way. Instead we have worked to create a fun filled street basketball paper trash can game for hours of fun-filled enjoyment.Big Win Trash Basketball Shoot has simple yet addicitve game play. So let's look at the game play and see how it is played. First the paper trash ball drops from the shute on the right of your screen in this sims basketball game. Your task is then to carefully bounce the ball across the junk yard to the paper trash can without it touching the ground. To do this you have to draw rubber bands with your finger for the paper trash ball to bounce off. You need to be quick or the ball will touch the ground and you will lose. Next you have to master the height of each bounce so you can navigate the junk yard obstacles on your way to the paper trash can. Here is where you hone your shooting skills. You get the paper trash ball to bounce higher by allowing it to drop further first. Small drops in height equal small bounces. Large drops equal higher bounces. You also have to create angles when you draw your rubber bands to have the sims basketball go to the left or the right in this street basketball hoopz game. This is vital to lean for your shooting skills. There are many levels and each one has more and more difficulty built in... yes they do get harder and harder. The obstacles you have to overcome get larger and more complex and the navigation difficulty rises. You will be well and truly tested in this sims basketball app before you achieve all levels in this awesome street basketball hoopz game. This is street basketball hoopz at it's funniest. Laugh along as you dodge car tyres, car bodies, piles of trash and more and maneuver your paper trash ball ever closer to the hoop. Bounce your paper trash ball all the way over to the basket and drop it in for a paper trash can big win. This an addictive street basketball hoopz shoot game play and fun for all ages. Nice graphics and game style.

- 2012 5 stars Reviewers' Choice Award Winner - 2013, 2014 AT&T Certified Solution Package Tracker Pro, the best selling package tracking application, is a solid, stable and handy business tool to help users to track over various shipping carriers’ packages (parcels), and provides All-In-One package / parcel tracking solution. The application has very small installation size (300 KB) compared with other tracking apps (1050 KB - 6100 KB size). Mobile Package Tracker was 2010 top 4 Application in All Paid Applications, and Package Tracker Pro is its successor. We do our best to make our application and server stable to serve our users' daily package tracking. As we provide long term support to our customers, if you have any question or suggestions, you can contact us @ http://www.pdexpress.net or send us email. Feature list: 1. Package tracking (Parcel tracking) of a variety of shipping carriers 2. Notification and alert via Ringtone / LED / vibration / email 3. Label/edit/delete package (hint: long touch the tracking #, and the options will pop up) 4. Sync tracking # list between PC (sync site) and phone without typing on phone. Using this extra value feature will save you and your team's time. 5. Push tracking # to the sync site 6. email tracking information 7. Display package route map if available 8. Customize your carrier list 9. option to sort package display by package add-on time 10. option to enable group package list by carrier 11. description: Do you think you could handle a major, fashion talent challenging girl games marathon? We're bringing you not 1, 2 or 3, not even 10 or 15 fashion-themed games for you to test your skills as a fashion guru with, but... 21! So, get ready for this avalanche of dress-up scenarios, of mind-blowing stylish wardrobes to scan through and lots and lots... and lots of fancy shoes and all kinds of other chic designer accessories and plenty of catwalk or red carpet hairstyles to pick from! Is there a shy and yet so very creative fashion star hidden inside you, waiting to step into the spotlight? Well, we're ready to lure her out with this amazing 21 games for girls pack that she will surely not be able to resist to! Why should you waste precious time looking for one game at a time, searching for games featuring different dress-up themes, when you can have the very best girl games, challenging you, each, with all those those dress-up scenarios that you love the most, all grouped in one single... mega pack? Do I sense a big, big shopping girl dress-up games fan or maybe a huge Halloween games addict or rather a celebrity fashion games fan or a winter special games for girls one? No matter what your dress up games-related preferences might be, you will definitely feel spoiled, as a fashion expert, as you scan through all the 21 girls games forming this series here! Which one of them would you like to do your warm-ups with? How about styling up some best friends stylistas for their fun-filled shopping spree at the mall? With all those stylish, trendy ladies hunting the best sales at the mall these days, standing out from the crowd will be a major challenge for these two teen fashionistas. Make sure to come up with some eye-catching, casual comfy with a twist type of fashion combos for the two charming shopaholics! Continue your girl games playing marathon then by working your talent as a fashion star on a one pretty flower girl or on a sweet candy girl, putting together a girly chic, so very feminine fashion look for the first gracious young lady and a girly cute, candy-colored one for the teen stylists with a sweet tooth. Then, from Candyland step right on the... red carpet to fashionize and glam up some en vogue young celebrities such as the male stars from “Twilight” or Zac Efron and Lucas Till, getting, each one of them, some breathtaking fabulous, sharp elegant star looks to sport while striking their poses in front of all those flashy cameras. Dig through fancy Italian designer suits, then scan through their less conventional stylish fashion items if you want to help them break all fashion rules and show up on the red carpet sporting some cool, edgy star fashion looks instead of the standard, classy elegant ones then... dig some more through this huuuuge girl games collection available for your Android phone any time anywhere. Next, how does the idea of glaming up one ravishing upper class mademoiselle for one of those luxurious winter charity balls and turning her into the belle of the ball with the help of one of her majestic, sumptuous full-skirt gowns and some of her dazzling diamond jewels sound to you? Once you've got her look from gorgeous to... royal-like sumptuous, go on and continue this girl games playing marathon by fashionize another model for a totally different type of party: a mask party! Look through her posh stylish evening dresses and fancy accessories and make sure to jazz up each one of her fashion looks with some gorgeous, extravagant, attention-grabbing feathery or sequined face masks. From the animated mall to the isolated desert, from Candyland to the red carpet, from spring to winter or from styling up a charming dog walker to glaming up Vanessa Hudgens herself, you will be challenged to adapt your skills as a fashion star to a mind-blowing variety of dress-up scenarios, by simply sweeping through all these 21 high class fashion-packed girl games here!

Scorecard Keeper lets you: * Add multiple people * Adjust scores with a simple and intuitive interface * Increase or decrease a player's score by a certain amount * Manually set a player's score * Rename any player after having been created * Delete a player from the list * See the ranking of each player on the Chromecast * Sort by amount of points * Show game on a Chromecast The premium version which is offered as an in-app purchase unlocks the following features: * Removes the ad * Add more than 5 people * Adjust point amount for quick buttons * Any and all future premium features Please email me if you have any problems with the application ( android.hillmanworks@gmail.com ) Enjoy your game night!

description: "Aprende Francés hablando" es una moderna aplicación que sirve para una efectiva y eficaz comunicación en el idioma francés. Está destinada tanto para los principiantes como para los que quieran enriquecer su vocabulario. Los creadores se centraron en la destreza lingüística más importante, es decir, la habilidad de sostener conversaciones fluidas en el idioma francés. Un innovador método de comunicación empleado en la aplicación, permite eliminar rápido la barrera lingüística, y expresarse con fluidez en las situaciones cotidianas. La aplicación está destinada, sobre todo, para las personas interesadas en dominar de una manera activa el idioma francés. Todas las palabras, expresiones y diálogos han sido grabados por lectores profesionales de francés. Una lógica división en 127 temas y categorías, junto con una búsqueda rápida, permite encontrar enseguida cada palabra o expresión necesitada. La aplicación muy bien puede servir como un traductor que habla, durante los viajes al extranjero. Gracias a ella, te comunicarás con facilidad en todas las situaciones típicas, por ejemplo en una tienda, en un banco, en un hotel, en un aeropuerto... Sin problemas comprarás un billete en la taquilla, harás un pedido en un restaurante, preguntarás por el camino o acordarás una cita. La aplicación es una excelente propuesta para las personas que se están preparando para los exámenes orales del idioma francés, o que viajan al extranjero con fines turísticos, para trabajar o estudiar. Las características más importantes: - grabaciones con la participación de franceses nativos - 127 grupos temáticos y categorías - prácticas charlas, conversaciones y diálogos - diccionario francés-español, español-francés - aprendizaje de la pronunciación correcta - creación de diálogos y escenas de situaciones - innovador sistema de la memorización de las expresiones - búsqueda rápida de palabras y expresiones - escritura fonética simplificada - ejemplos del uso de palabras en las frases - curso de conversaciones del idioma francés - reproductor integrado de palabras y expresiones Una aplicación, gracias a la cual, rápido y sin esfuerzo, empezarás a hablar en francés. Incluso si antes no conocías ni una palabra en este idioma. Aquí no hay ningunos ejercicios ni gramática aburrida. El innovador método “EasyTalk”, empleado en la aplicación, es tan fácil y rápido, que ya después de unos minutos hablarás en francés. GARANTIZAMOS. La versión gratuita de la aplicación contiene 800 palabras y expresiones. En cambio, en la versión completa están disponibles más de 4000 palabras, expresiones y frases. "Learn French speaking" is a modern application that serves for effective and efficient communication in the French language. It is intended for both beginners and those who want to enrich their vocabulary. The creators focused on the most important language skills, ie the ability to hold conversations in fluent French. An innovative method of communication used in the application, faster eliminates the language barrier, and fluent in everyday situations. The application is designed especially for those interested in mastering a French language actively. All words, phrases and dialogues have been recorded by professional readers of French. A logical division in 127 subjects and categories, along with a quick search, you find every word or expression immediately needed. The application may well serve as a translator speaking during foreign travel. With it, you will communicate with ease in all typical situations, such as in a store, a bank, a hotel, airport ... No problems will buy a ticket at the box office, you will make an order in a restaurant, ask for the road or remember an appointment. The application is an excellent proposition for those who are preparing for the oral examination of the French language, or traveling abroad for tourism, for work or study. The most important features: - Recordings involving native French - 127 clusters and categories - Practical lectures, discussions and dialogues - French-Spanish, Spanish-French - Learning the correct pronunciation - Creating situations dialogues and scenes - Innovative system for memorizing the expressions - Quick search for words and expressions - Simplified phonetic writing - Examples of the use of words in sentences - During talks of French - Integrated player of words and expressions An application, thanks to which, quickly and effortlessly, begin to speak French. Even if we do not know a word in English. Here there are no dull exercises or grammar. The innovative method "EasyTalk" as used in the application, it is so easy and fast, and after a few minutes you will speak in French. GUARANTEE. The free version of the application contains 800 words and expressions. In contrast, in the full version are available more than 4000 words, phrases and sentences.

Provide instant alert for Hong Kong's motorist when detected speed camera ahead. Alert will be triggered while speed camera ahead approximately 1-3km far, user has sufficient time to slow down their speed to avoid summons. Features: ► Speed Camera Alert is not determine on camera location by radius to trigger alert like other apps does. Due to driving safety concern, alert will not simply trigger when you’re not in risk but within the radius, Speed Camera Alert is smart enough only alert when the camera is in front of your driving direction. ► It is designed to work at background even phone went into sleep mode, and also allow user to use other apps at the same time. ► It will turn on screen when alert trigger and going back to sleep mode after pass by camera spot. This can save battery consumption significantly during traveling. ► Internet or data connection is NOT required but only required when you switch to Map view (to download map data). ► ONLY GPS is required to turn on in order to get precise camera and user coordinates. ► Human voice alerting. ► Camera location in Map view.

description: Magic Locker is most colorful and simple lock screen app for Android! Various of lock screen Themes to match your style and make your mobile outstanding! **** Features: 1. Shortcut Customization 2. More Theme Customization(like position,alpha,skin,show/hide somethings) 3. Activate phone, SMS ,Camera and other shortcuts directly from lock screen; 4. Screen Lock Security 5. Support customize wallpaper and live wallpaper. 6. Supports customize date format 7. Supports system security pattern (settings->Location and security->Set up screen lock. For HTC: Settings-> Security->Set up screen lock) 8. Block Home Key 9. Support to enable/disable volume rocker wake up screen 10. Supports to send Email, mak phone call, open URL ect. directly on lockscreen. 11. Supports to pull down notification bar 12. Suports music control 13. Control System supports 14. Fonts customization supports. ✭ The Magic Locker Main App just includes one theme - 'Lost Robot', as the default theme, you can search more themes in Google Play. For more details please refer to below Q&A section. ✭ About Music Control, the MagicLocker just simulate the headset button but not a real music player. So you must start your preferred music player and pick your playlist firstly. And the player you choose must support or enable headset control else if it won't work. Q&A: Q: Why my home button doesn't work? A: This issue happens when enable 'Volume rocker wake' and system 'Pin/Password' security at the same time. It's a known issue, we will fix it ASAP. Q: How to find more Magic Locker Themes? A: You can press 'More Themes' button in 'MagicLocker Setting -> Themes Tab'. Or search 'mobi.lockscreen.magiclocker.theme' in Google Market directly. Q: How to install Magic Locker Themes? A: After you install a MagicLocker theme app, you need to run the theme app and press 'Install this theme' button in the theme dialog. Q: How to uninstall Magic Locker Themes? A: You can long press a theme in 'MagicLocker Setting -> Themes Tab' then press 'Uninstall theme'. Or go to 'System Setting -> Applications -> Manage applications' then find the theme App to uninstall as general App. Q: How to make the theme apps icon disappear from App Drawer/Launcher? A: Actually Magic Locker had already tried to hide these icons, but in some phones it will only react after phone reboot or Launcher reboot. Q: How can I do if encounter double lock screen? A: You can try to change the 'Volume rocker wake' status in the MagicLocker Settings. Q: Why the alarm dialog disappears? A: It's a known issue exist the HTC 2.2 phone, you can upgrade to HTC 2.3 or download another free alarm app from android market. NOTES: About permissions: Please notice that Magic Locker requires a number of permissions, the purpose is to launch other Apps from the lockscreen, while we definitely won't read the contents in users' phone. For example, we declared SMS read permission in order to launch the SMS App, while we will not read any content of the SMS.
release_text: 1.6.4 Fixed the Pin/Password inputting issues. 1.6.3 Disabled the recent app dialog when the MagicLocker is active. 1.6.2. Bug fixed. 1.6.1 1. Fixed the Customization screen flash back issue. 2. Improve the performance of theme. (Need theme support, more effective themes are coming.) 1.5.7 1. Added 'Keep on Lockscreen status' option so that it will be back to Lockscreen after use any lockscreen shortcuts except the Home shortcut.

description: Milople Magento Dashboard App - the mobile Magento dashboard, allows you to access the information stored on your Magento store. You’ll easily be able to check what’s happening on your store in a much faster and quicker way. Built to be simple to use, it gives you access to the same features that you are already familiar with your regular Dashboard of your Magento store. Milople’ Magento Dashboard gives you access to all the key information about the product, product image and its description. It also provides access to the customer details and their requested orders along with order details. Order details can be viewed and the status of the order can be updated. Whether you are traveling or in the waiting room, you will be able to check your store’s bestsellers, last orders, and sales of the day. Owing to its immense experience with Magento, Milople puts your store in the palm of your hand. With Magento Dashboard mobile app, take the pulse of your sales wherever you are, whenever you want and as much as you want ! Some key points which can be covered by magento dashboard app are: • Statistics of sales, order and customer. • All order, customer and product information can be reviewed. • Detail description of order, customer and production information. • Search the order, customer and product by name and date. • Sort the product by name, type and SKU. • Sort orders by the status of the orders. • Update the status of orders. • Graph of revenue can be shown. • Gives you information for 24h, 7 days, current month, current year. • Lifetime sales, last orders, bestsellers and most searched terms can be found.

description: The most sought after NCERT solutions will now be available on your smartphone! This application is free forever. We don’t ask you to signup/register or link any other account. We honor your privacy and thus we have made the application user friendly and small in install size at the same time so that even your phone stays happy. The application lets you to save questions offline thus you can view them anytime anywhere even on the move, no concerns about WiFi availability or lost data connection. The application also shows you recently browsed question so that you can carry on from that very point where you left. We have tried to our best to make the app extremely user friendly. Our team is working like caffeinated monkeys, always experimenting and brainstorming on new ideas and features. Note that this application in its current state is only a glimpse of what's about to come, expect many more features as we approach version 1.0.0 . We are constantly in the process of updating our databases with new questions for more classes and subject, so if you fail to find your class here, feel free to contact us to know about it, or follow us on twitter (@layapps) and facebook (fb.com/layapps) to stay updated!
release_text: - Removed the offline saving limit - Added functionality for viewing other apps by LayApps

description: TransmiSitp busca por ti la ruta con menos paradas para moverte entre dos estaciones del sistema transmilenio de Bogotá. Con esta aplicación accede a la información de cada una de las rutas, incluyendo estaciones, buses, horarios, alimentadores y mapas. Conoce las rutas del sistema integrado de transporte público bogotano (sitp urbano, complementario y especial), visualiza mapas y tablas de rutas. Aprovecha el GPS y google maps para encontrar la estación más cercana o los puntos de recarga de la tarjeta tullave. Todas las funcionalidades, menos google maps, se pueden acceder sin necesidad de tener Internet o plan de datos. Calcula la ruta Origen - Destino para llegar a cualquier lugar del sistema transmilenio o SITP con el menor número de intercambios y el menor número de paradas de transbordo. Se puede elegir el día y hora sobre los cuales se desea hacer el recorrido para que pueda planear su viaje desde antes. También se puede elegir si se tienen en cuenta solo los servicios activos o todos los servicios. Para cada bus se muestran todos los horarios y se resaltan los horarios activos. Lista de funcionalidades: * Búsqueda de mejor ruta dada una estación de origen y una de destino. La búsqueda se puede hacer por troncal, mapa, nombre de estación y google maps. * Costo del pasaje para el sistema. Indica cuanto tiempo resta entre los cambios de hora pico y hora valle. * Consulta el saldo de la tarjeta tullave (solo para dispositivos con NFC) * Troncales del sistema transmilenio. * Búsqueda de estación por palabra y por cercanía basada en información GPS. * Visualización de troncales y estaciones de transmilenio en google maps. * Búsqueda de bus. * Medición de velocidad y ubicación de estación para buses de transmilenio por GPS * Visualización de ruta de bus con mapa de recorrido incluido. * Búsqueda de alimentadores. * Consulta de alimentadores en una estación. * Integración con calendario de festivos. Muestra que buses se encuentran en operación en el momento de la consulta según el día. * Lista y búsqueda y detalles de las rutas del sitp. * Tablas de rutas del sitp. * Mapas de las rutas del sitp. * Puntos de recarga de tarjeta tu llave. * Ubicación de puntos de recarga por GPS. * Visualización de punto de recarga en google maps. * Mapa general del sistema transmilenio. * Consulta de estaciones desde el mapa. * Números de policía por troncales * Sitp y alimentadores en google maps * Noticias de movilidad No dudes en contactarnos si tienes información acerca de nuevas rutas o cambios en rutas existentes. Puedes ayudarnos enviándonos correos con este tipo de información o recomendándonos a tus amigos. Puedes apoyar nuestra comunidad de facebook en http://www.facebook.com/transmilenioysitp y twitter en https://twitter.com/transmisitp Si la aplicación te presenta algún error y quieres ayudarnos, puedes reportarlo desde la opción de reportar el error que automáticamente se abre, y en el comentario puedes indicar que te encontrabas haciendo cuando se presentó el error. Si encuentras problemas con rutas, o que falta actualizar alguna información, nos puedes contactar a nuestro correo electrónico o a nuestra comunidad en facebook indicándonos el problema. Hemos recibimos comentarios como por ejemplo "falta actualizar rutas" los cuales no nos son de mucha utilidad, si no nos indican cuales rutas son (si conoces y nos envías la página web donde está la información actualizada mucho mejor). Nota: La aplicación TransmiSitp no tiene relación alguna con transmilenio, sitp ni ninguna de sus filiales. Tampoco tenemos relación con moovit. La información de la aplicación es la información pública que se destina para los usuarios del sistema. TransmiSitp you looking for a route with fewer stops to move between two stations Bogota Transmilenio system. With this application accesses the information from each of the routes, including stations, buses, schedules, feeders and maps. Meet the routes of Bogota (city SITP, supplementary and special) integrated public transport system, displays maps and routing tables. Seize the GPS and google maps to find the nearest station or the charging of tullave card. All features except google maps can be accessed without having Internet or data plan. Calculates the route Origin - Destination to reach anywhere in the Transmilenio system or SITP with fewer exchanges and fewer stops transhipment. You can choose the day and time on which you want to make the trip so you can plan your trip before. You can also choose if we take into account only the active services or all services. For each bus schedules show all active schedules and highlights. Features list: * Find best route given a station of origin and destination. The search can be done by trunk, map, station name and google maps. * Ticket cost for the system. Indicates how much time is left between changes in peak and off-peak time. * Check the balance of the tullave card (only for devices with NFC) * Core of Transmilenio system. * Search for word station and GPS information based on proximity. * Viewing transmilenio trunks and stations in google maps. * Search for bus. * Measurement of velocity and location of Transmilenio bus station for GPS * Viewing route bus tour map included. * Find feeders. * Consultation feeders in a season. * Integration with holiday calendar. Shows that buses are in operation at the time of consultation by day. * List and search and route details SITP. * Tables SITP routes. * Maps SITP routes. * EV your key card. * Location of charging stations for GPS. * Viewing charging point on google maps. * General Map of Transmilenio system. * Consultation stations from the map. * Numbers police trunk * SITP and feeders in google maps * News Disabled Please contact us if you have information about new routes or changes to existing routes. You can help by sending emails with this information or recommending us to your friends. You can support our community on facebook and twitter http://www.facebook.com/transmilenioysitp in https://twitter.com/transmisitp If the application presents an error and want to help, you can report from the option of reporting the error that automatically opens, and the commentary you can indicate which you were doing when the error occurred. If you find problems with routes, or missing update some information, you can contact us to our email or our facebook community indicating the problem. We received comments such as "lack upgrade paths" which are not of much use, if not tell us which routes are (if you know and send us the website where the updated information is much better). Note: TransmiSitp application has nothing to do with transmilenio, SITP nor any of its subsidiaries. Nor have regarding moovit. The application information is public information that is intended for system users.

description: Looking for a good Valentine's Day theme, but don't want the traditional "Hallmark" red hearts look? Love Birds may be just what you are looking for then. This is a love filled theme that won't feel out of place on the other 364 days a year on top of being perfect for the commercial holiday of affection. Go Launcher Ex has come on the Android scene by storm as the Launcher to use for theme connoisseurs. Allowing users to piece together various elements from different themes in order to create a personalized visual experience on their phone. When you call something a theme it can mean many things. To me a theme should change the entire visual appearance of your phone, at least as much as can be changed by that theme. So when I set out to create my Vindicated theme for Go Launcher Ex that was my goal. To create a compete theme. I use this as a base for all of my other themes iin order to give a better end user experience. This base allows a continuity to the theme connoisseur. While each new theme is unique, you'll be able to recognize your app icons easily if you use many of my different themes. -Over 300 metro style icons -unique page indicators -Fun Love Birds Wallpaper -Portrait and Landscape friendly Follow @MobileThemer on Twitter for assistance and updates

Please watch the teach video to know how to use it. (Have description if watch video from PC or Notebook.) When you go to travel and take a picture, I suggest you to enable camera's GPS. After you enable camera's GPS function, then the GPS latitude and longitude will record in the captured photo. This application is help you to check the photo have a GPS info or not. And help to launch the Google map. If your photo (jpeg file) doesn't have a GPS info, this application also can help you to edit it. So you can know where to take this picture. A few years later, you also know where this place is. Memories are important thing in our life. So remember enable GPS when take a picture!!! Function : 1. Fast check/edit photo's GPS information. 2. Fast check photo's camera information. 3. Navigate GPS-POI in google map. 4. Launch to "google map application" with photo's GPS location. 5. When launch this application, the final selected photo will be shown. So it is quickly to index the final selected photo. It is convenient! Purpose : 1. You can copy your GPS photos to your friends, and then they can go there if they are interest. 2. Want to know where to take the picture. (Take a GPS photo when park your car, you will find your car easily.) 3. Want to know the "focal length", "aperture", "ISO" value in the photo. V1.1.0: 1. change MAP to google map V3. a) support traffic/weather/panoramio layer. b) support street view. c) support place search. V1.1.1: 1. Support edit photo's latitude/longitude. (Only JPEG file can edit latitude/longitude) (a-1) Press the small photo a long time to enable photo multi-select. (a-2) Select photos. (up to 20 photos) (a-3) Select option button, then tap "edit poi" button to enter edit-page. Others : 1. It could be slow at first time loading image. After decoding finish, it will be fast. 2. Remember turn on GPS funtion when you take a picture. And the photo will contail GPS info. 3. Your phone need already install "google map application" and "google play service" before run this application. 4. Tap the small picture for some time, share/delete/rename/rotate function will enable.         PS: In the Line/Facebook photo sharing, latitude and longitude info will be removed. If you want to share the latitude and longitude info, we recommend to use email/Gmail. [Q&A] : 1. How to capture a photo that contain a GPS tag? Ans: 1) Enable `Use wireless networks` and `Use GPS satellites` in `Location services` page. 2) Enable WIFI or 3G/4G network for fast locaton search. 3) Enable GPS function in the camera application.
release_text: V1.2.4 : 1. Fix Google Earth Map launch(Map button) if you have install the Google Earth Application. V1.2.6 : 1. Change to Google Map v3 in Poi Edit Page. 2. Add search function in Poi Edit Page. 3. Add multi-save button in Poi Edit Page. You can save latitude/longitude info to all photos at once.

description: SlideIT keyboard is an excellent tool for entering text, replacing your touchscreen keyboard. SlideIT keyboard enables users to dramatically improve writing speed with practically no learning curve. Instead of entering text by tapping on the keyboard letters, SlideIT keyboard eases texting by sliding a finger along the keyboard letters, while the words “magically” appear on the screen. Love SlideIT? Please give us a 5-star Google Play rating and review. We’re always trying to make SlideIT better. If you have questions or suggestions, please share them with us! support@mobiletextinput.com SlideIT keyboard version 7 includes many new features and fixes. ☞ NEW!! SlideIT 7 now supports A.I.Type next-word prediction with many languages! Many keyboard skins for SlideIT are available for free download from the Android Market. SlideIT keyboard fully supports all Android versions from 2.2 and up, including tablets and Android 4.2 (Jelly Bean). With over 6,000,000 downloads, SlideIT keyboard has been an Android bestseller and selected as an editor's choice by Google. Among SlideIT's great features: ❖ Smart predictions and disambiguation ❖ Over 70 language packs and layouts ❖ More than 60 skins ❖ Speech-to-text ❖ Keyboard customization ❖ Import contacts from your phone SlideIT's many great features make it the ultimate time-saving keyboard for Android devices. Writing e-mail, SMS messaging or just chating with your friends on a small touchscreen is now easy and fun! The best keyboard on the Android Market! ~~~ This is the Trial version for 15 days. Reviews: “…for one-handed text entry, SlideIT Keyboard is the current king of the hill.” - PCWorld, August 2010 “…Best keyboard around. A must have for the Android. It is the best app that I've bought” - SlideIT user review “Can I just say THANK YOU, a million times, I love this app and you saved me big time. I just switched from droid2 to droidx2 after 1 day, swype malfunctioned, and vz wireless tech support led me to you. He said it was way better anyhow, and he was right, customizable and all! Omg, I'm in heaven O:-)” - Customer feedback LANGUAGE SUPPORT: SlideIT keyboard can load many languages, and you can switch between them with the press of a button! Afrikaans – Afrikaanse sleutelbord, Albanian – Tastierës shqipe, Arabic – لوحة المفاتيح العربية, Belorussian – Беларускія клавіятуры, Brazilian – Teclado brasileiro, Bulgarian – Българска клавиатура, Catalan – Català teclat, Czech -Česká klávesnice, Croatian – Hrvatske tipkovnice, Danish – Danske tastatur, Dutch -Nederlands toetsenbord, Estonian – Eesti klaviatuur, Finnish – Suomen näppäimistö, French – Clavier français, German – Deutsch Tastatur, Greek – Ελληνικό πληκτρολόγιο, Hebrew – מקלדת עברית, Hungarian – Magyar billentyűzet, Icelandic – Íslenska lyklaborðið, Indonesian – Bahasa Indonesia keyboard, Italian – Tastiera italiana, Korean - 한국어 키보드, Latvian – Latvijas klaviatūras, Lithuanian – Lietuvos klaviatūros, Norwegian – Norsk tastatur, Persian – صفحه کلید فارسی, Polish – Polska klawiatura, Portuguese – Teclado Português, Romanian – Român tastatură, Russian – Русская клавиатура, Serbian – cyrillic – Ћирилица српска тастатура, Serbian – latin – Latin srpskoj tastaturi, Slovak – Slovenská klávesnica, Slovenian – Slovensko tipkovnico, Spanish – Teclado en español, Swahili – Swahili keyboard, Swedish – Svenskt tangentbord, Turkish – Türkçe klavye, Ukrainian -Український клавіатури. description: If you're in business or are a student of business, this app could be useful for you! A Financial Calculator combined with a Scientific Calculator Financial Mode includes: * Simple Interest Mode * Compound Interest Mode (FV, PV, PMT, NPER) * Cash Flow Mode (NPV, NFV, IRR, MIRR, DPBP) * Amortization Mode (PMT, BAL, INT, PRN, ∑INT, ∑PRN) * Cost, Sales and Margin Mode * Break-Even Mode * Depreciation Mode (SL, FP, SYD, FDB, DB) * Bond Mode (PRC, YTM, YTC, Duration, Convexity) * Days Calculation Mode * Interest Conversion Mode * Options Trading (Greeks) * Exchange Rates In many cases, a graph and accompanying table showing the results is available. The table can be saved to the sd card in csv format. Full details of the formulas used in the financial calculations are available in the Help section. Scientific Mode includes: * Trigonometric Functions * Power and Root Functions * Log and Antilog Functions * Permutations and Combinations * Statistics Functions * Factorial Function * Modulus Function Separate calculation histories are available for both financial and scientific modes.
release_text: 03/20 (ver 1.1.0) * added support for Samsung Multi Window * added more currencies to the FOREX function

description: Reel in those big fish hiding in the reefs! Lure action, hooking and powerful struggles! Players can enjoy realistic fishing rod operation!! Now, hook the Big Fish in southern waters! *Features of Full Version -Advertisements are not shown. -There are 10 levels that you can play in challenge mode. -You'll be able to enjoy the "FREE FISHING" mode all day long. -You can choose four beautiful maps! House Reef,White Reef,Tuna Road,Blue Hole Reef FEATURES: You can go on a boat freely and hook a fish over the ocean! Even from the boat, players can easily see the endless number of fish inhabiting the clear, emerald green ocean. By realistic fishing rod operation, players can feels like you're actually fishing! An in-game "FIGHT" is a chance for players to enjoy grappling with the fish of the sea! Players will enjoy struggling to catch a big fish hidden in coral reef and a migratory fish that is chasing smaller fish. We've also prepared a sonar system so that first-time players can also enjoy everything the game has to offer. Use the sonar to search for big catch or follow sea birds to learn where the fish are at - how to fish is depending on you! Weight and length measurements can also be changed between metric (kg/cm) and imperial (lb/in) units.

description: where R you is an application that offers you to locate your family. You are always nervous of not knowing where your kids, wife or husband are. Seldom do they pick up the phone to calm you down by letting you know where they are. This application is then for you. Don't be afraid about centralized server that could capture your position. With the where R you application there is no publication of your data on a public server, all is kept confidential between your phone and your contacts. Install and configure this application on both phones and you will perform automatic location requests. whereRyou free: a free version is available that is only able to answer location request. In any case it will allow some location requests. You can install this version on your kids phone, it's available here. NOTA: the phones dialog to each other via SMS (so you are potentially billed for each request or response). Why SMS? ...because it is the system that do not rely on data connection to a centralized server, it is more robust. Once the phones are configured you can do whatever you want. All SMS are encoded so even if someone listens to your messages he/she won’t be able to access your position. New feature on V2. Create groups in order to request multiple people where they are in one clic.

description: *New Update* Leaderboards are now ready! Play free now to crush the competition and rule the ranks! TAPTOIDS: DON’T LET US DIE! Is a new free to play, time-based Earth defense arcade game where you play to defeat colorful planetoids headed to crush our home world. It is a super fun and challenging space-themed game with a high demand for hand-eye coordination. Be the master of time and space by surviving this chaotic galactic attack! Our cute little astronaut buddies, Rocky and Rover are floating in space, but can't get home until the Earth is free of any danger. They will cheer you on and keep you company while you play. This is how the game play goes: Tap the incoming planetoids with your fingers before they crush the earth. Some enemies are small and fast, while others might require more taps to defeat. Try playing one-handed while holding the device, or place it on a table or your lap to free up both hands. Playing with a stylus is fun too! SURVIVAL REQUIREMENTS: •Fastest fingers in the galaxy! •Master hand/eye coordination •Relentless endurance •The spirit of an eagle •The eye of the tiger •All that jazz FEATURES: •Free game! •No ads during game play •Designed for tablet and smart phone •Google Play Services Supported! •Leaderboards •Eye-catching graphics and particle FX •Exciting sounds and music •Adorable characters to cheer you on •Various planetoid enemy types Additional info: Having a problem? You can reach us at geeksplashgames@gmail.com

description: ***A la demande de nombreux utilisateurs qui souhaitent bénéficier d'une application gratuite, nous mettons à disposition une version gratuite intégrant de la publicité. Nous vous invitons à découvrir cette version sur notre site : www.edupad.com/fr/ecoles *** iTooch Maths CP est une application de soutien scolaire ludique, conçue par des enseignants, qui couvre le programme scolaire officiel de mathématiques au CP. Utilisées par plus de 3.000.000 de personnes dans 146 pays, les applications iTooch sont nées de la rencontre d'enseignants passionnés, de pédagogues et de professionnels du jeu vidéo, eux-mêmes parents. Ils peuvent me solliciter à la moindre difficulté ou incompréhension, ce qui rend – à mon sens – la séance nettement plus productive." ‣ "En plus des séances individuelles, j’utilise iTooch en classe entière en vidéo-projection et les élèves “accrochent” vraiment. F-Link is a dedicated client for the www.linkitall.com web-service. F-Link is a part of a complete IT-solution for Fleet Management for the transport and logistics industry. The driver of the vehicle uses F-Link to identify him and the vehicle, and after that to receive information about goods to be distributed (the trip list). When picking up or delivering goods F-Link is used to register data related to the distribution, where after this data is transferred to LinkItAll.

description: Watch as shining, ever changing star patterns and cloud formations unfold. CHOOSE BETWEEN 7 DIFFERENT GALAXIES! You will start with a shining galaxy with plasma clouds in the background. You can then proceed to "Mystical purple" and "Pleiadian", with its magical colors. Then proceed to "Glowing plasma galaxy" if you want the ultimate space experience or "Ultra galaxy" if you want to take it even further. You can enjoy this free version for as long as you want, but the full version has much more features! It works like a music visualizer, which syncs the stars with your favorite music from any player. You can choose between 33 more galaxy types, like "Hypnotic galaxy" and "Crystal galaxy". You can choose between 6 different background clouds. You can also adjust the speed, the speed, the size and brightness of the stars and much more. The full version has no commercials and battery saving functionality is included. Turn off Halo effect on the settings if it looks strange! "Halo effect" is a technique, which creates shining star objects. This is not supported on all devices. HOW TO OPEN: Menu>Wallpaper>LIVE wallpapers>Morphing Galaxy xedgarwertXpjk

Программа для расчета содержания алкоголя в крови и оценки Вашего состояния в зависимости от количества выпитого алкоголя, его крепости и времени, прошедшего после его употребления. Добавлена возможность "обратного расчета", рассчитывает рекомендуемое к употреблению количество алкоголя в зависимости от крепости напитка и времени, необходимого для полного выведения алкоголя из крови, т.е. зная через сколько часов необходимо сесть за руль и ассортимент напитков, можно вычислить максимальную дозу. A program for calculating blood alcohol content and assessment of your condition depending on the amount of alcohol consumed, its fortress and the time elapsed after its use. Added possibility "reverse calculation", calculates recommended to use the amount of alcohol, depending on the beverage strength and the time required for complete removal of alcohol from the blood, i.e. knowing how many hours you must get behind the wheel and an assortment of drinks, you can calculate the maximum dose.

SPECIAL PRICE 50% OFF (USD 7.99 -> USD 3.99)!!! An unforgettable RPG over the blood of the genies! Genies... A handful of people possess the power to commune with monsters, and control them at will. Those who are gifted with this ability have been both feared and used as tools. Wherever they go, they are met with hostility and discrimination. In Listy, a village in the Kingdom's farthest corner, a youth named Fort has the genies' blood. Living in an orphanage with his friends Elicia and Legna, Fort is persecuted by the other villagers. One day, however, the Empire invades and the streets run with the blood of innocents. Running to the aid of his friends, Fort is forced to confront the truth of what he is. A truth that will leave him cursing his own blood... Trust and betrayal, friendship, love and hate all tangled together in an unforgettable tale of lives changed forever by the blood of the genies. ■The genie's power to command monsters. Using his power, Fort can contract with monsters, including members of the four tribes of Dragons, Fairies, Beasts and Vampires. Create characters by choosing a class for each of Fort's monster allies, then combine the strengths of each tribe and class to create a powerful party. ■Expand the boundaries of your adventures! The purchase of Solitude Points allows you to add various new elements to this story. description: Marble Mania is the #1 deliciously addicting puzzle adventure with wacky characters and mind-bending experience suitable for all ages! The goal of Marble Mania is to eliminate all of the marble balls rolling around the screen along a given path before these marble balls reach the mysterious hole. You need to fire colored marbles from the wacky characters towards the chain of marbles. The marbles will disappear if three or more marbles of the same color come in contact. Marble Mania is easy for all ages to pick up and play, but challenging for the longtime zuma fans to master. Aim, fire and clear your way through this thrilling fun game now! How to Play: - Touch anywhere on the screen to shoot the marbles - Match 3 or more marbles to eliminate them - Tap the wacky characters in the center to switch the marbles Game Features: - 60 levels with more to come - Simple one-touch controls - Unique wacky characters and outstanding graphics

description: Fruit Break is simple addictive!BEST Fruit Match-3 game ever!! 3(or more) the same fruits being connected in a line, they will be removed,Switch and match fruit to challenge HighScore!! Rule and feature: 1: Match 3 or more identical fruits. 2: Match the fruits until the mission completed to pass the level. 3: Match 4 and more to get Bonus(extra score). 4: It has a limited time, so you should eliminate fruits as quickly as you can. Tips: Eliminate the fruits quickly can get extra scores. If you like this game, please rate it and recommend it to your friends. Thanks for playing!

La App para Profesionales de Enfermería: • Contiene la totalidad de los Diagnósticos 2012-2014 (NANDA-I, Conferencia 2010), Resultados (NOC 5ª edición) e Intervenciones (NIC 6ª edición), así como los Vínculos NNN (3ª edición). • Navegación entre NANDA/NOC, NANDA/NIC, NOC/NIC, NOC/NANDA, NIC/NANDA, NIC/NOC. Estas navegaciones se han obtenido de las relaciones existentes en los libros de NIC con NANDA, NOC con NANDA y el de Vínculos. • Búsquedas disponibles todos los formatos: - Por Código - Por Etiqueta - Por Características Definitorias/Factores de la NANDA - Por Indicadores de la NOC - Por Actividades de la NIC - Por Especialidades de Enfermería de la NOC y NIC • Nuevos buscadores: • NANDA - Por Dominios de NANDA-I - Por Necesidades de V. Henderson - Por Patrones de M. Gordon • NOC - Por Dominios de NOC - Por Patrones de M. Gordon • NIC - Por Campos de NIC • Se pueden Crear Favoritos tanto en Diagnósticos, como en Resultados e Intervenciones, añadiéndolos al Menú Favoritos donde se puede acceder a ellos de una forma rápida y cómoda. • De igual forma, se pueden Añadir Comentarios a cualquier Diagnóstico, Resultado o Intervención que deseemos, sean favoritos o no. • Posibilidad de enviar por email el Diagnóstico, Intervención o Resultado que tengamos activo en pantalla. • En la navegación de NANDA con NIC, algunas de las Intervenciones obtenidas de la NIC 6ª edición vinculadas a diagnósticos reales, consideradas como Principales, Sugeridas y Opcionales, pueden estar duplicadas con respecto a las Asociadas a Factores Relacionados obtenidas del libro de Vínculos en su 3ª edición. • Algo similar ocurre con los DdE de Riesgo en su navegación de NANDA con NIC, ya que las Intervenciones consideradas como Principales, Sugeridas y Opcionales, se basan en las relaciones de NIC con NANDA de la 6ª edición de NIC. Por esta razón, pueden aparecer duplicadas algunas de ellas al coincidir con las Asociadas a Factores de Riesgo de la 3ª edición de Vínculos. Este fenómeno no ocurre ni con los DdE nuevos de la Conferencia 2010 ni con las NIC nuevas incorporadas en la 6ª edición. Hemos optado por no perder esta información en nuestras bases de datos porque amplía las posibilidades de búsqueda. Novedades en el nuevo libro de NANDA-I (2012-2014) • En esta edición se han incorporado un total de 16 Diagnósticos nuevos que van desde el código 215 hasta el 230, ambos inclusive. Los códigos 189 al 192, también ambos inclusive, siguen sin estar adjudicados a ningún diagnóstico. • Por otro lado, se ha procedido a la eliminación del Diagnóstico con el código 122: TRASTORNO DE LA PERCEPCIÓN SENSORIAL: Visual, Auditiva, Cenestésica, Gustativa, Táctil, Olfatoria. Novedades en el libro de Vínculos: • Contiene los vínculos de NOC y NIC a diagnósticos médicos, como novedad. • En los Diagnósticos Reales, las Intervenciones NIC asociadas a los Factores Relacionados, se presentan como un listado en orden alfabético. No están relacionadas con factores relacionados específicos. • En los Diagnósticos de Riesgo del nuevo libro de Vínculos, las autoras no han vinculado los Resultados NOC ni las Intervenciones NIC con cada factor de riesgo, únicamente aparecen como listados alfabéticos. Novedades en el libro de NIC: • Como novedad destacable en esta 6ª edición de la NIC está la incorporación nuevamente de sus relaciones con la NANDA. Esta información había desaparecido de la edición anterior. Novedades en el libro de NOC: • Cabe destacar como novedad en la 5ª edición de la NOC la incorporación de una clasificación por los Patrones de la Dra. Marjory Gordon. © NANDA-I, autores Diagnósticos Enfermeros © John Wiley & Sons, Inc., por cesión licencia © Editorial ELSEVIER, por las traducciones al español © Educsa Tics, S.C.P., por esta aplicación informática The application for Nursing Professionals: • Contains all the diagnostics 2012-2014 (NANDA-I, 2010 Conference), Results (NOC 5th edition) and Interventions (NIC 6th edition) and NNN Linkages (3rd edition). • Navigation between NANDA / NOC, NANDA / NIC, NOC / NIC, NOC / NANDA, NIC / NANDA, NIC / NOC. These voyages were obtained from the relationships in the books of NIC with NANDA, NOC and NANDA with Links. • Search all available formats:     - By Code     - By Tag     - By defining features / factors NANDA     - What indicators NOC     - By Activities IAS     - For Nursing Specialties NOC and NIC • New search engine: • NANDA - For Domains of NANDA-I - By V. Henderson Needs - By Gordon M. Patterns • NOC - For Domains NOC - By Gordon M. Patterns • NIC - By NIC Golf • You can create Favorites so Diagnostics, and Intervention Outcomes and adding them to the Favorites menu where you can access them quickly and easily. • Similarly, you can add comments to any Diagnostic, Intervention Outcome or desire, are favorites or not. • Ability to send email Diagnosis, Intervention and Outcome we have active screen. • In the navigation NANDA NIC, some of the interventions derived from the NIC 6th edition linked to actual diagnoses considered Sights, Suggested and Optional, can be duplicated with regard to Associated Related Factors obtained from the book links in your 3rd edition. • Something similar happens with the DOE Risk in your navigation NANDA NIC, as Major Interventions considered, and Suggested Options are based on relationships with NANDA NIC of the 6th edition of NIC. For this reason, they can duplicate some of them appear to match the Associated Risk Factors of the 3rd edition of Links. This phenomenon does not occur with the new DOE or of the Conference 2010 or the new NIC built into the 6th. We have chosen not to lose this information in our database that extends the search capabilities. New on the new book by NANDA-I (2012-2014) • This edition has built a total of 16 new diagnoses ranging from code 215 to 230, inclusive. Codes 189 to 192, inclusive also, still not award any diagnosis. • On the other hand, we proceeded to the elimination of Diagnosis with code 122: SENSORY PERCEPTION DISORDER: Visual, Auditory, kinesthetic, Gustatory, Tactile, Olfactory. New Links in the book: • Contains the NOC and NIC linkages to medical diagnoses, as new. • In the Royals Diagnostics, the NIC Interventions Related Factors associated with are presented as a list in alphabetical order. They are not related to specific related factors. • In Diagnostics Risk Links new book, the authors have not linked the NOC and NIC results interventions with each risk factor, only appear as alphabetical listings. New on the book of NIC: • As a major development in this 6th edition of the NIC is again the incorporation of its relations with the NANDA. This information was missing from the previous edition. New on the book of NOC: • Notably new in the 5th edition of the NOC incorporating rated by Patterns of Dr. Marjory Gordon. © NANDA-I Diagnoses authors © John Wiley & Sons, Inc., for license transfer © Editorial ELSEVIER for Spanish translations © Educsa Tics, SCP, for this software application

description: 20년전통의 미가엘 찬양반주기가 스마트폰 애플리케이션으로 출시되었습니다. 찬양연주기 애플리케이션의 또다른 혁신 ! 세계 최초로 스마트폰 리얼악보 구현! 원음에 가까운 고품격 사운드 자유로운 음정/속도 조절 가정/구역예배/소그룹 모임 등 예배시 찬송가 반주기로 활용할 수 있습니다. [ 미가엘반주기의 주요 특장점 ] * 수준 높은 사운드의 찬양 반주 - 복음성가 1942곡 (미가엘 6집) 전곡 수록 - 1곡반복,1곡연주,전곡연주등을 설정할 수 있습니다. * 가사와 반주의 완벽한 싱크 - 큰화면 보기시 텍스트가사보기/리얼악보 및 코드보기를 설정하여 사용할 수 있습니다. * 숫자버튼 사용으로 빠르게 찾기 - 숫자버튼(0~9) 을 사용하여 찬송가를 선택하면 즉시 찾을 수 있습니다. * 세계 최초 스마트폰 리얼악보 기능 - 세게최초 리얼악보를 스마트폰에서 구현했습니다. - 악보보기시 코드보기를 설정할 수 있습니다. - 찬송가 책으로도 사용할 수 있습니다. * 음정 및 탬포 조절 기능 - 음정 조절시 리얼악보 조표 및 코드와 함께 조정 됩니다. * 곡검색기능 - 제목/ 가사첫줄을 입력하여 원하시는 곡을 찾을 수 있습니다. * 즐겨찾기 기능 - 예배순서에 맞춰 부를 찬양곡이나 즐겨들으시는 곡 등을 등록할 수 있습니다. - 즐겨찾기 연주로 등록한 곡만 재생할 수 있습니다. * 배경화면/ 글씨체 / 코드보기 등 다양한 설정 기능 - 5가지( 고딕, 고딕2, 명조 ,궁서 , 매직) 글씨체로 바꿀수 있어 보다 보기 편하게 사용할 수 있습니다. - 10가지 배경이 내장되 있어 다양하게 사용할 수 있습니다. * 가로모드 지원 - 모든 기능의 가로모드를 지원 합니다. 이용시 불편한 사항이나 기타 문의는 02.352.2530 elimmedia.an@gmail.com 으로 연락 주시기 바랍니다. ---- 개발자 연락처 : 주 소 : 서울시 은평구 역촌2동 71-15 전화번호 : 02-352-2530 The half-cycle of 20-year-old Michael praise was released a smartphone application. description: Welcome to Deluxe Pool Online, one of the best multiplayer billards available! This game features: - 8 and 9 Ball Multiplayer pool - Realistic 3D animation - Realistic billiard physics - Forward-, Backspin, English - Player profile & statistics - Highscore and replays - Configurable aiming - AND MORE! Join our community of dedicated pool players and play as much billard games as you like! The app also features chat and a buddy list for your favourite pool players. Now go ahead and rack em! How to play: Use automatch to get assigned to a random opponent. You may also challenge players you'd like to play. The game is ad-supported for now. There will be a ad-free version available soon!
