description: *** Nice Weather, the weather, simply. *** Nice Weather is a weather application that provides simple and clean forecasts for the next 5 days! This application has been designed to be simple and enjoyable, while giving access to accurate weather information. Check out the evolution of the weather along the day by sliding your finger on the temperature graph! Wind speed and precipitation are also updated. Features: - Weather forecast for 5 days with 3 hours intervals - Display of the wind speed, temperature and precipitation - Two interactive graphics to visualize the evolution of temperature and precipitation - Single color by forecast - Automatic update of data - Information available in different units - Offline access to the forecast Pro features (about 2 $ US / year to contribute) - Widgets - Multi-cities - More frequent updates Thanks to Martin Šindler (cs), 王克震 (zh), Piotr Ciastko (pl) and Maurits Hulzinga (nl), Andrey Raygorodskiy (ru) for the translations! And thanks to all people who help me to continue! Follow me on Twitter @aurel_hubert
Left or Right? That's your choice in this exciting sequel to Step on the MEOW Tile. Grab the Cats and skip the Dogs, and see who can get the highest score!

A very simple and easy to use Voice Changer that will allow you to record musics and sound clips and then play them back with various effects. Currently only two effects are available. More will be added later. Abilities: 1) Record and save audios 2) Play audios back in robotic, normal, or chipmunk sound effects 3) Simple and easy UI to play, record, and delete recordings. Free with ads. Internet permission is just used to display ads. Tags: "Voice Changer" "Voice Recorder" "Recorder"

Are you ready to learn Danish? Welcome to Babbel. Discover Babbel's wide variety of courses and start making progress quickly. Try it now! WHAT THE PRESS SAYS “The app I’ve found most powerful is Babbel.” – New York Times “7 apps you don’t want to miss.” – Mashable "9 out of 10" – Wired FEATURES - For users with or without previous knowledge - Extensive selection of interactive courses - Entertaining listening, writing, and speaking exercises - Vocabulary trainers for a wide variety of topics - Easily graspable grammar exercises - Effective pronunciation training with voice recognition - Integrated Review Manager to help consolidate what you've learned - Synchronization between website and mobile or tablet PLEASE NOTE You'll need a Babbel subscription in order to access courses and features. The quantity of courses offered may vary according to which display language you use. There are two subscription options: One-monthly subscription for $US12.95 per month, automatically renewed until canceled. One-yearly subscription for $US83.40 per year, automatically renewed until canceled. Your subscription will automatically renew unless it is canceled before the end of the current payment period. You can manage and cancel a subscription in your Google Play Store account. VISIT US: http://www.babbel.com FOLLOW US: http://twitter.com/#!/babbel CIRCLE US: https://plus.google.com/+BabbelPlus FAN US: http://www.facebook.com/babbel.languages -------------------- About babbel.com: Learn Danish with Babbel: With the babbel.com website learning system, you can learn Danish flexibly online. The courses are divided into manageable themes and offer you a variety of different Danish exercises: Beginner and refresher courses, grammar, verb training, tongue twisters, phrasebooks and much more. The courses have been developed by experts and improved with years' worth of customer feedback. Interactive Danish exercises for vocabulary and grammar as well as other tools enable you to pinpoint and learn what you need. Fear of speaking? No problem. Thanks to integrated speech recognition, you can rate and practice your Danish pronunciation. The intelligent review manager presents the vocabulary you've learned in optimal intervals for review. This helps embed what you've learned in your long-term memory. Learning languages on the internet has never been so easy! With Babbel you won't just learn quickly, intuitively and flexibly, but also more affordably than with traditional language courses. You can try the first Danish exercises online - free of charge and with no obligations. "But Babbel's focus on speaking, the wide selection of languages and the modest price make it competitive with both the free Duolingo and the sophisticated but pricey Rosetta Stone." - The Economist (Jun 14th 2013) Learn English, Spanish, French, Italian, German, Brazilian Portuguese, Swedish, Turkish, Polish, Dutch, Danish, Norwegian or Indonesian and communicate with people from all over the world. Just give it a try!

COME ON DOWN! Take a trip back to memory lane to guess the brand in the world's #1 logo quiz game. The concept of What's the Brand is very simple, can you guess the brands based on part of the logos shown on the screen? Game Features: - A visual Trivia game for your family and kids with all your favorite brands - Innovative touchscreen controls, stunning graphics, and rich emoji sound effects make replay irresistible - Unlimited Fun: 1,000+ of brands to guess and more to come Lots of Help Options: - Use hints to guess the brand based on the company/product summary of the brand - Expose a letter of the brand or remove some wrong letters - Finally, use our 'Show Logo' feature to clear the covering white tiles in case you get really stuck!

FxPro prides itself on providing you with the best forex trading tools in the industry; we want you to be up to date and well-informed so that you can make the best decisions every time you trade. Our mobile app features all the FX tools you need to improve your forex trading experience. - An economic calendar that provides you with all the economic indicators that are due to be released, as well as information regarding how impactful they are and how they are likely to affect the currencies you trade. - Real-time quotes on FX pairs, Metals, CFDs, Futures with charts, news, daily high, daily low and change. You can filter them as you like, you can add them to your portfolio or place them on your home screen as a widget. - Market insight and analysis from our team of FX professionals gives you an expert view of the market so you can more accurately time your entry and exit. - Forex calculators allowing you to easily work out your required margin, pip value, swap and FxPro cTrader commissions, as well as performing live currency conversions. All directly to your smartphone or tablet. Risk Warning: Trading CFDs incurs high risk of loss

Shazam is the best way to identify music and TV. In seconds you’ll know the name of any song, or more about what you’re watching - touch to Shazam to start your journey. Once you Shazam music, you can easily: • Preview and buy tracks on Amazon or Google Play • Sing along to the beat with real time lyrics • Share your discoveries on any social network • Watch music videos on YouTube • Share your discoveries on Facebook, Twitter, WhatsApp, Google+ and Pinterest • Listen to full tracks with Rdio, Spotify or Deezer • Connect to Rdio to create a playlist of your Shazamed tracks, or add tracks to any Rdio playlist • See song recommendations from others like you You can also use Shazam with TV: • Shazam your favorite TV shows for the cast, soundtracks, and more • Shazam ads to watch again, share with friends, or get special offers Want even more? • Go to shazam.com/myshazam to see your entire Shazam history; sign in to Facebook to get started • Check out News to discover great new videos, updates and more, from artists and TV shows you’ve Shazamed; plus see what your friends are Shazaming • Explore shows you what’s trending around the world and zoom in for local chart knowledge • Book concert tickets for artists you’ve Shazamed Use Shazam as much as you like – it’s unlimited. Don’t want the advertising – upgrade to Shazam Encore Lyrics and LyricPlay™ available: US, CA, UK, FR, IT, DE, ES, AU, NZ MIPS devices are not supported Why does Shazam need these app permissions? https://support.shazam.com/entries/29632198
release_text: Explore more: tap into the Charts tab and uncover a map of what’s being Shazamed near you and all around the world.

description: It's here! The alarm clock app with the voice of Touhou Project's Cirno the Ice Fairy!! It's "Touhou's Cirno the Ice Fairy Alarm"! A total of 30 perfectly recorded alarms to wake up to!! And as the voice of Cirno... You know her from "Cirno's Perfect Math Class"... The talented miko! Who knows? Maybe by waking up with this app you will become as smart as the genius Cirno?! This product was developed with the express consent of Team Shanghai Alice. Alarm example: 1.2.9! 1.2.9! I am not stupid! Those who call others stupid are stupid! Hey, aaall you dumb humans! Waaake uuup already! We really went all out with these recordings! You won't believe how many different lines we've recorded for you! Don't feel like getting up just yet? No worries, we can help! Just choose one of our many invigoratingly authoritative alarm voices. <3 Modes Available: Lovey-dovey Mode / Idiot Mode / Tsundere Mode> You can choose to be woken up by either the gentle Cirno or the tsundere Cirno. This is your chance to see a completely new side of her! But don't worry; everyone's favorite idiot Cirno is also here and doing just fine! Ha, ha, ha! Wake up to your favorite image of Cirno! In the Image Selection Mode you can browse the gallery for images of Cirno you want to set up for your "Alarm Screen," "Snooze 1 ~ 5 Screen" and "Awake Screen." Each image comes with 3 voice alarm patterns played at random. This app's voices are all Japanese. If you cannot understand in Japanese, you may not buy it.

Ruzzle Adventure is made by the creators of the world’s most popular word game, Ruzzle! Play hundreds of challenging word puzzles in an adventure that will take you to 3 different worlds and +150 levels. In every level there is a unique board with a different word challenge to solve. Swipe your finger across the game board and make words; with every word you will be able to crush stones, escape rising water and gain as many points as possible to achieve one, two or three stars! Longer words can give you more points and free boosters. On Ruzzle Adventure you can play alone at your own pace or you can do it with your friends: ask them for lives to make more words or compete for the highest score. What can you expect from Ruzzle Adventure? - Easy and fun to play, but a challenge to get all stars - Hundreds of mind boggling levels to keep you thinking - Boosters to help you with those challenging levels - Be fast or slow: the game speed is up to you - Leaderboards for you and your friends: who is the best coming up with words on Ruzzle Adventure? - Practice your words and vocabulary in 12 languages: English, French, German, Spanish, Italian, Danish, Norwegian, Dutch, Swedish, Brazilian Portuguese, Turkish and Russian We guarantee you'll have a great time and at the same time you'll practice your vocabulary and spelling-ability. Follow us on Facebook or Twitter to: - Get weekly tips and tricks on how to get better at Ruzzle Adventure - Let us know how to improve Ruzzle Adventure. Share your ideas! - Just say Hi! facebook.com/ruzzleadventure twitter.com/ruzzleadventure ruzzleadventure.com

The #1 Birdwatching App is here. "Birds Around Me" uses your GPS and Internet Connection to show you birds that have been spotted near you, by other bird enthusiasts, from a few hours to up to 30 days ago. Features: + Filter birds by distance, name or time of observation (eBird) + Enjoy close-up images and full descriptions (Wikipedia) + Listen to bird calls and sounds (Xeno-Canto) + Discover the best bird-spotting locations near you (Google Maps) * Over 10,000 birds from over 100 countries available * Over 100,000 bird sounds ** Please note that this a personal project I've been working on in my spare time. Some updates might take some time to roll out, but rest assured that I'm doing my possible to make this app as pleasant as possible. Please show your appreciation by rating the app and by sending me your comments/requests. :) **

Celebrate the Big Plays with the revolutionary Fantasy Football upgrade! Don’t waste time on player stats or “roster roulette”. Simply pick the Offense, Defense, and Special Teams unit you think will score the most Big Play Points each game day and compete for Global League domination! It’s quick, easy and everyone can play each week. Big Play Scoring gives you a NEW way to score just the plays that matter. Features Include: • Quick game day team unit selections • Patented Point Valuation System™ auto-scores every play • Create your own leagues and join Sponsored leagues FREE • Join anytime, even mid-season without penalty • Compete all season long for trophies and prizes • Efficiency and Frequency data gives you the selection edge • Get real-time scoring updates during the game which reflects team, unit, and individual efficiency and frequency performance How to Play 1. Select your Hybrid Team of Offense, Defense and Special Team unit each game day. 2. The patented Point Valuation System™ auto-scores every play in real-time. Earn Favorite Team and Booster Bonus Points each week. 3. Compete in the Global League or in your own private league against friends, family and football fans everywhere. About the Point Valuation System™ Patented set of independent, metrics-based “point values” for a predefined list of Certified Big Plays™ that recognize the meaningful, relevant and impactful plays on the field. As game play occurs, plays that meet Big Play Scoring™ certified criteria are awarded their point value: • Play values from 1 to 3 points • Positive and negative play values • Statistically defensible to the actual game final score (99.8% 2013 NFL Season) • Reflects team, unit, and individual efficiency and frequency performance

description: Trick your friends with this free "fake" X ray scanner! It is not a real xray scanner, it is just a prank app for fun. Tilt your phone over your hand and scroll the xray image. Stock Tracker provides you the simplest way to track your stocks in real time. You can create your own portfolio to keep track of the stock price, news and total gain/loss. All the major indexes such as Dow Jones, Nasdaq, SP 500 are available to track in real time. You can also keep track of stocks in Europe or Asia Pacific with Stock Tracker. This is a simple and fast tool to help you keep up with the latest updates in the stock market.

Darkness looms over the magical forest, and it’s up to you to protect it. Amass your own army of magical beasts and defend the ancient forest from evil forces that threaten to destroy it! Jump right into the battlefield in this refreshing twist to the tower defense genre and show them what you’re made of! A Captivating Epic Forest Defense tells the story of the Devout and his epic quest to defend the last Hamadryad and her ancient forest. Once a tranquil haven for beasts of all shapes and sizes, the Hamadryad’s Forest is on on the verge of destruction, systematically assaulted by enigmatic mechanical invaders called the Automata. Only the Devout stands in the way of complete annihilation. Not Your Average Tower Defense Game Forest Defense combines strategy and tower defense with real-time combat action, resulting in a game that is as intuitive as it is exciting - and free! You command the Devout, a being who serves the age-old nature spirit known only as the Hamadryad. Wave upon wave of Automata invaders are slashing and burning their way towards the Hamadryad, eager to devour her power. You must command the Devout in battle and summon the fiercest animals to aid you as you attempt to defend the forest against the relentless onslaught. Step into the Heart of the Battle with Forest Defense Build and lead an army of original and uniquely designed magical creatures. Gain experience and upgrade the Devout, his powers, and the forest’s creatures. Fight alongside your beast soldiers and repel the unrelenting Automata in massive battles of truly epic scale. Dodge the enemy’s attacks and devastate your opponents with the Devout’s melee and magical abilities. Build an Army Like You’ve Never seen Before Guided by you, the Devout will use the powers of Sun and Water to oppose the heartless Automata, but one defender - no matter how powerful - cannot succeed alone. Conscript, upgrade, and summon various ferocious beasts to aid you in your Forest Defense. These fantastical birds, mammals, reptiles, and mythical creatures will follow you on the battlefield in a last desperate attempt to defend their home. Challenging and Exhilarating Are you ready for the Forest Defense? Fight increasingly difficult levels of frenzied action to defeat the mechanical invaders. Remember to choose your soldiers wisely: the right creatures at the right moment could change the tide of battle. Forest Defense is an exhilarating tower defense game that challenges your strategic abilities and reflexes at the same time. ** Please note that while the app is free, please be aware that it contains paid content for real money that can be purchased upon users' wish to enhance their gaming experience.You may control in-app purchases made within this app using password protection which can be enabled from the setting page of the Google Play Store app. **
release_text: - Bug and crash fixes - Enhanced control system for Devout

description: Ngoài tính năng tìm kiếm bài hát theo tiêu đề, bạn có thể tìm theo mã bài hát và tên tác giả. Ứng dụng còn cho phép lưu lại bài hát vào danh sách yêu thích. Danh sách bài hát lấy từ bài hát Karaoke 5 số của Arirang (5xxxx), bài hát Tiếng Việt đã cập nhật đến VOL 54 và danh sách bài hát tiếng Anh. Cập nhật danh sách bài hát của đầu MusicCore (6xxxx) và cập nhật đến VOL 84 của đầu MusicCore. Hỗ trợ tìm kiếm thêm danh sách bài hát Karaoke 6 số của California, bài hát Tiếng Việt cập nhật VOL 17 và danh sách bài hát Tiếng Anh. Backup danh sách yêu thích online và đồng bộ danh sách này đến các thiết bị khác.

Preschool Books & Nursery Rhymes is a preschool learning app for the ages from Nursery rhymes to kindergarten. This app is very handy to entertain kids with rhymes & teach alphabets, numbers, colors, fruits etc. This application lists YouTube rhymes based on the language. English & few Indian language (Hindi, Telugu and Tamil) rhymes are available. This also includes fun based quiz for kids and alphabets handwriting. Text to speech features makes this app as an virtual teacher for kids learning / preschool education 1. Toddler Books with text to speech to teach Alphabets, Numbers, Colours, Shapes, Fruits, Animals, Vehicles, Planets, Months names, Days in a week etc. 2. Nursery Rhymes - English & Few Indian languages (Hindi, Tamil, Telugu) 3. fun based quiz in Alphabets, Numbers, Colours, Shapes, Fruits, Animals, Vehicles 4. Handwriting teaching - Lines, Alphabets, numbers, drawing. Very useful for kindergarten or Pre-K - Provides step by step alphabets & numbers writing with animation - Allows Parent / teacher to record and playback each letter to teach kids / students - Kids / Students can record the writing and Parent / teacher can verify the same 5. Memory Game

OneSimCard Connect allows you to make calls to a OneSimCard phone at no cost. All you need is an internet connection and you can call to a OneSimCard phone for FREE anywhere in the world. Calling to OneSimCard for free requires a simple activation of this feature by OneSimCard Customer you will be calling to. This is done from My SIM Cards menu of OneSimCard.com. The app also lets you send free SMS text messages to a OneSimCard phone. These SMS text messages are free not just for the sender, but also for the receiver! What's better than free?

This application is used to detect hazards on the road, such as speed cameras (mobile ambush, static speed cameras, red light cameras), speed bumps, bad roads and etc. The latest version supports all the countries of the world! The workflow of the application differs from the hardware radar detector. Hardware radar detector - is a passive receiver that does not block the signal to which it is set, but simply notify the driver of the presence in the field of the radar radio interference. This application works differently, it uses a database of hazards previously detected by other users. For example, if the application is informed about mobile ambush, it means that at this point can probably be mobile ambush. Any user can add new hazard to shared database. Also user can influence on rating of hazard (when user get danger alert he can define whether danger exists or not in fact). The application plays the sound and shows hazard on the map and distance to this hazard. If you are connected to the internet you will be able to monitor the traffic jams. There is a feature update the database of the hazards. The application may run in the background (even when the screen is off), just enable option "Use speech when hazard detected". To start monitoring hazards just press "On" button in the left bottom screen corner. ★★★ Features ★★★ ★ Night mode adjustment on screen ★ 3D tilt on map support (3D buildings) ★ Map auto zoom and rotation map along the way ★ Dashboard with current speed ★ 140 000 active hazards POIs around the world (check your country in FREE version of this APP at first) ★ Daily database updates! ★ Support voice alerts ★ Support of working in background or with other Navigation APPs ★ You can add their own POI to shared database
release_text: v.1.48 Fix with speed limit (miles per hour) on dashboard v.1.46. Speed unit mpH and kmH are supported. This window appears when application in monitoring mode and when you exit from main screen.

description: DON'T PAY up to 41 PENCE PER MINUTE to call FREEPHONE numbers! CALL THEM FOR FREE using your bundled minutes and start saving money today! The 0800 Wizard converts expensive 0800 numbers into local rate 03 numbers allowing you to use your bundled minutes for the calls instead. Calling an 03 number costs the same as calling an 01 or an 2 number and whilst the cost to call these is usually included in your monthly minutes, you will be charged at normal rates if you have no minutes left or are on PAYG. We've also updated it with an intercept feature (that you can toggle on and off from the settings menu) which means you can now dial freephone numbers DIRECTLY, using your phone's dialler. Your network wants you to pay extra to call 0800, 0808 and 0500 numbers. We don't. The 0800 Wizard enables you to AVOID THESE CHARGES by swapping the number you're dialling for one that can be used WITHIN YOUR BUNDLED MINUTES, an 03 (same as an 01 or 02) If you exceed your bundled contract minutes (or you are a PAYG customer) then the calls are simply charged at normal networks rates* You can't lose. So the 0800 Wizard App is truly magic! Just dial the 0800, 0808 or 0500 number in the 0800 Wizard (or your phone's dialler if you have the intercept feature turned on) and we'll wave our magic wand which routes the call via an 03 number - ABRACADABRA! Your call is connected. Follow @0800wizard on Twitter to keep up to date with changes and to provide feedback; alternatively, you can reach us at info@wizardapps.co.uk
release_text: Fixed issue where sometimes calls that should have been intercepted weren't being.

description: Att lära sig läsa kan vara en utmaning för både barnet och föräldrar. Som komplement och omväxling till den vanliga läxläsnings rutinerna kan man använda den här applikationen som är utvecklad att följa skolverkets riktlinjer för vilken kunskap man förväntar sig i årskurs ett. På PostIt lappen visas en mening eller en bild, och barnet har tre alternativ att välja mellan. Varje gång man svarar rätt så dyker en bit av en pingvin upp, och ju bättre barnet blir desto fler pingviner kan man hitta. Behöver man hjälp med frågan så trycker man på pingvinen, och en röst hjälper barnet med vad som finns på tavlan. Allt är på svenska. Spelet är enkelt och lätt att förstå samt kräver inget nätverk, vilket gör att man tex kan sitta i bilen och träna på att läsa. Spelet är för barn, och innehåller ingen reklam eller länkar till något som inte har något samband med applikationen. Spelets motor slumpar både svarsalternativen och frågorna, vilket gör att man inte kan memorera svaren, och spelet känns nytt varje gång man spelar. Titta gärna också på vår andra Lära Läsa App: Lära Läsa Årskurs 1 Alfabetet, eller på våra andra utbildnings-appar Learning to read can be a challenge for both the child and parents. Complementing and variety to the usual läxläsnings routines can use this application that is developed to follow the Ministry of Education's guidelines on what knowledge you would expect in year one. On PostIt note, a sentence or a photo, and the child has three options to choose from. Each time you answer correctly, so popping a bit of a penguin up, and the better the child gets, the more penguins can be found. If you need help with the issue press on the penguin, and a voice will help the child with what's on the board. Everything is in Swedish. The game is simple and easy to understand and requires no network, which means that for example can sit in your car and practice reading. The game is for children and contains no advertising or links to something that has no connection with the application. The game engine randomizing both answer choices and issues, which means that you can not memorize the answers, and the game feels new every time you play. Please look also at our second Learning Reading App: Teaching Reading Grade 1 Alphabet, or at our other educational apps
明報是一份香港報章，1959年創立，發展至今，成了一份讀者以知識份子為主的大報。 明報以提供可信的資訊為己任，自1996年以來，多次得到香港中文大學進行的讀者調查評為最具公信力的中文報章。 明報新聞App提供香港和兩岸的新聞消息、時評文章；還有旅遊飲食、健康美容等休閒資訊；大家可以一click即得。

description: Welcome to MOJO Outdoors Waterfowl Ops GPS Lite! You found a great Free app here and we are happy to introduce you to our Waterfowl Hunting solution from the leader in the sport, Mojo Outdooors! We created this free version so you can get a taste of what to expect from our Pro version. This is the Hunting App you have been looking for built by folks who know a thing or two about Waterfowl. We have provided a hand-held solution for navigating different terrains! Please see our Pro Version to see the total solution Mojo provides…Waterfowl Ops Pro. With the Lite Version you can hunt anywhere and record what really matters to you. Check out the list of features you get with this free tool. Here is what you get: MOJO Maps- We provide you with satellite maps for giving you a birds-eye view of the different areas you will be hunting. Nothing like seeing things as the ducks fly! MOJO Waterfowl Mapping- With our custom markings, you are one and done. We created a simple to use interface and the most popular GPS markings to make this super simple and so you can focus on the hunt instead a doing a bunch of annoying data entry. MOJO Weather - Stay in the know with accurate forecasts, lunar phase, barometer, marine conditions, and tidal forecast for knowing when you need to go to reach those shallow blind areas. MOJO Auto-Journal- Have you ever kept a journal or thought you would like to but it all seemed like so much work? Well good news! We took the work out of it by auto collecting all the important environmental data with the click of a camera or just simply tapping one of our GPS markings. It is all stores, organized and retrieved so you can easily learn behaviors and patterns for bringing home a limit every time! MOJO US Migratory Bird Regulations- Know when to go and what you legally harvest at a glance. Updated annually so you easily stay on top planning your vacation time! MOJO Sharing- Set up your hunting trips and invite your buddies then everyone shares a common Journal folder where everyone can share pictures, share harvest data and share all recorded GPS markings. We made it easy! MOJO Connect- We made it simple enjoy everything MOJO from connecting with us on Facebook, sharing this great tools with your friends, watching your favorite MOJO TV episodes and even shopping for all your Waterfowl gear! MOJO Support- We bring you a fully supported app product that helps you learn and connect whenever you have a problem. Reach out to us anytime and we will respond quickly. Your total experience with MOJO is going to blow you away! There is so much in this app to help you in the field. We even provided a flashlight and the camo mirror for making it easy to apply the war paint! Mojo’s Waterfowl Ops Lite is, well FREE! So get it right now!

Redneck Hunter The most exciting animal hunter available! Amazing HD graphics, optimized performance, advanced animations and addictive gameplay. Drive a car to smash animals and hunt them with awesome weapons like: - Tomahawk - Bazooka - Molotov Cocktail - Desert Eagle - Shotgun Avoid the strong bears, kill the weak animals to gain points! Collect gasoline and find optimal routes. Let's see how long you can survive. GAME You have to kill as many animals as possible. The bears will get stronger and faster with the time so you have to avoid them or kill them quickly. You have to collect the gasoline on the map to keep the car going. QUALITY SETTINGS The game will automatically detect which quality settings to apply for your device, but you can change them in the settings menu. SIMPLE CONTROLS To use a weapon - tap on the screen. By default, you will use gyroscope to steer a car, but you can change it to buttons in settings menu. Use gas and brake pedal to control the speed. Good Luck!

It's more addicting than Tic Tac Toe and more fun than Sudoku! It's a completely unique puzzle game! Can you get Blackjack 21 in every row and column? Sounds easy but these puzzles get pretty difficult! If you like Tic Tac Toe, Sudoku, or card games then you will love the challenging puzzles in Tic Tac Blackjack. Let us know if you can solve them all and we'll add more!

description: Easy Bankroll is a complete Bankroll tracking app. Use Easy Bankroll as a casino bankroll tracking application to manage wins and loses. Learn which games, sub games, locations and venues you win at and which you tend to lose. Manage your casino money, remember your stats. Easy Bankroll has the ability to remember what you forget. After a long weekend gambling, allow Easy Bankroll to flaunt your winnings, or shame your loss. Custom Sessions, Session Listings, and Admin Panel. Track your poker bankroll also, add locations, and game types. Customize to get a detailed history of wins/losses. Casino tracking will allow you to gain a glimpse into the way a casino tracks it's players. Allow you to have detailed info about your play tendencies and a history of your biggest wins. NEW: * Trips COMING SOON: * Exportable Reports, for year end tax information * Multiple language and multiple currency support (Email your desired language and currency to get at the top of the list) * Quick Session Add E-Mail support with any issues, questions, or feature requests.

description: In der kostenlosen Kalorientabelle App findest du die Kalorien von über 1.000 Lebensmitteln des täglichen Bedarfs - sortiert in über 50 Kategorien. Alle Lebensmittel und Getränke in der Kalorientabelle werden zudem nach dem Prinzip der Kaloriendichte bewertet. Nahrungsmittel mit einer hohen Kaloriendichte bestehen häufiger zu einem großen Anteil aus Zucker oder Fett und sollten daher vermieden werden. Besser sind Nahrungsmittel mit einer geringen Kaloriendichte. Solche Lebensmittel (vor allem Obst und Gemüse) enthalten viel Wasser und weniger Kalorien. In der App findest du jeweils eine Kalorientabelle für die Kategorie: - Backwaren - Backzutaten - Bier - Bohnen & Erbsen - Brot - Brotaufstrich - Brötchen - Butter - Eis - Exotische Früchte - Fast Food - Fisch - Frischkäse - Geflügel - Gerichte - Getränke (alkoholfrei) - Getränke (alkoholisch) - Getreideprodukte - Innereien - Joghurt - Kartoffelprodukte - Käse - Kräuter & Gewürze - Kuchen & Torten - Milchprodukte - Müsli & Cornflakes - Nudeln & Teigwaren - Nüsse & Samen - Obst - Obstkonserven - Pflanzenöle - Pizza - Rindfleisch - Saft - Schnittkäse - Schweinefleisch - Softdrinks - Saucen & Dressings - Suppen - Süßigkeiten - Wein - Wildfleisch - Wurst - Wurstaufschnitt Bitte beachte, dass du für die App immer eine aktive Internetverbindung oder W-Lan benötigst, die Listen an Lebensmittel online gespeichert und ständig aktualisiert, verbessert und erweitert werden. In the free calorie chart app you can find the calories in excess of 1,000 everyday foods - sorted into 50 categories All food and beverage calories in the table are also rated according to the principle of caloric density.. Foods with a high caloric density often consist to a large proportion of sugar or fat and should be avoided. Better are foods with a low caloric density. Such foods (especially fruits and vegetables) contain a lot of water and fewer calories. In the app you can find one calorie table for the category: - Baked Goods - Baking Ingredients - Beer - Beans & Peas - Bread - Spreads - Bun - Butter - Ice - Exotic Fruits - Fast Food - Fish - Cream cheese - Poultry - Courts - Drinks (non-alcoholic) - Beverages (alcoholic) - Grain Products - Innards - Yogurt - Potato products - Cheese - Herbs and spices - Cakes & Pies - Dairy products - Cereal - Noodles & Pasta - Nuts & Seeds - Fruits - Canned fruit - Vegetable oils - Pizza - Beef - Juice - Cheese - Pork - Soft drinks - Sauces & Dressings - Soups - Candy - Wine - Game meat - Sausage - Sausages Please note that you always have an active Internet connection or Wi-Fi need for the app that lists stored on groceries online and constantly updated, improved and expanded.

Mahjong Match has a well designed interface which enables you to zoom in and zoom out Mahjong tiles! You are able to see all of the tiles very easily so that matching tiles becomes more efficiently! New interface and new joy. If you like playing match games, Mahjong Match is absolutely not to miss!

These sight words apps are for the Dolch word lists, which are the 220 most common words in children's reading books. Dolch words, or sight words, provide a great base for reading at an early age. This app includes Sight Words Flash Cards, Sight Words Sentences and Sight Words Stories. Now kids can go from learning the words to using them in sentences and stories. Sight words include: Preschool, Kindergarten, 1st Grade, 2nd Grade and 3rd Grade. + All Sight Words Apps In 1 + Includes Sight Words Flash Cards, Sight Words Sentences and Sight Words Stories + Simple Interface For Kids + Preschool To 3rd Grade Word Sets

description: The free ABC app for Android smartphones offers you independent content, whenever and wherever you want it. Watch the live stream of ABC News 24 or listen to a great selection of ABC Radio streams and podcasts while reading the latest news stories from the Australian Broadcasting Corporation. Following your feedback, our FREE flagship apps have been through a major overhaul and are better than ever. Stories are now enriched with audio and video and you can set your device to wake up with the ABC, selecting one of your preferred ABC TV or Radio programs. ALL NEW NAVIGATION Page turn or open the drawer menu to explore the latest News, TV and Radio content produced by the ABC team. BREAKING NEWS ALERTS Get an alert as breaking news happens. These connect you to all the information of the event as it unfolds. WAKE UP WITH THE ABC Start the day well informed. Set the alarm within the app to wake up to your choice of ABC News in 90 Seconds, ABC News 24, selected ABC Radio podcasts or any of our live radio streams. MORE CONTENT You can now play related audio and video on article pages or choose from a selection of 80+ podcasts and live streams of Radio and TV. MORE CONTEXT Are you into Science or Music news? Find related ABC TV and Radio shows as you browse each topic; Check the weather and stories that are relevant to your location (Yes! ABC Local News is now available). MORE CONTROL Pull down category pages to refresh content and ensure you have the latest available from ABC Online; Set your app to only play media files over WiFi and take better control of your data consumption. Tips to help you keep tabs of your data consumption: # ABC News 24 can use up to 300MB of data per hour. # Live radio streams can consume up to 40 MB per hour. *** Note that you are responsible for the data transfer and consumption charges incurred by you when using any ABC app. The ABC disclaims all liability for such charges ***

description: Synchronize your contacts and events between your Android device and Mozilla Thunderbird, Lightning and Sunbird on your PC. Keep your information up to date automatically: every modification on any device is automatically transferred to the other device. Keep your data private: your personal data is not stored in the cloud. It is directly synchronized between your device and your desktop computer through a secure connection and never goes through any third-party server. BirdieSync supports: contact photos, multiple address books and calendars, contact groups and categories, recurring events and alarms, ICS, calDAV, WCAP, Google Calendar types. Note: this app requires BirdieSync on your PC (19.95 €). You can download a fully-functional version and try it out free for 21 days (only Windows is supported). Please go to BirdieSync web site for more information: http://www.birdiesync.com
release_text: - BirdieSync could consider two different Android devices as the same device - Android device with dual SIM, could be considered as two different devices - An event attendee with an incorrect participation status or role could stop the whole synchronization - Yearly events synchronized from the Android device could have an incorrect date - In BirdieSync account, if postal address had separated fields in Android Contact app, fields were not properly synchronized to Thunderbird

description: This small app is full of information on the planets in our solar system. It is simple and easy to use, but full of details about each planet. If you want to know information from how many moon's to how much gravity then this is the app for you. Please rate.

Descended from the white stallion of Mars and the rogue black filly Ahaha, herds of wild quantum horses roam the solar wind, living many histories simultaneously. Humans cannot touch them--that would either reduce the horse to a single time-line or split the human among many--but the horses respond to signals flashed at them. They can be trained, and they love to race. No horse has yet beaten the white stallion of Mars in a race across the eight planets of the Solar System. Can you find such a champion? There are countless horses to choose from, and you can create still more with a careful breeding program. Training is the key to making your chosen horse a winner. Many horses show blazing speed on some planets, but you may have to explore many strategies before you get your horse to reveal its top speed on all of the planets. If your horse can win races on all eight planets without suffering a defeat, it will be ready for the grueling match race with the white stallion of Mars. You will need to master additional strategies, including optimal use of the entangling effect, in order to win this final race. If you should ever sell one of your old champions to make room for a new one, you will face your former horse in the match race as well.

IZI CARRIS - TEMPO DE ESPERA EM REAL TIME Saiba quanto tempo falta para chegar o próximo veículo da Carris à sua paragem. Assim, pode aproveitar todos os minutos até à chegada do seu autocarro. Siga-nos em: http://www.facebook.com/izicarris ou envie-nos a sua opinião para: info@izimoove.com Para obter os melhores resultados, actualize sempre a aplicação para a versão mais recente. Escolha a sua paragem, em qualquer ponto de Lisboa, e visualize, na própria aplicação, os tempos de espera dos próximos autocarros da Carris. Para saber o tempo de espera na última paragem que consultou, poderá simplesmente carregar no botão “Tempo de Espera”. Caso, queira saber o tempo de espera de outra paragem, poderá recorrer: • às paragens favoritas ou recentemente utilizadas • à sua carreira e, consultando o seu percurso, escolher a paragem que lhe interessa (pode inverter o sentido da carreira) • ao nome, localização ou código SIP da paragem (tal como indicado na placa afixada em cada paragem) Todos os dados apresentados na aplicação são fornecidos pela Carris, através do SAEIP (Sistema de Ajuda à Exploração e Informação aos Passageiros), que funciona em tempo real, com recurso aos equipamentos GPS instalados em cada veículo. A informação que é apresentada na aplicação IZI CARRIS é a mesma que consta de cada um dos painéis instalados em muitas das paragens da Carris em Lisboa. A IZIMOOVE, empresa que desenvolveu a aplicação IZI CARRIS, não se responsabiliza pelo não cumprimento dos tempos de espera apresentados. A utilização da plataforma é totalmente gratuita. O único custo associado à utilização da aplicação poderá ser o do acesso à internet, caso não seja feita através de uma ligação WI-FI. A IZIMOOVE teve particular preocupação em minimizar a quantidade de tráfego necessária à obtenção dos tempos de espera. O tempo de espera é atualizado automaticamente por dedução do tempo decorrido desde a última consulta. Para obter um novo tempo de espera da Carris, é necessário carregar no botão “atualizar”. Só neste caso existe um novo acesso à internet. Para maior fiabilidade da informação apresentada, aconselha-se que seja feita uma atualização de dados a cada 5 minutos. Para além dos tempos de espera em real time, a aplicação IZI CARRIS disponibiliza outra informação em modo offline, como: • Percurso de todas as carreiras dos autocarros da Carris • Todas as carreiras de autocarros que passam numa paragem • Todas as paragens, pesquisáveis pelo nome, localização ou código SIP • Principais contactos da Carris • informação tarifária (link externo) O IZI CARRIS é um serviço inovador desenvolvido pela IZIMOOVE que disponibiliza, em real time, o tempo de espera dos autocarros da Carris. Toda a informação apresentada na aplicação é fornecida pelo SAEIP da Carris. A aplicação IZI CARRIS acede à Internet para obter os tempos de espera em tempo real. A IZIMOOVE não recolhe, nem utiliza qualquer informação privada dos seus utilizadores. Keywords: Carris, Tempo, Espera, Real, time, BUS, Autocarro, Paragem, Lisboa, IZI, Easy IZI RAIL - TIMEOUT IN REAL TIME Learn how long to get the next vehicle Carris his arrest. So you can enjoy every minute until the arrival of their bus. Follow us on: http://www.facebook.com/izicarris or send us your feedback to: info@izimoove.com For best results, always update the application to the latest version. Choose your stop at any point of Lisbon, and view, the application itself, the waiting times for the next buses Carris. To know the waiting time at the last stop which polled, you can simply press the "Timeout". If, you want to know the wait time for another stop, you can use: • stops to favorite or recently used • his career, and consulting your route, choose to stop that interests you (can reverse the direction of career) • the name, location, or stop the SIP code (as shown on the nameplate affixed at each stop) All data presented in the application are provided by Carris through SAEIP (Help System Exploitation and Passenger Information), which works in real time, using the GPS equipment installed in each vehicle. The information is presented in the application is the same IZI CARRIS contained in each of the panels installed at many stations on the rails in Lisbon. The IZIMOOVE, the company that developed the application IZI CARRIS not responsible for breaches of waiting times presented. The use of the platform is completely free. The only cost associated with the use of the application can be access to the internet, if not made via a Wi-Fi connection. The IZIMOOVE had particular concern to minimize the amount of traffic necessary to obtain waiting times. The waiting time is updated automatically by deducting the elapsed time since the last visit. For a new waiting time Carris, you must press the "update" button. Only in this case there is a new internet access. For increased reliability of the information provided, it is advisable that we make a data refresh every 5 minutes. Apart from waiting times in real time, the application provides IZI CARRIS other information offline as: • Route all buses careers Carris • All bus routes that pass a stop • All stops, searchable by name, location or SIP code • Key contacts Carris • tariff information (external link) The IZI CARRIS is an innovative service developed by IZIMOOVE which provides, in real time, the waiting time for buses Carris. All information submitted in the application is provided by SAEIP Carris. The application accesses the Internet IZI CARRIS for waiting times in real time. The IZIMOOVE not collect or use any private information of its users. Keywords: Carris, Time, Wait, Real, time, bus, bus, stop, Lisbon, IZI, Easy

After the breathtaking success of the Wines and Vintages on iOS with more than 100.000 downloads, we present you the new World Edition! - World Edition with information about the wine regions of the 12 most prestigious wine producers countries: Argentina, Australia, Austria, Chile, France, Germany, Italy, New Zealand, Portugal, Spain, South Africa and US. - Detailed Vintages from 1990 until 2010 with more than 2,000 vintages carefully qualified. - 100% reliable and contrasted information, drawn from the most prestigious lists, professionals from different countries and the results of our oenology club. - Improved interface with new features for the user. Easier and more useful. Wines and Vintages World Edition has already been positioned as an essential guide to learn the vintage qualification from different regions of countries all over the world, with reliable and contrasted information. Are you having a meal with some friends and you have to choose the wine? Do you have a meal with your boss and you have to make a good impression with it? And, of course, enjoy a good glass of wine!

PEN Window Manager allows you to add more apps to the Pen Window drawer of Samsung's Galaxy NOTE 3 phones and any Samsung device that has the Pen Window feature built-in or ported. It requires that you have a ROOTED phone or device and an undamaged CSC feature.xml or others.xml file. Enabling/disabling apps for Pen Window requires a restart of the device. Check out the Pen Window Launcher as an addon/pugin for Pen Window Manager that allows you to open the Pen Window drawer without using the Spen. description: Saddle up and defend the town of Willow Creek from nefarious outlaws and city slickers! It all starts when a rancher's daughter goes missing, and it ends at the showdown at Willow Creek, where greed, lust, science and Mother Nature will face off at high noon. Showdown at Willow Creek is an interactive western mystery novel where your choices control the story. The game is entirely text-based--without graphics or sound effects--but powered by the vast, unstoppable power of your imagination. Gamble, seduce, brawl, or shoot your way through Willow Creek, where gunslingers make the laws, and everybody has secrets. Will you romance the gambler or the soiled dove (or both)? Will you side with the scientists bringing electricity to the Old West, or with a tribe of native American Utes? Will you unravel the conspiracy that threatens to tear the town apart, or will you light the fuse to blow it all sky high?

My Menstrual Diary Pro is a detailed extension of My Menstrual Diary. It is useful if you want to record your menstrual cycles more thoroughly or if you have problems with your periods. Not only does it help you monitor your periods, calculate the time of ovulation and your fertile period, it also helps you record abnormal bleeding, painful periods and other symptoms as well. It may not be necessary if you have normal regular periods. The app. is designed for Android. A lot of thought has gone into the process of making this app. useful to record details of your cycle. The app. has also many unique features which can be applied with the help of Android. The Features: 1. You will be able to record your periods in the calendar. You can record whether you have spotting, light, moderate or heavy flow. 2. You will be able to record abnormal bleeding, e.g. bleeding between your periods (inter-menstrual bleeding) or bleeding after sexual intercourse (post-coital bleeding). 3. Pain during your periods or in between your periods can also be recorded, whether it is mild, moderate or severe pain. So can pain during sexual intercourse. 4. Other symptoms and moods can be recorded as well. 5. You will be able to make notes of any symptoms on a particular day if necessary. 6. Your next period will be highlighted based on the average interval of the last 3 periods. 7. The date of ovulation and your fertile period for the month will be displayed so you can take the necessary action. 8. All the previous periods, the durations and the intervals will be displayed in the History Window. 9. There is a brief description on what is a normal period, an abnormal period, how the calculation of the ovulation date is made and hence the fertile period. See the Notes Window. 10. You can set a number of alerts: - Alerting you from 3 days before your possible next period. - Alerting you of the fertile period. 11. This app is password protected. 12. You can e-mail your records to your doctor if necessary. Please note that some of the applications in this app are based on the assumption that your periods are fairly regular. The date of your next period and the fertile period will not be accurate if you have very irregular periods. My Menstrual Diary Pro is a very useful app. to monitor your periods in detail. It provides valuable information. However, it is not a substitute for professional medical advice.

Send animated emoticons even with sounds!, encrypted text and other emoticons with your favourte chat app!! If you activated the keyboard: 1)Open your chat app, type !ws and select "Animated Smileys Keyboard", writte your message if you want and send it! 2)To send encrypted text, choose they option "send encrypted text" in the Animated Smileys Keyboard, put your message and set the password. Encrypted message will be copied to clipboard, now paste it in your chat and send it! If you did not activated the keyboard: 1)Open your chat app, open a chat with your friend, a floating icon will appear in top right corner of the screen. Touch it and choose your emoticon or the option to send encrypted text. Encrypted text and emoticons will be copied to clipboard, now just paste it in chat and send! To read an encrypted text just tap the message!! -Explanation: *Animated emotes will not be shown in chat, they will open in top of your chat in a floating invisible window (in chat you will see a command like "!ws12;". *Android version 4.0 or higher will automatically show animated emoticons, lower Android versions will have to tap the message to see the animation.

Download Baird & Warner's app and discover a variety of different search options and filters, making it easier than ever to search for homes on-the-go in Chicagoland. _______ Version 3 has arrived! We reviewed your feedback and vigorously tested to come up with our best release to date. We improved our back-end system to make searching for your next dream home easier and faster than ever. Next, we simplified our design and created a layout optimized for your home searching experience. Upgrades to the new version includes: Map Pins: Consistent with the new web map search, we color coded the map pins based on property status. Map Callout: Redesigned this to highlight property photos and maintain consistency with our list view. POI Data: Added in the ability to see places of interest while you search for your next home. List View: Updated the look of our list view page to highlight property photos. We also added the ability to lazy load property results as the users scrolls down the list. Property Details: Redesigned this page to achieve a cleaner look including a reorganization of the property’s features. Help Menu: Created a more descriptive and fluent help menu for our apps. We have also added helpful suggestions within the app as the user navigates around. Account/Menu: Restructured this section to focus more on the user’s account information. This set up will allow us to easily add and upgrade features with future updates. Agent Branding: It is easier than ever to brand the app to your favorite agent.

Goodnight noises everywhere... 65 years ago, Margaret Wise Brown and Clement Hurd created one of the most beloved bedtime books of all time. Now, the best-selling children’s classic Goodnight Moon has been beautifully re-imagined as an interactive app designed for your smartphone and tablet. Children, parents and fans of this charming storybook will be delighted by the crackling fire, soothing piano music and sing-song narration as they help the little bunny say goodnight to all the lovely familiar things in the “great green room”. With a touch, swipe or tilt of the screen little fingers send the cow jumping over the moon and make the three little bears chatter and laugh in their chairs. Find and follow the tiny mouse playing hide and seek and discover hidden surprises on every page. Empty the bowl of mush, make the mittens wave good-bye and hear the old woman whispering hush while shooting stars, purring kittens and slowly fading light help your own little bunnies drift off to sleep. App Features: • Optimized for Nexus 4, 7, 10 and Widescreen Devices • Goodnight Moon features over two hundred touchable objects, animations and hidden interactions to discover. • Drag and pop your favorite toys off the page. • Personalize your copy of Goodnight Moon with additional photobooth, printing and sticker book features. • This book belongs to... Write your name in the book to make it yours. • Magnify the original illustrations and discover hidden objects in our unique Spyglass Dream mode. • Jump to any page in the book with our handy table of contents • Hear individual words spoken with the tap of a finger. Educational features including word-highlighting, touchable words and professional narration improve and encourage young readers. • Enjoy the book read with calm and captivating narration, set to a charming piano soundtrack. Or, read the book in Read Myself and Autoplay modes. Also available within Goodnight Moon, are Goodnight Moon ABC: An Alphabet Book and Goodnight Moon 123: A Counting Book. These interactive, educational apps feature innovative letter and number tracing technology, counting and word guessing games, and great interactivity that will keep your children engaged while they’re learning their letters and numbers!

ZipCash is the simplest way to move money! Use the brand new ZipCash App to pay your friends, family as well as your local merchants using your ZipCash Wallet in a few easy clicks. Just add them to your buddy list, enter the amount and you are done. The best part is that they don't even have to be an existing ZipCash account holder. Just send them the money and we will create a secure account for them on the fly. It's that simple! ZipCash to ZipCash Wallet transactions are FREE & INSTANT. If you would like to cash out the money to any Bank Account, there is a nominal fee of 1% Cash out happens overnight. Receiving money is always FREE on ZipCash. To begin with, you will need to have some balance in your ZipCash Wallet. You can fund your account using any credit/ debit card or netbanking. You can even choose to get a ZipCash scratch card delivered to your home and pay via Cash-on-delivery. You can also use the ZipCash Wallet to top up your talktime, pay your bills or recharge your DTH. You can also use the balance in your ZipCash Wallet to shop on leading websites such as eBay, Bookmyshow & Homeshop18. Important: ZipCash is an RBI authorised payment entity. ZipCash follows industry standard security systems & processes and data encryption to protect you and prevent against any unauthorized transactions or access to your personal or financial information. Simply put, your money is safe with us :)
release_text: Includes the brand new 'Reload ZipCash' feature that now enables you to reload your zipcash wallet 'On the Go'. You can Reload your Wallet using 'Debit Card', 'Credit Card' as well as 'Net Banking'. Includes a few other design changes and bug fixes.

description: ★ ROOT ACCESS, BUSYBOX REQUIRED ★ NOTE: Important ICS update coming next week. Google fundamentally changed the way apps store cache. Hang tight and hold back the 1-star ratings until then. :-) UPDATE: Internet permission for ads only. No tinfoil hats allowed here. If you don't know what root access is, please do not download this app. The original and best cache cleaning app for Android. CacheMate cleans more cache than any other cache clearing app, guaranteed! Looking to open-source CacheMate. See details below. ☆ Clear cache from ALL apps with one click! ☆ Auto-Clear - Schedule when caches are cleared. Choose from every hour, three hours, six hours, twelve hours, daily or every two days. ☆ PowerClear - Sweeps through your system and gets common cache from all apps. ☆ Clear some Data - An experimental feature that clears both unnecessary data and data that you may not want on your system at all times. ☆ Clear cache from SD card - Clears caches from your SD card freeing up precious space without having to browse through each folder. ☆ Cache select - Select which caches to clear. This is a free version. The full version adds more caches, data, a one-touch widget and removes ads. Help information is available within the app and on my web site. Please read the extensive help file before emailing. I'll be glad to answer your email but would rather not respond to questions already addressed in the help file. Visit me on Twitter at @BrooklynAvi or on the web at http://www.mibapps.com/ .
release_text: 2.4.1 * Support for large-screen devices * ICS support * PowerClear is now the standard action for CacheMate and cannot be turned off * Removed redundant cache cleaning for caches cleared by PowerClear since PowerClear is now the standard CacheMate action * Cache clearing process is now faster * Turned off most cache by default. Enable individually in settings * AdMob & Google Analytics data cleared by default * Flash cache cleared by default * Redesigned clear button * New web site: mibapps.com

Diary is a simple application which lets you write daily thoughts/ideas/memories with a simple user interface. Make your memories more memorable by attaching photos, videos and music. Swipe through the pages for quick navigation between dates. Searching through your entries is faster than ever using the search button. The auto-save feature saves your entries as you type without the hassle of another save button. Product Features : 1. Simple to use 2. Password protected 3. Date-wise display of pages 4. Swipe to navigate between pages 5. Export to PDF (Currently supports English only) 6. Attach Photos 7. Take picture from Camera and attach 8. Attach videos 9. Record your own videos from Camera and attach 10. Attach sounds/music 11. Record voice and attach (*If there is a default voice recorder app on your phone) 12. Auto save 13. Quick search 14. List all entries 15. Themes 16. Backup & Restore 17. Go to a Date (Tap on Page header to jump to a Date) 18. Fonts 19. Free hand drawing Note: If you are already using the free version of the app, then please update the free app to the version 1.8 or above and then use the "Backup & Restore" feature to move all your entries to the paid version. i.e, Using "Backup & Restore" from the free version back-up your data and using the same feature from the paid version restore your data.
release_text: Version 3.4 Convert complete Diary to a PDF. Version 3.3 Minor bug fixes. Version 3.1 * New application icon * New icons in the application * Revamped user interface *Version 3.0 Fixed the issue with saving the drawings.

description: Officially licensed Georgia Bulldogs Revolving Wallpaper app, with the background image automatically rotating between 10 different Georgia wallpapers. While playing the game, the kids could improve their understanding of the world, identify various transportation tools and improve pronunciation. Your kid can learn dozens of different transportation tools. 2. Two levels (4 blocks, 8 blocks) . Suitable for kids of different ages ... 3. Easy and simple game-flow. Female voices from various languages to improve kid's pronunciation. 6. Support super high resolution monitors. compatible to various display screen sizes and resolutions. description: "OK, so everyone can fold paper in half. What’s so exciting about that?" you may say. But you’ll soon think differently when you learn more about the art of origami. Remember making paper airplanes at school? And remember how someone, instead of an airplane, made a flower, a jumping frog, or a parrot? That was like magic. And they only had their two hands and a plain piece of paper. How did they do it? We’ll show you how. The "How to Make Origami" app is simple and easy to use. Follow the step-by-step instructions and watch the 3D animation carefully. And don’t worry, you’d have to try really hard to get confused. "Hey, that point shouldn’t be sticking out like that!" Something went wrong? That’s because even an airplane requires concentration and patience. Let this tranquil pastime completely absorb you, and your complete relaxation is guaranteed. You know, those wise Japanese invented a great thing. By the way, origami develops logical reasoning, attention span, spatial thinking and fine motor skills. Consider that when you’re trying to keep fidgety kids busy. Download for free over 70 traditional origami patterns for our app. Origami is the ancient Japanese art of paper folding. Origami has become increasingly popular in Japan and the rest of the world. Many people enjoy the challenge of learning to fold traditional and non-traditional origami creations. This application will help you to get started. Try making an origami piece yourself. How to Make Origami explains how to make well-known origami figures that people have been making for a long time. Our instructions are clear and simple, with actual 3D-animation of the folding process to help you along. The most famous are - Crane - Dinosaur - Flower - Duck - Rose - Lily - Jumping frog - Pigeon - Rabbit Fold quietly, or your boss may notice!

Lazers in Space is a homage to Space Invaders with 16 different enemy types, 3 bosses, and an infinite wave system. Collect power ups from fallen enemies and blocks to help rebuild your defenses. See how long you can last against a new breed of invaders and compete with friends for the highest score. This project was made by the SEED 9 group at The University of Texas in Arlington, Summer 2014. SEED 9 is a 2 week intense workshop where high school students are selected from around the area to collaborate on a major project. Students: Aaron Baggett Yuliana Beltran Frederick Gorski Sarah James Marco Paramo Omar Piedra Michelle Resendiz Miguel Reyes Osvaldo Rosas Project Leads: Joshua Wilson Houston Hardaway

description: Paratrooper is a simple but fast-paced and addictive game of ability for all ages. Just tilt your device or touch screen (depends on selected option) to control the paratrooper and fall down through the targets to score points. You get more points through the center of the targets. Paratrooper has several game modes, each with its initial difficulty. Ranking: There is a list of the best scores for each game mode. In Survive and Max Score modes scores can be uploaded from the first result. In modes Easy, Intermediate and Advanced you get total scoce to upload to Ranking when you complete all game levels. Total score is the sum of every level score. You can replay any level to get a better score and improve the total score. If you want to help translate PAratrooper to your language, contact the author: cerezosoft@gmail.com

This application can help you measure the ODOMETER, TRIPMETER, and DISTANCE while you are moving. *TRIPMETER : It is a value that indicates distance traveled by a vehicle, such as a bicycle or automobile. *ODOMETER (ODOGRAPH) : It is a value that indicates cumulative summation distance traveled by a vehicle, such as a bicycle or automobile. *DISTANCE METER : the distance between two points(places) It is a distance calculator which uses GPS system. So you will need an active GPS connection for the app work. You can use this app with bike smartphone holder, golf distance measurement tool and anything else. Meter(m), Kilometers(km), Yard(yd), Feet(ft), miles(mi) and Nautical mile(nm) are supported in this app. How to use touch "play button" to start recording, and then It will run in background service. touch "stop button" to stop recording, and then It will exit background service. NOTE: Due to phone GPS limitation, It may not work well in cloudy weather or indoor places. And I don't guarantee that it shows accurate data because of your GPS errors.

description: jukuNx will allow you to effortlessly study for all levels of the Japanese JLPT exams. Be sure to keep up to date at; http://www.facebook.com/jukunx Contained are all the vocab entries required for all levels. For each entry displayed is the kanji / vocabulary, its reading and one or more meanings. Entries can be marked so that you can concentrate on the vocab that you have yet to learn. See more below about this. Japanese language tests are now conducted twice a year in most countries and so any time is a good time to start studying for the JLPT exams. All Japanese Exam vocab for each of the JLPT levels is included along with the Kanji, the Kanji readings and the Japanese word meanings as well. The Kanji lists, as the children in Japan learn them, are now available for levels 1-6. Will be getting onto levels 7-9 soon. ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- For each level the vocabulary can be viewed in two modes. * List Mode will show all entries for the selected level. Upon selecting a row the entry will be expanded to display the reading and meanings * Entry Mode will show all entries for the selected level starting with entries that are marked as being UnRead. Upon selecting a row the entry will be displayed in another screen. From here you will be able to navigate through the entries in order along with being able to tag the entries with a study status. Entries can be marked as UnRead, Read, Review and Learnt. ------------------------------
release_text: Simple maintenance release to fix up some minor issues as identified by the user community. *** The following features are being worked on and shall be released as time permits; - partial set for vocabulary for Level 2 Vocab Quiz - for each of the JLPT levels the ability to mark an entry as read and also the ability to clear read entries

description: Let your friends select the music that plays on your Android device! Plug your phone into a stereo and let friends pick the tunes via XBMC/Kodi remotes on their phones (Android, iPhone, etc) Features: * Includes HTTP, JSON and event servers * Supports multiple simultaneous connections * Thumbnails * Reads ID3 tags * Password (in paid version) * Tested with the top 3 XBMC remotes in the Android market * Builds a playlist of the songs you play * Supports most database commands * Supports nearly all JSON commands * Will find multiple "music" folders - eg on internal and external storage. Limitations: - Only music and cover art (No images or video). - Does many XBMC commands but not all (no playlists, queuing) - This is the free version... has ads This the free version: has ads, does not support password. I see some folks are asking about the GPL in the comments. This app is all code I made myself. It contains no code from the XBMC project or elsewhere. Its based on the online XBMC docs and experimentation. I mailed the gentleman from the XBMC project who left the comment. Try it in the dashboard Android device.

description: The My Wallet app shows you everything you want to see in order to understand where you’ve been spending your money and where you need to save in order to maintain your financial well-being. To begin, you create accounts in the app for bank accounts, credit cards and cash, and then enter transactions for your income and purchases. Categories and subcategories help you see your spending in details and discover problem areas. The application provides various reports to look at different aspects of your financial life. You can, for example, see the list or pie chart that shows how much money’s going to food, gasoline, clothing and other categories, or how much you’ve spend in a specific category in the last week or month. In addition, My Wallet has options to export your finances to file and also lets you password protect access. The main functions: - Create wallets, currencies, groups and subgroups with the addition of icons. - View the finance report daily, weekly, monthly and yearly. - Synchronization with cloud. - View the finance report on losses and parishes by groups, currencies and wallets for the selected period. - View a finance pie chart of losses and parishes by groups for the selected period. - Import and export database to a file. - Set a password for entrance into the program. - Change the theme of application, time and date formats. - Update the exchange rate from the server. - View the total bill for a selected currency. - Quickly adding operation or transfer through the widget. - Use many filters of operations on different parameters. - Export to Excel and XML. We will be glad if you write us with your suggestions and comments. Thank you!

description: Inspired by UBUNTU (Unity) and MATERIAL DESIGN (HERA) in the new upcoming version of Android 5.0 (Android L). This theme takes the best of both worlds and combines into one awesome and completely usable theme !!! Important: This theme will NOT work on CM12 or any Lollipop ROM. The theme requires your device to be rooted with the latest Cyanogenmod 11 theme chooser. Also works on PA 4.4, Mahdi and other KitKat based roms with the CM11 theme engine. To get best results reboot after applying. Looks best on xhdpi and xxhdpi devices. Please understand that the theme is not intended to directly copy Ubuntu touch or android L design, instead it focuses on usability and giving users a nice experience. FEATURES: -Ubuntu homescreen wallpaper -Blue ubuntu touch lockscreen wallpaper -Android L system icons -Non Intrusive UI themed deeply in the UI -Flat design language -Awesome AOSP/Google keyboard with android L design and Ubuntu colors. -Ubuntu Font -Themed switch, progress bar, scrubber, action bar, buttons, etc. -New Wifi and Mobile Network indicators in status bar from L -Radio Button and Scrubber using polymer-project guidelines -Better Toast Notifications -Dropdowns, spinners, recent apps -Dialer, Text input and handles -Notification Drawer, Heads Up Themed -Whatsapp Themed -Android L bootanimation -Lockscreen Some rare bugs you might encounter in CM11 that are NOT due to the theme: > Some newer CM11 nightlies switches to default theme on rebooting. Apply the default theme manually and then apply this theme to fix it. It is probably due to xposed. > Some users have reported Navigation buttons break in landscape mode, this can be fixed with a reboot. Please write a review. That would be very helpful! A 5-star rating would be awesome. Thank You!
release_text: 4.0 Smaller NavBar icons Minor fixes 3.0 LockScreen pattern and swipe UI Tweaks to improve user experience LockScreen Wallpaper tweaked. (Requires reapplying) Email me if any issue. If you like the theme, please write a review. A 5-star would be awesome. Thanks!

description: The game design is pretty simple yet very powerful. You play on 9 tic-tac-toe fields which form a big tic-tac-toe. The official rules can be found on http://mathwithbaddrawings.com/2013/06/16/ultimate-tic-tac-toe/ where the only twist is, that within our version a small tic-tac-toe is considered as “full” if somebody won the tic-tac-toe. This version of the game is a quick and rough version of a multiplayer (and Computer-Opponent) game. Please be patient while loading (give it maybe 15-20 seconds). It looks like nothing happens at the beginning; instead your opponent is eventually playing. We did not spend a lot of time for Design and Artwork, instead we were looking to have something stable and nice to play with… Checkout also our official developer website, there we explain everything a little bit better, the space here is just not sufficient enough ( http://expertino.com/tictactoe ) Also try the other ultimate tic tac toe versions, we saw that some of them have a better design, but lack in the multiplayer ability or don’t have computer opponents…

LandGrabbers, recognized as the Best Casual Game of the Year at the 2011 Russian Game Developers Conference (KRI 2011)! Imagine that you are in the Middle Ages. It’s the time of castles, knights and the Crusades. Now imagine that you are a brilliant military leader with your own troops. What could prevent you from conquering the world? Perhaps just a lack of free time. Are you ready to spend hours glued to your Tablet, capturing the enemy fortresses and the surrounding land, and forming militias? This addictive game is a unique genre that combines classic elements of strategy, simulator, and resource management games. Get ready to play lots gripping levels in the woods, in the desert, the snow and even on the flying islands! Characteristics: - Lots of levels in different diverse locations - Unique level mapping design for deeper tactic capabilities - Dozens of magical artifacts to work your magic - Three incredible enemy armies - Five types of buildings with unique features to attack or defend from the enemy - Three difficulty levels that will challenge even experienced strategy experts - Gorgeous graphics and catchy soundtrack create a medieval atmosphere You troops are waiting for you, general! description: The "7 Minute Workout" is a research-backed workout program that has become an international hit! Published in the leading research journal ACSM, and then popularized by the NYT, the "7 Minute Workout" is simple but effective. No additional equipment needed. This is a high intensity circuit training workout which can be done at home, office, or a hotel room. Easy and simple UI. The workout consists of twelve scientifically selected exercises each done for 30 seconds with a 10 second break in between. This 7 minute workout is a scientifically proven workout to keep you fit and healthy. The app will guide you through the workout with visual and audio cues. Play the included music or workout to your own tunes. The best part? The exercises are simple to perform, do not require any equipment, and therefore, can be done anywhere! NO MORE EXCUSES. This app takes this research-proven workout and guides you through the process. Further, it tracks your results, and makes it fun by allowing you to unlock rewards as you continue working out.

description: Viral is an innovative video player that has many features . For those of you who like to multi-task, it allows you to pop-out and float your videos above any other app, so you can watch a video and send text messages, emails or just browse the Internet. If your device is powerful enough, you can even view multiple floating videos! You can also choose to visualize your videos in fullscreen mode or minimize the playing video to the notification tray so you can listen to the audio in the background – great for listening music or podcasts from YouTube while you're on the run! This app has the following features to give you the best seamless and intuitive experience:   • Support ChromeCast from any stream video . • Connect to your YouTube account (access to Watch Later, My Uploads, Playlists…) • Resizable Pop-up player, which can also play local videos from your video gallery • Multiple Pop-up player at same time. • Minimize to notification bar and play in the background • Change video resolutions from 144p up to 720p • Tab sliding interface for easy navigation (change brightness and volume directly by swiping on the video) • ad-free • Highly customizable interface with lots of settings and options, and more…! Importans : Samsung devices with + 4.3 must enable "Hardware Acceleration " from settings to play in background Mode . Before leaving a low rating, please consider contacting us (email below) with your feedback first. We appreciate your comments and suggestions, and we are willing to help resolve any issues you might have. We hope to make this app the ultimate mobile companion to your video viewing experience! if u want help us to make this app perfect please join us in this group to become beta tester : https://plus.google.com/u/0/communities/112186798528436559951

description: Mahjongg Solitaire, also called Taipei or Shanghai, is an old chinese board game. The objective is to remove all 144 tiles from the board. There are six kinds of layer suit for play on phone device. The rules are simple: Starting from the sides, or from the central tile at the top of the pile, remove tiles by clicking on two equal symbols. If the tiles are identical, they will disappear. Removeable tiles always must be free on their left or right side. If a tile sits between two tiles on the same level, it cannot be selected.
