description: Комплекты материалов для подготовки к Государственной итоговой аттестации по обществознанию в новой форме (ГИА ) созданы специалистом ФИПИ, официальным разработчиком контрольно-измерительных материалов. Материалы для подготовки к ГИА по обществознанию рекомендованы ИСМО Российской Академии Образования для подготовки выпускников всех типов образовательных учреждений РФ к сдаче экзаменов в форме ГИА. В приложении есть типовые варианты экзаменационных работ 2014 года, которые сопровождаются инструкциями по выполнению работы и ответами ко всем заданиям. Материалы предполагают два режима работы: 1. Режим «Экзамен» - условия выполнения заданий максимально приближены к реальной обстановке на экзамене. 2. Режим «Тестирование» - предполагает возможность тренироваться, исправлять ответы, сверять свои решения с правильными ответами. Выполнение всех заданий гарантирует выработку устойчивых навыков безошибочных действий на экзамене, решения заданий базового, повышенного и высокого уровней сложности. Учащийся, справившийся со всеми предлагаемыми заданиями, может с уверенностью считать себя готовым к ГИА по обществознанию. Предлагаемые материалы избавят Вас от необходимости покупать множество книг и искать дополнительную информацию в Интернете! Компании «Экзамен-Медиа» очень важно Ваше мнение о представленных учебных материалах! Мы ждем Ваших замечаний и отзывов о нашей работе и будем рады выполнить Ваши пожелания. + Полностью обновлено содержание экзаменационных работ. + Изменилась структура работы. + Изменилась система оценивания заданий. + Изменилось количество заданий и порядок их нумерации. + Оформление приведено в соответствие с новым содержанием. Kits to prepare for the state final examination of the social studies in a new form (DPA) established specialist FIPI, official developer of test materials. Materials for the preparation of the DPA on social recommended Ismo Russian Academy of Education to prepare graduates of all types of educational institutions of the Russian Federation for exams in the form of the DPA. The application has typical embodiments of the examination papers in 2014, which are accompanied by instructions for the implementation of the work and answers to all assignments. Materials suggest two modes of operation: 1. Mode "Exam" - terms of assignments as close to the real situation on the exam. 2. Mode "Testing" - an opportunity to train, correct answers, compare their solutions with the correct answers. Performing all tasks guarantee an error-free sustainable skills in the exam solutions jobs base, enhanced, or high levels of complexity. Student cope with all the proposed assignment may, with the confidently consider themselves ready for the DPA on society. Suggested materials save you from having to buy a lot books and look for more information on the Web! Of "Exam-Media" is very important to an opinion on education materials! We welcome your comments and feedback about our work and we happy to fulfill your wishes. + Fully updated contents of the examination papers. + Changed the structure of the work. + Modify job evaluation system. + Modify the number of jobs and the order of their numbering. + Making brought into line with the new content.

The app transforms your tablet or smartphone into a communicator. Useful for those who have difficulty using language as a communication channel. The app is useful in case of congenital disabilities, acquired and/or temporary, allowing through the speech of the device on which it is installed, a fast voice prompt, communicating effectively problems, needs and requests. A communicator useful also for those people who have had their vocal chords removed and for hospitalized inpatients who are unable to speak the english language. Available a simple mode for severe disability. One of the 2013 best app: Productivity - for the Christopher & Dana Reeve Foundation.

El Maestro Lógico es un divertido juego de puzzles. Hay más de 100 puzzles únicos y divertidos. Lo que necesitas hacer es probar diferentes estrategias para llegar a la solución. Este juego es apropiado para edades de entre 7 a 77 años. No es necesario ser un "genio" para jugar El Maestro Lógico. Sin embargo, si eres un genio, serás bienvenido :) CARACTERÍSTICAS - Juegos my sencillos y adictivos - 18 Puestos de Control - Más de 100 divertidos puzzles - Clasificación Mundial - Alta calidad y encantadores gráficos de retina - Música y efectos de sonido adictivos - Toque o deslizamiento de controles con un solo dedo - Competir contra el tiempo y resolver los enigmas en menos tiempo CÓMO JUGAR Debes seguir las instrucciones cuidadosamente. Algunas de las preguntas pueden ser complicadas o necesitarían un enfoque diferente para ser resueltas. PUESTOS DE CONTROL Hay un total de 18 puestos de control que tienen entre 5 y 7 puzzles cada uno. Un nuevo punto de control será desbloqueado sólo si acaba todos los rompecabezas en el control anterior. Si fallas un problema, entonces tendrás que reiniciar el juego de nuevo. CONTROLES SENCILLOS Puedes, simplemente, controlar el juego tocando cualquier objeto o deslizándolos con el dedo por la pantalla. PANELES DE CLASIFICACIONES Competir con jugadores de todo el mundo. Tu mejor puntuación será enviada automáticamente a los paneles de puntuaciones cuando llegues a un punto de control. Repite el mismo rompecabezas y trata de llegar a un punto de control en un tiempo más corto para subir tu puntuación. Logical Master is a fun puzzle game. There are over 100 unique and fun puzzles. What you need to do is try different strategies to reach the solution. This game is suitable for ages 7-77 years. No need to be a "genius" to play Master Logic. However, if you're a genius, you are welcome :) FEATURES - My simple and addictive Games - 18 Checkpoints - Over 100 fun puzzles - World Ranking - High quality and lovely graphics of retina - Music and sound effects addictive - Tap or slide control with one finger - Compete against time and solve riddles in less time HOW TO PLAY You must follow the instructions carefully. Some questions can be complicated and need to be dealt with a different approach. CONTROL POSTS There are a total of 18 checkpoints that are between 5 and 7 puzzles each. A new checkpoint will be unlocked only if just every puzzle in the previous control. If you miss a problem, then you have to restart the game again. SIMPLE CONTROLS You just, you control the game by touching any object or sliding a finger across the screen. PANEL RANKINGS Compete with players from around the world. Your best score will be automatically sent to the panels Rating when you get to a checkpoint. Repeat the same puzzle and try to reach a checkpoint in a shorter time to raise your score.

You've always wanted to play disc golf on picturesque desert islands, now you can! Disc Golf Islands is the first mobile disc golf game with realistic physics and stunning graphics! Take to the course and sink putts on 18 beautiful holes or head to the range and see how long you can survive arcade mode. Choose your favourite course, select wind settings and tee position then challenge someone on-line or have a casual round off-line. No ads, no in app purchases, just fun. ** Try the demo for free first! ** Features: - Skillful gameplay! - Stunning 3D graphics! - On-line turn based multiplayer! - Infinite survival mode! - Realistic physics! Wind, collisions and aerodynamics! - Easy to pick-up, difficult to master! Permissions: - "Phone state and identity" this is needed so that the game can pause when you get an incoming call. Nothing personal about you is logged or even looked at. - "Network access" is needed to pull the daily message from the Disc Golf Islands servers. Search terms: disc golf, disc golf islands, multiplayer, multi-player, frisbee, frisbee golf, turn based, on-line disc golf, 3d disc golf, disc physics, disc golf physics.

description: Want to transform the look of your Android device into something super cute, pink, bright and cheery? Allow me to introduce you to 'PinkNGreenDreams'. *** This app is a Launcher theme for ADW EX, ADW.Launcher,APEX Launcher Pro, LauncherPro(LP), & LauncherPro Plus. It's (this theme) is used in conjunction with one of the Launchers listed above, allowing you to drastically modify the look of your phone with ease (and a little bit of patience!). --- PLEASE NOTE: This is not a standalone app and therefore will not launch on it's own. You will need to have one of the above Launcher apps installed on your device in order for this theme to work! --- *** Features: ★400+ internally coded HDPI app icons ★170+ extra HDPI app icons in an Icon Pack for use with ADW's Custom Shortcuts (that is a total of over 400 apps!) ★5 Custom created Theme wallpapers in a Wallpaper Pack ★Launcher Pro theme support (icons and wallpapers must be added manually from the Theme packs) ★Other Launchers support including Crazy Home, Crazy Home Lite, dxTop Lite, Panda Home, Open Home paid & free ★Icon Pack should also work with Launch-X Pro & Free, VTL Launcher, Circle Launcher Paid, and several more customization related apps. *** A few important details: -The theme will automatically change your primary system app icons, wallpaper, and certain graphics. Not all devices are created the same, so certain icons might not automatically change when applying the theme. Please check the icon pack included with the theme for tons of extra icons to choose from. -The theme will not change your status bar, notifications, and widgets. -Icon Requests are welcome. Please email us and we will do our best to add them in the next update. -Regarding 'MovetoSD' availability: As of now, this is not an option for specific reasons: If the app is moved to the SD Card, you risk the custom coded icons not showing up in the theme. Many times it is the cause for missing theme parts. *** Need additional help using ADW? Here's some great links. COMPLETE GUIDE TO ADW: http://is.gd/hfpq5 INSTRUCTIONAL VIDEO: http://is.gd/jE1UN *** Last but not least, please email us with questions, requests, issues, concerns...We cannot help you if you leave a question or issue in the comments! ;) Thank you kindly for supporting ADDesigns.
release_text: Long overdue update! Added new & updated existing app icons. Theme is all up-to-date! Please email with requests.

description: Blood Pressure PRO is an application by means of which you can collect and analyse your blood pressure measurements and all connected activities, such as: pulse, drugs taken, physical effort and weight. Charts and statistics will enable current results control and constant monitoring of your pressure, and thanks to reminders you should not forget about measurement or taking appropriate drugs. In the application you can record activities: o Blood pressure: • Systolic • Diastolic • Pulse • Place of pressure measurement • Body position during measurement o Drugs taken: • Name of drug • Dose o Weight • Weight in kilograms or pounds o Physical effort • Type of effort • Intensity • Effort duration You can analyse the collected results by means of statistics and charts including: • date and time • time of the day (morning, day, evening, night) • scope of pressure (low, high, hypertension …) • place of measurement • position during measurement The application supports the following languages: Deutsch, English, Español, Français, Italiano, Русский, Polski, Português, 中文 Expanded settings panel will additionally enable: • Export of any data to Excel or .txt file • Sending the exported data to any e-mail address • Creating data backups • Any change of blood pressure ranges • Adjustment of time of day to your needs The application "Blood Pressure PRO" is intended only to record blood pressure measurements and related activities. The application is not a substitute for a doctor's advice or visit; therefore, do not make any changes in your treatment without prior consultations with a doctor or specialist. The Supplier of the application, "Freshware", does not bear responsibility for incurred damages resulting from use of the application.
release_text: 1.8 Adjustments for Android 4.4.x 1.7 small bus fixes 1.6 UI improvements for tablets small bugs fixes adding new scrolling list of activities 1.5 "Pressure Range" graph update 1.4 small bugs fixes in filter and reminders 1.3 small bug fixes in graphs

description: Eine Frage, vier Antwortmöglichkeiten. In jeder Runde wählt ein anderer die Kategorie aus. Schaffst du es in vier Runden mehr Fragen richtig zu beantworten als deine Freunde? Funktionen: ✓ Spannende Quiz-Duelle gegen deine Freunde, Facebook-Freunde oder einen Zufallsgegner! ✓ Beliebig viele Spiele und keine Wartezeiten! ✓ Trainiere deine Quizskills auch alleine, bevor Du ins Duell gehst ✓ Wähle Deinen persönlichen Avatar aus! ✓ Mit Highscore Ranking ✓ Schickt Euch Chat-Nachrichten während der Quiz-Runden für noch mehr Spaß! ✓ Reiche neue Quizfragen ein, um Quizpingpong noch spannender zu machen! ✓ Tausende Fragen aus verschiedenen Kategorien! Und es werden täglich mehr! A question four possible answers. In each round, another selects the category. Can you make it in four rounds to answer more questions correctly than your friends?   Functions: ✓ Exciting quiz games against your friends, Facebook friends or a random opponent! ✓ Unlimited number of games and no waiting! ✓ Train your quiz skills also alone, before you go to duel ✓ Pick your personal avatar from! ✓ With highscore ranking ✓ Sends you chat messages during the quiz rounds for even more fun! ✓ Rich new quiz questions in order to make quizzes ping pong more exciting! ✓ Thousands of questions from various categories! And it is growing every day!

Not another card game, this is really adictive and very fun card game. It is played with Spanish cards and up to 4 players, humans or AI in the same device. It is based on the Spanish card game Tute. It's more adictive than a solitarie and funnier than other card games. Tute is a two players card game. In this game only two player version is available. In this version you have to choose the best card to play between your 6 or 8 cards. Do it your best to win the smart AI based on traditional bar players. Now you can play with a friend via bluetooth

Do you love babies? It’s time to play the role of a virtual mother. Take care of newborn babies, feed them, medicate them and be their mommy. You have a challenge of acting as the babysitter for the newborn little baby. Let’s show your love as a mother for these adorable & cute little stars. This game will let you learn the responsibilities of a real mother as you take care of them and feed them in a proper routine. Feed them milk, remove their rashes, change diapers and more. Let your little prince and princess have fun and dress up with amazing outfits in style. Always keep a check on your baby so he might not get dirty or hungry. Keep them clean so they don’t get any diseases or illness. You have a complete baby wardrobe to choose the best one for your little baby. Make him a cute star with awesome dresses, shoes, glasses, hats and other accessories. Make your virtual newborn child comfortable & don’t let him cry. ◆◆◆ FEATURES ◆◆◆ ► 4 baby characters to play with ► Baby Care, Feed, Makeover and Dress Up ► Interactive sounds, Fun gameplay for kids ► Virtual mother skills for little girls ◆◆◆ JOIN US ◆◆◆ Like us on Facebook and Follow us on Twitter to stay updated with TenLogix Games is working on. description: Mobile version of the "House: Percussion" sample pack from Function Loops for the digital audio workstation Audio Evolution Mobile. This is a collection of exceptional house percussion loops. Some of the most exciting and refreshing sounds to use in your next production! This pack contains full, stripped, top and kick-only versions. Super useful for Tech-House/Deep-House/Electro-House/Techno and beyond. If you are looking to produce House/Techno tracks, you got some serious ammo here. Warning: this app is 40MB in size, so it's best to download over a WiFi connection. Preferably use headphones to hear the full quality and low bass of the samples! These samples are royalty-free and can be used in commercial projects. Copyright remains at Function Loops. Installation: Please press the 'Install sample pack' button to unpack the samples to the Audio Evolution 'SamplePacks' directory. Usage: In Audio Evolution Mobile press the top-left folder icon and select 'Import sample from sample pack'. Choose the sample pack and then a sample you wish to import. In the 'Stretch and pitch' dialog you can change the tempo and pitch to your current project's values. After pressing 'Ok', the sample will be displayed and can be looped/repeated by long-tapping the sample and choosing 'Repeat' in the pop-up menu. Or watch the YouTube tutorial video! 24 drum loops: House_Perc_01_Full_128bpm.wav House_Perc_01_Kick_128bpm.wav House_Perc_01_Stripped01_128bpm.wav House_Perc_01_Top_128bpm.wav House_Perc_02_Full_128bpm.wav House_Perc_02_Kick_128bpm.wav House_Perc_02_Stripped01_128bpm.wav House_Perc_02_Top_128bpm.wav House_Perc_03_Full_128bpm.wav House_Perc_03_Kick_128bpm.wav House_Perc_03_Stripped02_128bpm.wav House_Perc_03_Top_128bpm.wav House_Perc_04_Full_128bpm.wav House_Perc_04_Kick_128bpm.wav House_Perc_04_Stripped02_128bpm.wav House_Perc_04_Top_128bpm.wav House_Perc_05_Full_128bpm.wav House_Perc_05_Kick_128bpm.wav House_Perc_05_Stripped02_128bpm.wav House_Perc_05_Top_128bpm.wav House_Perc_06_Full_128bpm.wav House_Perc_06_Kick_128bpm.wav House_Perc_06_Stripped02_128bpm.wav House_Perc_06_Top_128bpm.wav 2 bonus loops: House_Perc_07_Full_128bpm.wav House_Perc_08_Full_128bpm.wav Function Loops website: http://www.functionloops.com/ Audio Evolution Mobile: http://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.extreamsd.aemobile Look at 'More from developer' to download more sample packs!

description: An easy 2 player hangman game. The first user enters the secret word and the other player tries to guess it. Each wrong letter draws a little more of the stick figure until the second user either guesses the secret word or the poor stick figure gets hung. It's a fun way to learn vocabulary with your family.

description: ANDROID APLICATION FOR KIDS & FAMILY Animals and Language Learning Game for Children. Animal Quiz is a learning program for kids and the whole family. It has a game and a learning module. In the game mode you must recognize more than 100 animals from tracks with their images and the sounds they emit. In the learning mode you hear the correct pronunciation and translation in ENGLISH / SPANISH of the name of all animals. Children can have fun playing a long time while adults can learn and practice their language skills. The game let´s you asume the following skills by playing: - improve children's skills in memory, concentration and development of knowledge of their environment. - help with the recognition of the letters of the alphabet and learning English and Spanish languages​​. - keep the children entertained with funny sound effects and real animal sounds. - The game is adapted to be handled very easily. - is specifically designed as an educational tool and interface for preschool children.

A true and totally 3D free app for learning human anatomy with position quiz, built on an advanced interactive 3D touch interface. ***From the creator of Visual Anatomy app. Features: ★ You can rotate models to any angle and zoom in and out ★ Easy to navigate and explore human body ★ Virtual dissection: Peel layers of muscles and reveal the anatomical structures below them. ★ 3D location quizzes to test your knowledge ★ Switch on/off different anatomy systems ★ Load and Save Views ( bookmaker function ) ★ Information from Wikipedia and Gray's anatomy textbook ★ Great for learning anatomy and physiology ★ It also can be used as a anatomy guide. ★ Support French, Spanish and German languages! Contents: ★ 3D Skeleton (all bones in our body) ★ 3D Ligaments (shoulder and knee ligaments only) ★ 3D Muscles (Upper body muscles) ★ 3D Respiratory system ★ Circulation (heart) ★ Nervous System (brain) ★ 3D Reproductive system (male and Female) ★ 3D Urinary system Contact Us: Let us know any feedback you have or share ideas for making the app better.

description: Start throwing into cans. Achieve perfection and play for hours. It is simple, but addictive! Only you and cans against each other! Aim and throw, it is that simple. Nice 3D graphics, realistic physics - definitely worth playing. Several different levels, so check them all! Aim correctly and use as fewest balls as possible to receive bonuses. Use fast throws to gain ever more points. Be accurate and clever! Have fun ! Follow Us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/IllegalR Like Us on Facebook : https://www.facebook.com/IllegalR

Need more than free videos to learn math? YourTeacher's Algebra 2 app is like having a personal math tutor in your pocket. ** “It’s like a private school math classroom, but you are the only student.” John "I just love YourTeacher and the way you explain things. I felt like I was in a classroom instead of just looking at examples." Diane "Thank you for the program. It has shown immediate results. My sophomore daughter is failing Algebra 2 because she doesn't understand it. In three hours of using your lessons, she completed an entire packet of assignments, 4 days worth, and as the student in the class with the worst grade and most amount of incompleted assignments, she was the first to turn in all the work! And she no longer feels like a failure. Also, my 5th grade daughter spent a few hours "having fun" learning pre-algebra lessons and taking the tests... she got 100% on most of them. That is absolutely amazing!" Bryan ****** Need more than videos to learn Algebra 2… YourTeacher’s Algebra 2 app replicates the entire math classroom experience with your own personal math teacher. Our lessons include: -Multiple video example problems (similar to how a teacher starts class at the board by explaining the examples from the textbook) -Interactive practice problems with built-in support (similar to how a teacher assigns practice and walks around the class providing help) -A Challenge Problem (similar to how a teacher assigns a higher level problem which students must work on their own to prove mastery) -Extra problem worksheets (similar to how a teacher assigns additional problems for homework) -Review notes (similar to how a teacher provides summary handouts or refers you to your textbook) ****** Scope and Sequence YourTeacher’s Algebra 2 app covers an entire year of Algebra 2. CHAPTER 1: SIMPLIFYING Addition and Subtraction Multiplication and Division Order of Operations Evaluation Integers Distributive / Like Terms CHAPTER 2: EQUATIONS CHAPTER 3: WORD PROBLEMS CHAPTER 4: INEQUALITIES, ABSOLUTE VALUE, FUNCTIONS, GRAPHING CHAPTER 5: LINEAR EQUATIONS CHAPTER 6: SYSTEMS OF EQUATIONS CHAPTER 7: EXPONENTS & POLYNOMIALS CHAPTER 8: FACTORING CHAPTER 9: RATIONAL EXPRESSIONS & EQUATIONS CHAPTER 10: RADICALS CHAPTER 11: QUADRATICS CHAPTER 12: IMAGINARY AND COMPLEX NUMBERS CHAPTER 13: QUADRATIC EQUATIONS & FUNCTIONS (Wifi or 3G connection required)
release_text: Interface updated to accommodate larger screen resolutions. App updated to run in both portrait and landscape modes. Lesson content has been expanded and includes more video instruction for each lesson. In addition to the video examples each lesson includes interactive practice problems, challenge questions, and worksheets.

description: Holo Metronome for Android has everything a musician needs when it comes to a metronome. No matter if you play or practise drums, guitar, bass or another instrument Holo Metronome is the best and free choice for you. It is easy to use, free, accurate and I extend the features as they come to my mind. You have an idea that should be implemented? Don’t hesitate to contact me via the emailMe! button inside the app! Unique feature: ★ The Magic Wheel – Set the start BPM at “from BPM”, set the final BPM at “to BPM” and chose how fast you want the metronome to speed up (or down) with the Magic Wheel (1=very slow, 100=very fast). Other Features: ★ Tempo from 1 to 280 bpm ★ Vibration ★ Beat Emphasis ★ Fullscreen Beat Counter ★ Just BPM and Advanced Setting ★ 3 Themes: Light, Dark, Green ★ Full Holo Design ★ 1,2,3,4,5,6,7 or 8 bars , which can be devided by 1,2 or 3 "ticks" per beat BETA Features: ★DrumBox (Patterns, CloudSync) This app is under development, if you want features added contact me by using the button inside the app! Future Feature: - Songlist save/load, etc. (+Sync App over different devices) (Dropbox added 15.02.2013) - a notification when the app runs in background - DrumBox: 1/4,1/8,1/16,more samples, custom samples Permissions: SYSTEM TOOLS,PREVENT TABLET FROM SLEEPING PREVENT PHONE FROM SLEEPING: Keep the metronome alive, even if the app isn't touched for some time or if it is in the background HARDWARE CONTROLS,CONTROL VIBRATION: obviously for vibration PHONE CALLS,READ PHONE STATUS AND IDENTITY: pause the metronome when a call is incoming WRITE/READ EXTERNAL STORAGE: Save Patterns NETWORK COMMUNICATION/INTERNETACCESS/LOCATION: CloudSync and ads (LOCATION not in Pro Version) Thanks to Lui for the great app icon! The app is currently available in 2 languages: English: Holo Metronome German: Holo Metronom If you like to help me with the translation into other languages, just drop me a message.
release_text: ★ Ribbon Menu Added ★ 1.2dbx -> 1.21: fix force close at CloudSync ★ DrumBox: Sync in cloud ★ DrumBox: save patterns ★ Visual beat indication is properly synced with sound now ★ Design Updated (Full Holo now) ★ DrumBox: 1/2, 1/4, triplets working ★ Fixed force close at Themes - Sorry! ★ Fixed force close on older devices ★ Major Update at the DrumBox ★ Max BPM changed from 201 to 280 ★ DrumBox added (BETA) ★ Added 3 Themes: Light, Dark, Green ★ Added Wakelock to keep the Metronome running

description: White Noise: Ocean Waves lets you listen to calming sounds of nature set to imagery that will put you in a meditative and relaxing state. Use White Noise to - * Help sleep * Block distractions * Relax/meditate * Take a mental break White Noise audio is downloaded to your SD card the first time you play a track, while being streamed from the Internet. Audio will be played from your device SD card every time after that. Soothing and relaxing audio runs in the background, so you can check email, browse the web, or read a book on your device at the same time. Notification bar shows current audio playing which provides easy access back to the app screen. Download White Noise: Nature Medley today and start relaxing to the sounds of nature. **Note on permissions** Internet access: required for ads Access phone state: pause audio when incoming call is detected and resume when call ends Storage: save audio file to SD card Email spyd3rdroid@gmail.com with any feedback, issues, etc.

Put your heating in your pocket! With the MAX! eQ-3 app you can control your heating from anywhere. Therefore, you only need to install the MAX! system and the Internet control. You can download the software at max.eQ-3.com. With the MAX! system, you can bring your heating into the Internet age. The MAX! system offers various functions: controlling the ambient temperature via app remotely while being on the move, setting up heating programs with just a mouse-click or switching the entire house into eco mode at only the push of a button with the MAX! Eco Switch. MAX! users benefit from a coordinated system with different components that enable efficient energy management. The electronic wireless radiator and wall thermostats control the existing radiators and the window sensors help to save on energy costs as they put the system into energy saving mode during ventilation. You can control and set up the system with the MAX! Cube (the LAN gateway) via a PC or Internet connection or with the app via an encrypted and secured communication channel. With the MAX! app you can directly control the temperature in single rooms or the entire house and execute your individual week programs. You will automatically be informed about the single device states. This information includes the current setpoint temperature, the state of single windows and batteries as well as any communication errors within the wireless system.
release_text: Translation of the app into French, Dutch, Polish and Italian.

Just search for ingredients and add to the basket 2. You need to have a max of 3 ingredients 3. Click on Search recipes to find out the best match 4. Recently used ingredients will also be listed for ease of use Note: This app requires internet connection

The creators of your favorite Live Wallpapers are delighted to bring you another 3D Live wallpaper especially for Christmas. Celebrate the Holidays every time you use your device, in true 3-D! Gather the family together in a cozy den, in front of a warm crackling fireplace. Your own picture on the mantel is surrounded by twinkling Christmas lights, and stockings with your names grace the fireplace. Enjoy a Christmas tree with customizable lights, gifts, and tree topper. Eagerly await Santa's visit with a calendar that counts down the days until Christmas, and leave cookies and a note for Santa Claus. Gaze out the frost-covered window at a picturesque Winter scene while snow gently falls. Customize every part of the scene, including your own photograph on the fireplace, your text on the stockings and the message for Santa. Choose the color of lights, customize the ornaments, gifts and ribbons, snowflakes, garland, tree topper, and more! You can also show or hide the items in the scene to celebrate the wonders of Christmas in a way that means the most to you. Optional add-on packs are available for purchase, so you can choose the features most meaningful to you. A classic rendition of a timeless outdoor Christmas painting in 3-D, the Outdoor Pack features a brand-new, fully animated, customizable, and interactive scene of the outside of the house rendered in stunning detail. New themes allow you to choose an inviting traditional look for your house, or a more vibrant modern theme. Write your family name and house number on your very own mailbox, and customize the snowman, sled, Christmas lights, wreath, bows, candles, moon, snow and more. Simply double-tap the screen at any time to switch between the indoor and outdoor scenes. This visually stunning live wallpaper is true 3D with hand-crafted artwork. Our wallpapers feature silky-smooth animations while conserving your battery life and works great with phones, tablets, or any device that supports live wallpapers. description: Featured on XDA-DEVELOPERS! No wires, no drivers, no cables, no bluetooth only WiFi on a fresh air and browser to connect your Android device with desktop or laptop or even another android device with Droid Over Wifi app installed! One button to start. Transfer, view, stream, rename, move, delete files and folders immediately over WiFi with any Browser and any OS. FEATURES • MediaView feature enables on the fly filter content and display video and audio files contained in current folder. You can stream full screen Mpeg4, Ogg and WebM videos directly from your phone and meanwhile view your photos in other tab of the browser. • Folder Bookmarks feature. • Folder Size feature quickly counts size of folders and displays it with nice visually graphs. • Folder upload (Chrome only) and download by using zip • Upload multiple files at once with no size limit. Progress is visible in real time of each concrete file. Drag and Drop of files supported for multiple files upload. • Download multiple files at one with no size limit. Multiple file download feature is automatically packing selected files into ZIP file and offered for download. • Create, Rename and Delete files and folders in easy and straightforward way with keyboard and mouse • Move and Copy files and folders with smart auto-complete feature • Sort files and folders by name, size or date modified • Pin Code protection • Droid Over WiFi runs as a background service, so you can switch to any other app while browsing your files • Very small footprint NOTE • HTML 5 compatible web browser and internet connection are required. For best experience use Google Chrome. • Android device with Droid Over WiFi enabled and desktop or laptop should be on the same WiFi network. This mean connected to same router or access point. • If you don`t see external SD card press "Home" and two times "Previous Directory" LIMITATIONS • Droid Over WiFi has no limits, push it to the limits! Transfer files over wifi of any size and in any quantity.

description: Comprehensive protection from all types of malware targeting mobile devices. This anti-virus product can be used free of charge for 14 days, after which a commercial license with a minimum one-year term must be purchased. Use Dr.Web for Android free of charge! Purchase Dr.Web Security Space or Dr.Web Anti-virus. New! Remove ransomeware lockers Unlock a device compromised by locker ransomware. Features: - Terminates malicious processes even on locked devices; - Neutralises lockers that are not yet present in the Dr.Web virus database; - Preserves data; no ransom needs to be paid to criminals. Features and Advantages • Performs express or full file system scans; Scans files and folders on demand. Provides real-time file system scanning. • Using the unique Origins Tracing™ technology, detects new, unknown malware. • Protects SD cards from becoming infected with autorun files and Exploit.Cpllnk, both of which may be dangerous for Windows-running devices. • Move detected threats to the quarantine. Restore quarantined files. • Minimally impacts system performance. • Economizes battery resources. • Economizes traffic due to the small size of the virus database updates. • Provides detailed statistics. Comes with handy and informative desktop widgets. Anti-spam Avoid unwanted calls and SMS messages. • Offers a choice of filtering modes. • Lets users create their own filtering profiles. • Offers a customisable blacklist. • Displays information about blocked calls and messages. Anti-theft Will help locate a mobile device if it has been lost or stolen, and, if necessary, wipe confidential information from it remotely. • Locks a device after it’s been rebooted. • Locks a device so that it can only be unlocked by entering a password (the number of unlock attempts is limited). • Lets users unlock a device with the help of an SMS message. • Offers a Google Maps link to a device's location. • Lets users perform a remote wipe of data on devices and SD cards. • Starts audio playback and locks the screen. • Lets users customise the message that is to be displayed on the screen of a blocked device. • Offers users the option to create a list of numbers to which SIM card change notifications will be sent for a lost device. It is from these numbers that you can control the Anti-theft and unlock a device if you have forgotten the unlock password. Cloud Checker The Cloud Checker filter will restrict access to undesirable Internet sites. Block access to non-recommended or potentially dangerous sites according to several categories (drugs, violence, etc.). The Security Auditor • Troubleshoots the device to identify security problems and offers solutions to address them. Firewall Controls application network activity • Filters the external network traffic of the applications installed on the device and system applications. Choose between Wi-Fi and cellular network filtering, and take advantage of customisable rules (filter by IP addresses and/or ports, and by entire networks or IP ranges). • Monitors current and previously transmitted traffic; gives you information about the addresses/ports to which applications are connecting and the amount of inbound and outbound traffic. • Detailed logs. The firewall is compatible with Android 4.0 or higher. How to remove Dr.Web for Android when the anti-theft is present on your device Before removing Dr.Web Anti-virus, clear the option “Dr.Web Anti-virus” in the “Security” tab located in the “Administration” section.

description: This is a quick and easy launcher for the m.fuelly.com mobile-optimized site. This launcher opens m.fuelly.com in a native app interface allowing for faster fuelup logging. This is not a full featured native fuelly app and is focused instead purely on rapid fuel logging on-the-go (a connection is required as this simply calls the mobile optimized input site at m.fuelly.com). Keypad missing decimal point? Here is the fix: http://www.fuelly.com/forums/showthread.php?t=16317 If you encounter issues with this app, please contact us via the Fuelly forums or at support@fuelly.com Feel free to follow us on twitter @fuelly for the latest news and updates.
release_text: 2.0.1: - Improved user interface - Geolocation tagging for fuelups

description: Minor Emergencies gives you the practical guidance you need to handle a wide range of non-life-threatening medical crises with speed and expertise. Completely updated with the latest equipment, devices, dosages, and techniques, this compact and portable medical reference book delivers fast, efficient guidance just when you need it. With Minor Emergencies on hand, you'll always be prepared wherever you are! You don't need the Internet or cellular data to view the app. Once you have purchased the app, the full content is downloaded onto your device so that everything from viewing images and videos to searching is lightning fast. This app is optimized for whatever size device you are using, either phone or tablet. This app is easy to navigate, allowing you to browse the contents or search for key words and phrases. The search tool will find text, figures and videos with one single fast search. The search tool shows you suggested words as you type so it is quick and helps with spelling issues. The text search results show the most relevant results at the top of the text search. This app lets you create bookmarks and notes, allowing you to customize the content to fit your needs. You can also change the text size for easier reading. This app also includes 38 narrated videos of various procedures to enhance your learning. Disclaimer: This app is intended for the education of healthcare professionals and not as a diagnostic and treatment reference for the general population. This interactive app is based on the full content of Minor Emergencies, 3rd Edition by Elsevier. Authors: Philip Buttaravoli, MD FACEP Fellow of the American College of Emergency Physicians Adjunct Assistant Professor in the Department of Emergency Medicine Fletcher Allen Health Care Burlington, Vermont Stephen M. Leffler, MD FACEP Fellow of the American College of Emergency Physicians Professor of Emergency Medicine University of Vermont College of Medicine Fletcher Allen Health Care Burlington, Vermont Based on the Elsevier text: Minor Emergencies, 3rd edition, 2012 Developed by Usatine Media, LLC Richard P. Usatine, MD, Co-President, Professor of Family Medicine, Professor of Dermatology, University of Texas Health Science Center at San Antonio Peter Erickson, Co-President, Lead Software Developer

Panda & Penguin Salon - Kids game 1st time in Play store Panda Hair salon, Makeover & Dressup 3 in 1 game for kids. Now Dress up your pet the way you want to. We can have 3 different services: Makeover, Hair Salon & Dressup Your Pet. Makeover : * Give your Panda & Penguin lovely Bath * Cleanup with Towel * Give Amazing Facial to your Panda or Penguin Hair Salon : * Cut Hair with Tap on Panda or Penguin's hair * Dry Panda or Penguin's hair * Make a Curly hair * You can also Straitning their hair * Make a colorful hair with given hair shades Dress Up : * Lots of possibilities with dressup * Use of multiple Accessories * Create a nice Fashionable Panda & Penguin Features: * 3 types of different game integration in single app * Different options available including hair salon,makeover,dresses, * Lots of different combinations/looks possible. * Post its new look on social networking sites * Save the final look in your photo album. * In your phone, make different photos with your friends and assign the photos as display pics for their contact name by saving your creation in photo gallery and than assigning to the contact number.

Join the world of Kick and Think in this puzzling letters game. The medieval world is full of untold stories, creatures and royalty, weaved in between the lines of reality and etching through history to be rewritten into legends! Battle your way to save the princess whilst you challenge evil minds that hold her friends in captivity. Play along and get your family to help you on your quest! Kick and Think is a classic, word arrangement game, with amusing levels and brain-bending words. Save creatures and other animals from witches schemes and evil scams! Then, battle your way to solve the word in the fastest time possible! The game is simple, tap objects around the scene to unlock letters! Remember, you’re against the clock so don’t waste time! Once you’ve collected all the letters, you must arrange them into the right place to create the codeword that sets the animal free or unlocks a door! Rescue the princess and her friends! This game tests your mind and spelling skills whilst being fun and puzzling! This is a great game for all ages, so what are you waiting for? Help to save the princess before it’s too late!

THIS IS NOT THE GAME--THIS IS A SINGLE-PLAYER COLLECTIBLE MAP APP. This officially licensed Aliens Colonial Marines Map App is the perfect digital companion for the game's single-player experience. This app contains all the single-player maps complete with every collectible in the game. It reveals where to find every Dog Tag, Audio Log and Legendary Weapon. Utilize the app's tracking function to show which collectibles have been found.

The Future Shop App for Android offers Canadians the most seamless mobile shopping experience. Use the lightning-fast search engine to shop our entire catalogue, get product info, read reviews and ratings, check specifications, and access hundreds of Tech Spotlight articles on the hottest tech products. Make your purchase from your Android smartphone for delivery anywhere in Canada or pick up your reserved order in store. The App also lets you save products and manage your shopping cart right from your phone. Get driving directions to your closest store, via the built-in GPS feature, or find a Future Shop store by entering your postal code in our store locator. This free App is compatible with all generations of Android. Features of the Future Shop Android App include: • Browse and search a variety of products with detailed specs and pictures • Find the latest, hottest items on sale • A desktop widget alerts you when your favourite items go on sale • Browse the weekly flyer for the best deals • Check stock levels in-store and online right from the app • Rate and review products directly from your Android device • Make purchases quickly with our faster, more robust checkout process • Get the stuff that you want faster with Reserve and Pick Up • Use geo-location to find a store close to you • Scan QR codes to get more information about products • Save products to Favourites and come back to them later • Join hundreds of tech discussions in our Tech Forum • Get daily tech insights from those in the know at Tech Blog
release_text: We’ve added some new features! • View delivery estimates on every product page • Know when to expect delivery before you buy • Use geolocation or change your delivery destination manually and watch the estimate update • Easily see what delivery options you have and how long they’ll take even before checkout • Improved availability information lets you know if an item is available online, in-store, or both • Minor bug fixes

Awesome navigator for metro of different cities around the world. All maps are interactive, relevant and attractive. For example, you can find station nearby to Red Square. You can as well find closest station to Big Ben in London, to Eiffel Tower in Paris, etc..; ✔ Search for closest station using GPS; ✔ Prompt which metro car to take to exit to the city or change the line (NYC, Moscow, SPb, Kiev, London, Barcelona, Paris, Munich); ✔ Easy controls. You can get a route in few clicks; ✔ Voice search – search for stations, routes, POI; ✔ Tourist's POI – cafés, night clubs, cinemas, shops and other places of interest nearby to metro stations; ✔ Airports and railway stations located on the map; ✔ Send your route as text via SMS or as picture via Email; ✔ Favourite stations, routes and closed stations; ✔ Schemes of stations for some maps; ✔ Metro maps of many cities around the world in single app; Additional features for metro which are covered by GSM network or Wi-Fi: ✔ Current location on metro plan; ✔ Voice prompts while navigating; ✔ Start station is chosen automatically; ✔ Reminder to exit the train; Available metro schemes: ★ USA ★ 1. *** TRIAL VERSION OF DOUBLETWIST ALARM CLOCK - TRIAL EXPIRES AFTER 7 DAYS *** doubleTwist Alarm Clock is hands-down the most beautiful alarm app in the Google Play Store, following doubleTwist's history of simple, intuitive, highly functional, gorgeous apps, as seen with the doubleTwist Player media app. Gently awaken to your favorite medley. Or violently rouse yourself from deep slumber with death metal. The choice is yours! Alarm Clock Features: • Two clock modes: flip clock and analog clock, includes nightstand dim mode. • Set alarm through one of four modes: Time, Sleep Cycle, Quick Nap, or Sunrise. Sleep Cycle helps pick optimal wake-up times to correspond with sleep cycles. • Set multiple alarms. • Set recurring alarms (weekdays, weekends, etc). • Set a custom label for your alarms. • Choose from built-in alarm sounds and ringtones or wake up to your favorite song or playlist (requires free doubleTwist Player app). • Set adjustable fade in time for alarm volume. • View time pending until next scheduled alarm. • Set snooze duration and alarm volume. • Swiss Clock live wallpaper. doubleTwist Alarm Clock is handmade with ❤ in San Francisco. If you have comments or feedback on our app, or need additional support, please visit http://www.doubletwist.com/contact/ . Thanks! Use of this app is subject to the doubleTwist Terms of Use and Privacy Policy: http://www.doubletwist.com/legal/ *** TRIAL VERSION OF DOUBLETWIST ALARM CLOCK - TRIAL EXPIRES AFTER 7 DAYS ***

description: Get real-time bus arrival predictions and the published schedule for San Francisco Muni, SF Muni, sfmuni, the bus agency serving San Francisco, California. FEATURES + Get real-time bus arrival and departure predictions + Get bus route schedules + Get predictions of bus stops near you + Favorite your stops so that you have immediate access to their predictions. + Favorite your routes so that you can quickly lookup a list of stops and get their predictions. + Get predictions from other routes that share the same stop all in one screen. + Simple, straightforward, and easy to use. + Route Maps, Stop Locations, and Vehicle Locations FEEDBACK Please let us know of any feedback that you may have. We want to make this application as useful to you as possible. If you find any problems, don't hesitate to contact us. This application uses NextBus services.

With the help of zen sounds including water running, birds in a forest, or distant ocean waves, reach a peaceful state of mind to increase your meditation. Perfect to release tension while massaging or during a yoga session. Additionally, Relax Melodies Meditation is indented to help you sleep. You can now forget about insomnia and start sleeping better. White noise sounds are specifically designed to overcome insomnia by taking your mind into a deep state of relaxation. It makes the best of each of your sleep cycle while sleeping. Ideal when taking a nap or before going to bed. Sleeping has never been easier. ☆ HOW IT WORKS ☆ 1. Create your ambience by selecting relaxing sounds and one or more melody that you like. 2. Slip naturally into a meditative state or a deep sleep 3. Wake up rejuvenated 4. Repeat steps over whenever needed! ☆ FEATURES ☆ ✓ 36 high quality ambient sounds including 3 binaural beats frequencies for brainwave entrainment. ✓ Option to upgrade to 102 sounds with 3 additional binaural beats ✓ Create your own ambience mix by combining sounds with relaxing music and adjusting their volumes ✓ Includes 4 mixes by default for easy startup ✓ Create, Save, Name, and Replay your mixes as favorites ✓ Timer system to set a duration to your favorite mixes. Ideal when you’re going to sleep! ✓ Beautiful interface with high quality images ✓ Option to upgrade to play your mixes in the background. Relax while using your other apps! ✓ Yoga Ready! Combats Insomnia! ☆ INCLUDE MOST POPULAR WHITE NOISE, MUSIC MELODY & MORE ☆ ♬ White Noise ♬ Rain and Wind ♬ Storm Waves ♬ Tropical Forest ♬ Summer Birds ♬ Water ♬ Ocean ♬ Thunder storm ♬ Wild River ♬ Winter Wind ♬ Tropical Rain ♬ and more! ☆ A UNIQUE EXPERIENCE ☆ Simulate relaxing environments that will make you believe that you are actually there! If the sound of a storm and rain helps you relax for example, you can create tons of combination right out of the box! Simply select the storm and rain sound and adjust their volume individually. Set the volume of the storm louder than the rain sound to put yourself right in the middle of the storm. Lower the storm sound volume to create a different effect such as a quiet evening in the country. For a peaceful moment in the middle of the nature, use different water stream sounds such as a calm water river and add bird chips to it. Alternatively, combine the sound of the ocean or water hitting the ocean shore with a relaxing music melody to simulate a day at the beach. Remove the melody sound for a more focused experience on the ocean. ☆ TRY IT NOW ☆ Although it is commonly used by yoga users, Relax Melodies Meditation can be used in any context to help you relax and sleep. Each melody, white noise, and music track included are optimized to help you overcome insomnia and improve your sleeping experience. Furthermore, proper meditation and relaxation can not only impact your body and mind health positively but also improve your productivity. Relaxing, sleeping, working out and Yoga have never been better! Download it now and let us know how it worked for you! And also don't forget our blog http://helpmetosleep.org/
release_text: - User interface improvements - Added Asian Duet in free version - Many bug fixes Hope you enjoy the app. Don't hesitate to contact us!

description: Make your telephone or tablet speak to you with Voxygen’s Best-of-Vox Voices. The Electra voice reads aloud any French text. Get rid of flat voices with no expression or personality! Discover Natural and Fun Voices, and listen to a sample here: http://www.best-of-vox.com/android . Follow us on Twitter http://twitter.com/VoxygenSAS to keep up with new voices! Like us on Facebook http://www.facebook.com/voxygen.fr ★ What is it for? Various ways to use Best-of-Vox voices: voice guidance, E-books and SMS reading, ring tones, alarm clocks, Android accessibility features with Talkback and much more. Share your messages from the Best-of-Vox application on your preferred social networks: SoundCloud, WhatsApp, Skype, hubiC, Evernote, Drive, etc. ★ How does it work? The Best-of-Vox application allows you to type or paste text and to have it read out aloud by the voice that you have chosen. You can then save it as a ringtone or share it with your friends on SoundCloud ! From your emails, your Internet browser, or any compatible application, select some text and make your Best-of-Vox voice read it aloud by simply clicking on the “share” menu. ★ How to install it? Only 2 clicks to activate the Best-of-Vox voice in the Android settings that you reach from the application's main menu. Watch the installation video and follow the instructions. Please note: with Android versions prior to 4.0, one additional first click is required at the bottom of the settings list in order to activate the voice. ★ How to fix an occasional problem? – Cannot hear the Best-of-Vox: First ensure that the volume of your device is sufficient. If this is the case, than it may be that the voice's data was corrupted during or after its installation. In order to reinitiate the voice, please perform the following steps: go to “Android Settings / Applications / Manage applications / Best-of-Vox voice”, click on “Force stop”, click on “Clear data”, return to the home screen, ensure that the device is connected to a Wi-Fi network (which is required to download the data), restart the Best-of-Vox application, wait for the download and data preparation to be fully completed, enter some text and click on the “play” button. Questions? Please contact android@voxygen.fr . Credits: Moteur de synthèse vocale / Voix de synthèse / Synthèse vocale / Speech synthesis / TTS / tts / Text To Speech / Texttospeech / Speech synthesis engine / TTS engine / Synthetic voice / TTS voice : http://www.best-of-vox.com/android

Super Chicken Nugget Run Jumping Run game is fun for everyone and guaranteed to bring you hours of fun.Help Agent P Nugget, AKA Super Nugget, roll, fly and have some fun. Let Super Nugget run and roam free by jumping over obstacles and rolling through the troubles and trials to reach his friends on the frontier. They have Tiny Monsters and Giant Monsters. Some Chase You and some jump out to eat you at the last moment. Run away as fast as you can but look for tiny monsters hiding by the hair salon and university food court. To survive the hungry animals and not die, Agent P Nugget has a ways to run, jump and bounce out of danger. Can You Escape the monster invaders and other dumb ways to die? Features:- Tappy Controls so simple a 2 year old can tap tap to play- Cute playable Super Nugget character - Find powerups for free along the way. - Under 50 megabytes so download it anywhere, anytime!- Tablet support!

description: Socialize for Android brings you Socialize for Facebook Messenger. This application allows you to connect with your friends on Facebook and chat just like you would through your Facebook account except you can do it with style. Socialize for Facebook Messenger has all black backgrounds with white and blue text as well as custom HD images. Please Rate and Comment Socialize For Facebook Messenger Features -Send and Receive messages through your Facebook account -Push notifications -Ability to text message friends if they are not on Facebook -Ability to Have Group Conversations -Individual controls for each conversations -Add Pictures to Messages -Add Location to Messages -Plus lots more.... Check out my apps by searching Socialize for Android or clicking at bottom where it says more by this developer. Currently out are Socialize for Facebook (7 different colors), Socialize for Twitter (& different colors), and GoSocial (Theme for Go Launcher EX) This is a ONE time Purchase therefore you will never be asked to pay for a subscription There are absolutely NO Ads whatsoever in any Socialize product nor with there ever be If you are having any problem at all please email me first and ask for help before leaving a negative comment. I will try to do my best to answer you as quick as possible and get the problem fixed. I can not respond to the comments left here or any other application that is out unless you email me. If having issues seeing pictures or connecting to your Facebook account please try the suggestions first before emailing me... 1. Restart Phone 2. Connect to a WiFi network 3. Check to make sure your user name and password are correct. Only one account can be connected at a time. 4. Uninstall and re-install to see if it fixes the problem. Sometimes the market messes up the download of the application and it does'nt work. If you do email please include the following to better speed up the process of fixing the Issue 1. Name of Phone and Service Provider 2. Version of Android on Phone (Can be found in settings/about phone) 3. Specific problem (IE: Don't just say does'nt work) 4. Be patient as I do this as a hobby and not out of an office so Im not always at a desk to help right away. Socialize for Android, Socialize for Facebook, and Socialize for Facebook Messenger are in no way affiliated with Facebook.com or Facebook as a Whole. Please do not email them with questions about this application because they will have no idea what you are talking about. Socialize for Facebook Messenger was built using open source software that can be found with in a link in the about section of the menu in this application. Please visit my discussion site found either in the about tab in the menu or at the bottom of this description.

The App requires a ComIP, ComGSM or Chiron IRIS module connected to a Premier or Premier Elite control panel * Features include: Smartkey. Allows you to arm, part arm, disarm and reset you alarm system. It also allows you to trigger up to 3 outputs (control panel dependent) which can be used to control lighting etc. Virtual Keypad. Access your system from the keypad as if you were using a real keypad. Panel Status. View panel type, firmware version, panel voltage and current consumption (control panel dependent). Event Log. View the last 20 log events. Zone Status. View the status of zones and omit zones on the fly. Remote Control. Arm, part arm, disarm and reset any selected area. Omit any selected zone. Tools. Anti-code reset. Generate protected UDL passcode (required for basic and standard app). Sites profiles. Allows connection to up to nine pre-defined site profiles. Start Screen. Select which screen the App starts on. Supported Languages. Bulgarian Czech Danish Dutch English Finnish French Norwegian Slovakian Spanish Swedish Portuguese Default user details are: User Name: Master Passcode: 123456 Please note that this app has been designed to be used by installation engineers. Access to engineering features like Anti-code, Protected UDL generation, Zone status and Remote control will only be available once the app is unlocked. To unlock the app, go to setting, help and select 'Unlock App' then follow the instructions on the screen. Unlocking of the app will be allowed for genuine installation companies only after validation has been performed. A unlock code will not be provided to anyone other than these companies. The App will still function as an advanced user App if it is not unlocked. * Please ensure the Premier Elite control panel has the latest firmware 2.09. This is required to stop the ComIP disconnecting. Alternatively, set the ComIP for serial mode. Details of which can be provided upon request. Version 1.0.3 Remembers Last Site used. Event Log progress bar added. Smartkey now shows the correct status and operates correctly for Elite 640 (first 16 areas only). Smartkey shows unable to arm warning when zones are active. Zone status is now available for Elite and Premier after first connection. Aux mode supports Premier International panels. Increased number of sites to 50. Translations updated. Panel version routine changed. Connected panel type saved. Improved log event filtering.
release_text: Removed target version to stop crashes in Android 4.4 Made text black for newer versions of Android. Stopped app from relogging in when 'Auto-Login' is enabled. Increase timeouts for connections to help slow connections. Added disconnecting warning to stop issues when panel programmed for ComIP. Smartkey can now be used to control individual areas by touching below the bottom buttons. Fixed issues with keypad not changing from portrait to landscape and back.

Airレジは、ビジネスをする上で大切な会計業務を支える無料POSレジアプリです。 お店での使いやすさを第一に、実際に利用する人が求める多くの機能を実現しました。 必要なのはAndroid端末とインターネット環境だけ。 もう高い利用料を払ってPOSレジを導入する必要はありません。 Airレジは初期費用も月額利用料も不要です。 このアプリをダウンロードし、Airレジのサイトでアカウントを作れば Android端末をレジとしてご利用いただけます。 注文や会計、売上管理を軽やかに、確実に支えるAirレジがあれば、 あなたが大切にしたい「おもてなし」に充分に力を注ぐことができるようになります。 【Airレジを使いはじめるための3ステップ】 　① 無料のAirレジアプリをダウンロードします。 　②メールアドレスを入力してアカウントを登録し、Airレジアプリにログインします。 　③ 必要に応じて、Airレジで売りたい商品、割引メニュー、決済方法、テーブル情報を登録します。 【手数料】 　Airレジは初期費用、月額利用料とも無料です。 【Airレジの主な機能】 1) カスタマイズ 　　Airレジをあなたの思いどおりにカスタマイズしましょう。 　　「商品」「割引メニュー」「決済方法」「レシート」「テーブル情報」は、 　　簡単にあなたのお店に合わせてカスタマイズできます。 　　※席を管理する必要のない小売店では、席の管理を利用しない設定もご利用いただけます。 2) 席の管理（設定した場合のみ） 　お客様の人数、空いている座席、席ごとのタイマーを簡単に管理できます。 3）注文入力 　　ご注文は店舗内の複数のAndroid端末、iPad、iPhoneなどから入力が可能です。 　　操作は、端末の画面をタッチするだけで、簡単にスピーディーに行えます。 4） 会計 　　お会計は、お客様から受取った金額を入力して、さっとスライドするだけです。 　　割引メニューや支払方法なども自由に設定してご利用いただけます。 5） 売上管理 　　いつでもどこでもお店の売上が分かります。 　　レジで受けた情報はリアルタイムにクラウドサーバに連携され、 　　売上額や客の入り状況をいつでもPC・スマホからリアルタイムにご確認いただけます。 　　また、日次・月次での集計もご確認いただけます。 6）周辺機器 　　専用のレシートプリンタ、キャッシュドロワーを接続可能です。はAirレジサイトからご購入いただけます。 　　(詳細はAirレジサイトからご覧ください)　 https://airregi.jp/ 7）セキュリティ 　　お店の情報は、リクルートのクラウドサーバーに安全に保管されます。 　　国内最高レべルの安全基準を満たした、信頼性の高い環境をご提供します。 　　※株式会社リクルートホールディングスは「プライバシーマーク」使用許諾事業者として認定されています。 8）サポート 　　初期のセットアップや、操作方法でわからないことがあった時は、Airレジサイトのヘルプメニューで 　　情報をご覧いただけます。また、アプリの問い合わせ画面からサポートセンターに 　　直接お問い合わせいただくことができます。 【推奨環境】 OS：Android4.1.2以上 推奨デバイス（Phone）：XperiaTM A SO-04E , Galaxy S4 推奨デバイス（Tablet）：Nexus7 , Nexus10, XperiaTM Tablet Z

description: With DslrDashboard you can control you Nikon DSLR or any other PTP compatible camera. You need an USB OTG cable for connecting your camera to your phone. Not all phones/tablets are compatible. You need at least 4.x Android or higher with USB host support. For more information check: https://dslrdashboard.googlecode.com and http://forum.xda-developers.com/showthread.php?t=1256583 . Instant Guide to DslrDashboard by Dmitri Popov: http://dmpop.homelinux.com/dslrdashboard/ http://www.amazon.com/dp/B005H86Y9G https://gumroad.com/l/dslrdashboard This app is free with no ads so please don't add negative comments just because you ROM don't have the required USB support. And no it's not only the kernel that needs to have USB support but your Android to. Some of Android 2.3.x have the required USB support but not all, so before you give a negative comment at least check if your ROM supports USB devices (USB accessory support is not enough) Constructive comments are welcome. DslrDashboard feautres: Remote capture, Change camera properties, Browse images on camera, Transfer images from camera to Android device, Preview images (jpg and raw), Live view, Live view histogram, Manual focus movement while in live view, Start movie recording (only on camera models that support it), Custom bracketing (up to 9 images), Focus stacking, Time-lapse (simple and advanced with control file and ability to move focus and send commands to Arduino), Sound initiated capture (with spectral display and frequency/intensity selector, Nikon flash commander dialog (CLS) for easy settings (only on camera models that support it), DoF calculator. Custom profiles for camera properties, custom bracketing, focus stacking, flash commander Remote control over wireless network (Android devices must be on same network) Support for WU-1a/1b adapter (PTP/IP) LRTimelapse help screen - read more about it at https://code.google.com/p/dslrdashboard/wiki/lrtimelapse
release_text: fix for Canon users can't enter LrTimelapse screen fix for Canon LV focus buttons added D5300, D610 and Df support fix for Canon image format property some small Canon fixes updated LibRaw to latest version updated to OpenCV latest version OpenCV is now boundled with the apk so no need for OpenCV Manager this version will only work with the latest DDServer version if you use the network option (OpenWRT) get it here https://drive.google.com/folderview?id=0BxMZ8XY3H2wiNmtrS0FtLTJxR1E&usp=sharing

description: High Definition 360 Panoramic Camera with a 3d Viewer in a Snap? - take full 360 panoramas instantly and don't miss any beauty around you, - grab the smallest details in night or day with the 4K photo resolution, you will be able to produce up to 40MP panoramic photos, - teleport back to your favorite location and view it using our incredible 3d viewer, share it with friends on Facebook and Twitter for the same 3d viewing experience, - be the first to take a gorgeous panoramic selfie and surprise your friends and loved ones, - discover more than 1.3 Million panoramas shared from all over the world, - never worry about your panoramas by using our free and safe online storage, - create breath-taking panoramas with advanced camera controls such as Flash modes and 3 different Exposure settings, - follow other panorama lovers and be notified when they upload new pictures, - edit description, tags, geolocation and privacy settings, - get embed codes to insert interactive panoramas in your blog. And only for pro users: - HD mode brings 4 times more pixels up to 40MP for a full 360 panorama, - external SD Card storage support - HDR mode is available on high-end devices such as S5, - save individual shots, - and obviously ad free. We listen and help (support@DerManDar.com). We bet you will be impressed, try us! "The easiest-to-use panoramic picture app." - The Wall-Street Journal. "It’s really hard to take a bad panorama." - Macworld. "A 360-degree shot in about 20 seconds." - Business Insider. "I was definitely impressed..." - Techcrunch. ★★★★★"Absolutely fantastic app! I swear there are magical unicorns or elves inside my phone stitching these photos together. It's the only way I can explain it." Frankly speaking, we don't employ magical creatures, but our image processing algorithms analyze data from several components including gyro, compass and accelerometer sensors. Please note: - our app only shoots cylindrical panoramas, - we only stitch the pictures you take with the app, - your pictures are *not* automatically uploaded unless you explicitly request it. DerManDar means all-around in Lebanese slang. We noticed too many people had a problem spelling it, so we shortened it to DMD. Have you checked our new app: DMD Topic? Create an unforgettable story out of a single picture!
release_text: V2.5.1: minor bug corrections V2.5: ability to edit online panoramas, report abusive content, copy embed codes, option to share panoramas as images or links V2.4: better UI + feed + users interaction V2.3: bug corrections + 9 languages support V2.1.1 - 2.2: minor bug corrections V2.1: -HD mode, 4 times more pixels up to 40MP for a full 360 panorama. -External SD Card storage support. -HDR mode is available on high-end devices such as S5. -New icons in the shooting view.

Societe de transport de Laval bus tracker GPS Real times countdown, vehicles map live NOW YOU CAN SAVE YOUR FAVORITE STOPS see vehicles as they move on the map updates every 20 sec arrival times for stops updates every 20 sec With this app you don’t have to wait at the bus stop for the bus to come. It will tell you exactly when the bus will come to your stop. You can see the vehicles on the map as they move. First select the route, direction and the stop that you want to get bus arrival times. This app will give you exact time bus arrival at your selected stop.

Simple, yet dynamic application that allows you to track your GPA for several semesters. Add course titles, credits and grades and seamlessly move from semester to semester. Project changes in grades at the click of a button, and forecast how you think the next semester may turn out!

description: Find the words of letters. At each level it is necessary to find the three words, one diagonally one vertical and one horizontal Words can be written from left to right and right to left, etc. You can use a hint by clicking the number of tips in the status bar. The game is not so simple as it might seem at first glance! Look for the word length of only 5 to 8 characters! The dictionary also includes unusual and rarely used words. The game can be played in two languages ​​English and Russian.

description: In cleaning games you must be tidy and neat while keeping your eyes open for the hidden objects part. You are a housemaid that has very little time to do her job and clean the house before the owner, a young business lady, gets home from work. Features: 2 rooms to be cleaned 3 cleaning tools (vacuum cleaner, sweep and duster) 25+ items to be found and put back in their place. a hint button to get you out of trouble Make sure you clean up the apartment as fast as you can and shut down the computer and T.V. so the owner won't know you didn't really kept the schedule. When you clean up the house, the tidy part is not the only thought you must keep, but keeping all the stuff well-ordered and methodical arranged might also be a challenge for a housemaid. Play our game, enjoy it and please review!

You can learn Japanese law with this app. This application provides the Compendium of Japanese Laws for Android mobile phone and tablet PC. Users can browse 7713 Japanese laws and regulations including the Constitution of Japan, Acts, Cabinet Orders, Imperial Ordinances, the Cabinet Office Ordinances, and Ministerial Ordinances using the Data Distribution System from the Ministry of Internal Affairs and Communications. In addition, it has an availability to view on the Rules of Civil Procedure, the Rules of Criminal Procedure, the Rules of Civil Execution and the Rules of Civil Provisional Remedies which is not provided in the Data Distribution System. Since each legal data stored in the SD card, it is also able to viewed offline. Furthermore, it has an easy one-click access to the English version which is from the XML data of Japanese Law Translation Database System sourced from the Ministry of Justice. This application is made ​​for all legal professions. The main function is as follows. Article search, Keyword search Views of English version (partly) You can add almost all the laws and regulations from 7713 Japanese laws and regulations(Japanese only） Making notes on articles Attaching sticky notes Display or non-display setting of laws and regulations and sorting display order Automatic saving of data in SD card Backup and Restore the list of laws you selected We develop not only thinking law practitioner as lawyers, judicial scriveners and administrative scriveners, etc., but also all legal parties such as law students, law school students, students study the judicial examination, and legal apprentices. *In the case not all articles displayed on the screen(displayed halfway), please re-download the relevant laws and regulations in the " laws and regulations setting" (click on the icon of the floppy disk). *If an error is caused by updating, it is recommended to uninstall and re-install. Please notify us the actual situation when an error has occurred. *There is no difference in the function among AndRoppo and AndRoppo Pro. Thank you!

O APP permite que o usuário selecione programas e eventos favoritos para receber um alerta no início das exibições. Combat application gives access to the main news about MMA, everything about the UFC and videos, in addition to providing all the channel programming. The APP allows the user to select favorite programs and events to receive an alert at the start of views. It's entirely free!   - The main news and everything about UFC fighters of the organization.   - Videos with the best moments of the biggest MMA events in Brazil and the UFC.   - Complete program with Combat warns you not miss any program or channel event.

description: This is a word quiz game. As some words become difficult to uncover, you are allowed to use a coin to help you. You can use a coin by clicking on it so that the current word is revealed and you can follow through to the next word. The game starts with 3 coins but you will earn a new one at every additional 100 points that you make. You guess the word by clicking the letters in the correct order. Four languages: English, Portuguese, Spanish and French. Enjoy and have fun!
release_text: New design, new graphics, new icon, and added some new words .

description: alpenvereinaktiv.com - Das Toureninformationssystem der Alpenvereine DAV, OeAV und AVS Bergtouren, Skitouren, Hochtouren, Klettersteige, topografischen Karten und vieles, vieles mehr. Die Grundlage unserer App bildet eine zoombare, topografische Karte im Maßstab 1:25.000. Die Karte ist online oder offline verfügbar und wird für den Alpenraum in zwei unterschiedlichen Darstellungen (Sommer / Winter) angeboten. Die Karten können überall im deutschen, österreichischen und Südtiroler Alpenraum zur Positionsbestimmung & Tourennavigation eingesetzt werden. Das Herzstück der App ist die große, immer weiter wachsende Tourendatendank. Du kannst tausende Ski-, Berg-, Hoch- und Klettertouren sowie Freerideabfahrten, Klettersteige und noch viele weitere Aktivitäten nach den unterschiedlichsten Kriterien auswählen: - Alphabetische Auflistung - Auflistung nach Entfernung - Filterung nach Sportart - Suche nach Ort - Qualität: Nach Wertigkeit der Tour - Anforderung: Die Touren können nach Strecke, Schwierigkeit oder Dauer sortiert werden In den Tourenbeschreibungen erfährst Du alle wissenswerten Facts inkl. Höhenprofil. Zuhause kannst Du im Tourenplaner unter www.alpenvereinaktiv.com mit der Maus die Wegstrecken auf den Karten abfahren, Wegpunkte setzen, Beschreibungen ergänzen und Bilder hochladen. Ähnliche Funktionen kannst Du auch in der App nutzen. Du kannst in den topografischen Karten Wegpunkte setzen und Dir das Live-Höhenprofil der geplanten Tour anzeigen lassen. In Notfällen kann mittels Notruffunktion eine Verbindung zur Rettungsstelle hergestellt werden, wobei Deine aktuelle Position auf dem Display angezeigt wird. Ein wichtiger Hinweis: In der Toolbox steht auch eine Höhenmesser zur Verfügung. Die Höhenanzeigen basieren auf dem aktuellen Standort und dem Höhenmodell aus der Karte. Wichtig: der Höhenmesser ist nicht barometrisch kalibrierbar und deshalb nur als grober Richtwert zu verstehen. Er ersetzt nicht einen korrekt geeichten Höhenmesser. Achtung: Im Ausland können hohe Roaming-Kosten entstehen. Bei Nutzung der App im Hintergrund bei aktiviertem GPS Empfang kann sich die Akkulaufzeit deines Smartphones verkürzen! alpenvereinaktiv.com - The Tour Information System of the Alpine clubs DAV, OeAV and AVS Mountaineering, ski touring, high tours, mountain climbing, topographic maps, and much, much more. The basis of our app provides a zoomable, topographic map, scale 1: 25,000. The map is online or offline, and is available for the Alpine region in two different representations (summer / winter) offered. The cards can be used anywhere in the German, Austrian and South Tyrolean Alpine space for positioning and navigation tour. The heart of the app is the large, ever-expanding tour dates thanks. You can select thousands skiing, mountain, high and climbing and freeriding, climbing and many other activities according to different criteria: - Alphabetical listing - List by distance - Filtering by sport - Browse by location - Quality: To value the Tour - Requirement: The tours can be sorted by distance, difficulty or duration In the tour descriptions you can find out everything worth knowing facts incl. Height profile. You can leave home with the mouse the routes on the maps, set waypoints, add descriptions and upload images in tour planner at www.alpenvereinaktiv.com. Similar functions You can also use the app. You can set waypoints and let you display the live height profile of the planned tour in the topographic maps. In an emergency, be prepared for the emergency department by emergency function a compound where your current position is displayed on the screen. An important note: In the Toolbox is also a altimeter available. The altitude readings are based on the current location and the elevation model of the map. Important: the barometric altimeter is calibrated and therefore to be understood only as a rough estimate. It does not replace a properly calibrated altimeter. Warning: Abroad high roaming charges may apply. By using the app in the background when enabled GPS receiver, the battery life of your smartphone can skip this step!
release_text: Vielen Dank für Euer Feedback! - Bugfix im LLB: Vormittag und Nachmittag werden nun korrekt unterschieden - Deutliche Beschleunigung des Kartendownloads - Reduzierung von Abstürzen im Zusammenhang mit Speicherproblemen - Verbesserte Orts- und Regionssuche, es wird nun auch nach Hütten gesucht - Tourenplaner erkennt nun UTM- und Dezimal-Koordinaten - Bugfix bei Ortssuche im Tourenplaner - Download von GPX-Dateien im Mehr-Menü der Tourdetailseite - Anzeige der Anzahl von Inhalten in jeder Region

description: The AliExpress app is an online shopping marketplace at your fingertips. Millions of people from all around the world have found some of their favorite items through us. Perhaps some of your neighbors or friends have already fallen in love with shopping on AliExpress. Here’s why: Our customers have access to great products at incredible prices. Buying directly from sellers in China means you can buy the same products you can get anywhere else, but for much lower prices! Buyers on AliExpress have access to a choice of 100+ million products. You can find just about anything you wish for among our large product selection. You can get anything from clothing, shoes and accessories, to car parts, electronics and baby care items. You can even find a range of different customizable products too. Another reason to fall in love with AliExpress is that we give free shipping on over 75% of our products! In addition, the AliExpress app offers great value with daily deals, regular promotions and thousands of coupon giveaways. The AliExpress app comes packed with features and functions designed to give you a safe and joyous shopping experience. Use our app to: ★Shop by product category ★Conveniently search for products with search filters ★Read buyer reviews ★Create Wish Lists ★Share products with friends via email, Facebook or other social media ★Make secure online payments ★Track your packages ★Receive instant updates on your order status ★Manage your orders ★Chat with sellers ★Get Buyer Protection on all your purchases The AliExpress app is for people who love convenient shopping without the extra cost. Find out what value we’ve got in store for you! ADDITIONAL INFORMATION Language Support The AliExpress App is available in English, Spanish, Portuguese, Russian, Turkish，Italian, Hebrew, German, French, Thai and Bahasa Indonesia. Feedback: Get in touch with us, we love hearing from you! If you find any areas for improvement while using the app, or have any ideas to make shopping on the app even more convenient, please let us know! You can leave feedback in the app by selecting “More Options” -> “App Feedback”, or leave feedback in Google Play. We look forward to hearing from you! AliExpress.com Overview Launched in April 2010, AliExpress is a global retail marketplace targeted at buyers worldwide. The platform enables consumers from around the world to buy directly from wholesalers and manufacturers in China and have access to a wide variety of products at competitive prices. AliExpress is a business within Alibaba Group. AliExpress offers over 100 million fascinating product listings from a range of over 25 different categories including the following: Apparel & Accessories, Automobiles & Motorcycles, Phones & Telecommunications, Computers & Networking, Consumer Electronics, Beauty & Health, Lights & Lighting, Luggage & Bags, Shoes, Toys & Hobbies, Watches, Jewelry, and many more. AliExpress makes shopping easy and convenient all around the world.
