description: LONG ISLAND, NEW YORK house hunting on the go! Full details, photos and maps plus a GPS locator to find homes near you. Search virtually all homes and properties for sale in the Long Island area. Find open houses from any realtor and get directions directly to them in the app. Save your favorites to revisit again from the app or on MLSLI.com using your personal account. Features: - Find homes near you using your device's built-in GPS locator. - Get driving directions on the go. - Complete and current access to all active MLS-listed homes for sale. - Large color photo galleries with expanded listing details, at your fingertips. - Search by city, ZIP code, price, style and more. - Find open houses near you. - Access your personalized home search account from Results.net. - Save favorites on your phone and share them with your friends via e-mail. - Updated regularly with the newest homes on the market. - Search foreclosures and recently sold homes.

A hyperlinked guide to Infectious Diseases. Over 600 pages of information on antibiotics, organisms and diseases. Intended as a quick reference for non-infectious disease practitioners. Updated monthly from the literature. References link to Pubmed or primary sources (with internet connection). Written over 10 years by a practicing Infectious Disease doctor, voted one of Portlands Best Doctors and a US News and World Report Best Doctor US, proving Lincolns dictum. Future editions to have increased functionality (notes, audio, search, favorites) with increased price. All the content is always available for free at moremark.squarespace.com. Check it out before purchasing. The 'code' behind the version number. 12.6. The June update (6) of 2012. 'Humor' at no extra charge. Reviews for the Uncertain: - Medical App Journal​: 4 Stars "BOTTOM LINE: The Infectious Disease Persiflager’s Guide is an entertaining and engaging overview of infectious diseases, which is well suited for practicing clinicians and public health researchers. The content appears accurate and is highly referenced, although some sections seem to be pending future updates. The affordable price seems well worth the assimilation of current medical content and experience-based knowledge from a practicing expert in the field. http://medicalappjournal.com/review_editorial.php?appsname=Infectious+Disease+Compendium%3A+A+Persiflager%27s+Guide - Mobile Infectious Disease References: From the Bedside to the Beach.​ Clinical Infectious Diseases. ​"The Infectious Diseases Compendium would be perfect for students and residents to review treatment options prior to staffing a consultation with the attending physician or while admitting patients to a medical or surgical service." http://cid.oxfordjournals.org/content/55/1/114.full

Candy Blast is a brand new and crazy Match-3 game! Swap Candy to match 3 or more and create waves of excitement and brilliant visuals! Solve all the puzzles and try to get highScore in each level! Challenge with your friends! Enjoy this social crazy candy casual game! Have fun in this puzzle adventure! How to play: 1 Match 3 or more identical candies. 2 Match the candies until the board transparency to pass level. 3 Eliminate the candies quickly can get extra scores. 4 Do not forget submit you highscores to leaderboard,have fun!! Features: - Sweet and shining Candy, so delicious! - Bomb,Random Bomb,Horizontal light,Vertical light,light Bonus to make the game more cool. - Leaderboards in your friends circle and world. - Easy and fun to play, but a challenge to fully master. - Many challenging puzzles to make the game more addictive. - Tasty graphics with HD UI and cool Effects. - It is suitable for everyone, and play it at any time. Your Bedside clock and Live Wallpaper now come together in a beautiful yet classic form with the all new Classic Digital Clock. From now on, you can carry your bed side clock anywhere with the Classic Digital Clock, the only application on Android that matches the real digital clock both in terms of looks and features. The all new talking clock and hourly chime features make it a perfect companion for any Android device. You can use it as your live wallpaper and make your Home Screen look cooler than ever. Classic Digital Clock has cool themes, that can be changed just by the swipe of your finger and also has built in alarm with snooze functionality. Features: * Beautiful themes that can be changed by swiping the finger * Date and Day indicator * Alarm with Snooze functionality * Digital Clock live wallpaper * Talking Clock * Hourly Chime * 12/24 Hour format display. NOTE: * This is an Ad-supported version of the application. * Upgrade to ad-free version costs only $0.99. * We do *NOT* use any push notification ads.

Real time strategy, tower defense and adventure rpg fuse in one ultimate game: Defense Craft. Especially optimised for large screens.The maps are massive and there are numerous units to control and monsters to battle.HD graphics enhance the dynamic action on screen and bring out the lushness in the varied environments. Get lost in arid deserts and explore snowy wastelands and don't forget to stop off at some of the exotic islands along the way.Pit your units against ferocious knights, accurate archers, grotesque trolls, fearsome orcs, mighty dragons, horrific skeletons and many other enemies.If your units aren't up to battling these varied foes then train them in your castles to toughen them up. Just like in RPG games your soldiers and towers gain experience and become stronger and harder to kill after every fight they survive.Different towers can be built and upgraded to improve their range, damage, speed and strength.Money greases the wheels of war so if you need more then just extract it from your goldmines.Defend your different castles at all costs. Epic medieval battles with tens of enemies ;Special units and powerful magic towers. Real time strategy for tablets and smartphones with big screens.A new breed of RTS strategy games for mobile entertainment that raises the quality bar to unbelievable heights.This game is designed , crafted and published with you in mind! Searching for a strategy game that ticks all the boxes and more? Disappointed with RoboDefense and GraveDefense? Try this.Every map can be conquered using new and varied strategies. This game is intended to be hard, so be prepared! DROIDGAMERS.com: "Hidden Gem. This game blends RTS and Tower Defense into one game with a little RPG wrapped up to finish it off. The graphics will remind you right away of the old PC games you used to play with it's top-down perspective like Ultima while the scenery can be compared to Warcraft 3 or Robo Defense. These combine to bring that old school gaming feel to Android" ANDROIDPOLICE.com: 35 Best New Android Games. "This is no Age of Empires, but Defense Craft Strategy looks like a pretty good real-time strategy/RPG mix" Our team has quality tested all of the maps, some of them are really hard, but it is possible to beat them all with a bit of luck and a lot of skill.If you have difficulties think tactically about different strategies, or ask for the solutions on our website or... just change the difficulty level:) If you have any ideas that can be used to improve this game feel free to let us know and we will add it to the game. Supported tablets: Verizon, ZiiO, Iconia, ViewPad, Transformer, Flyer, Archos, Galaxy Tab, XOOM, Multipad, EliteBook, Streak, ThinkPad, Swift Tab, AT100 and many more...

Great for the visually impaired, for soldering small stuff or just for curious kids. With light mode (on devices with camera flash) capture function, high fps mode, invert function for the visually impaired and many many more options. Please feel free to contact me with any thoughts, suggestions, questions or comments. All the best, and happy studying!

description: Thanks so much for downloading Cute Orange Kitty. It's a free program which will bring new friend to you! And if seriously it will show you running Hamster all over the screen. ★★★★★ "Excellent game, great brain teaser" - Games review ★★★★★ "Not easy and addictive, a real discovery" - Holidaypirates ★★★★★ "So adorable" - Our moms ------------------------------- Do you remember when you were a kid? When did you play with all your toys? Happy and satisfied ... with all scattered on the floor. And then your mother came into the room and she said: "Aaaahhhhhhhhhhh!! I want everything in its place: if I find something on the floor, I will throw it away!" Save the toys is a physics puzzle game where gravity is the enemy, you have managed to save all the toys! Sort all the toys without touching the ground to pass each level. Features: ● Physics puzzle ● 100 levels ● Hours of fun guaranteed ● Full Free ● 100% safe (NO extended permissions) ● Physics brain teaser (use your wits) ● Paow wordpark ● Indie developer And please, share with your friends ;) ------------------------------- Like us on Facebook or follow us on Twitter for help and the latest news: facebook.com/savemytoys.community twitter.com/savemytoys http://www.savemytoys.com

description: Animal Sound Ringtone: is a fun application to learn about the animal kingdom. With this application you will be able to know the different types of animal sounds for your cell phone. Ideal for teaching children about the kingdom have sound and images illustrate the different animals and their environment in which they live. Let children or young people to explore the animal kingdom by learning about the animals visually, by sound and names of animals. You can navigate to a list of various miniature images of animals which can navigate by sliding your finger on the screen from top to bottom. ★ ★ ★ ★ ★ Features ★ ★ ★ ★ ★ ★ Just select or press the picture of the animal you want to hear the sound and it will open a window where you play the sound. ★ From the list of images of animals, if you hold down on the image will appear some options to save that sound as a ringtone on your phone and you can also share this app with your friends... ★ ★ ★ ★ ★ Cover ★ ★ ★ ★ ★ Available for United States, England, UK, Australia, North America, USA and all English-speaking countries. ★ ★ ★ ★ ★ Sound type ★ ★ ★ ★ ★ The application has a variety of animal sounds that will increase with future enhancements and upgrades, then types: Sound Bee, eagle, antelope, squirrel, ass, whale, buffalo, owl, horse, camel, canary, pig, chimpanzee, crocodile, rabbit, crow, snake, dolphin, elephant, hedgehog, seal, hen, rooster, cat, cricket, crane, cheetah, wild boar, komodo, lion, wolf, sea lion, raccoon, walrus, mosquito, bat ostrich, bear, dove, panther, parrot, duck, turkey, dog, rhino, grasshopper, frog, bell, sheep, tiger, zebra, cow. Type Reptiles: Most reptiles have adapted to terrestrial life, but eventually it was discovered that some live in water. A tough and scaly skin is one of its adaptations. Other adaptations that have contributed to the success of the reptiles on land are, among others, well-developed lungs including a double circulatory system circuit, excretory system that conserves water, strong limbs, internal fertilization and terrestrial eggs shell. Besides the reptiles can control their body temperature changing place. Type birds: Birds are vertebrates, warm-blooded, walking, jumping or just hold on the extremities later, while the forelimbs are modified as wings, like many other unique anatomical features are adaptations to fly, although not fly. Their bodies are covered with feathers and today's birds a toothless horny beak. To reproduce lay eggs to hatch. Type Mammals. They evolved beings with the body covered with hair, are warm-blooded and stop living their young (viviparous), which feed on milk produced by the glands of the female breast. They are tetrapods because they have four limbs, live on land although some have adapted to water or fly. Type Fish. Most primitive group of vertebrates which evolved the other groups. They live in seas, rivers and breathe through gills that allow them to absorb oxygen from the water. They are cold blooded and most are oviparous. They can be cartilaginous skeleton (rays, sharks) or skeleton (sardines, tuna, trout). Enjoy it, we welcome your suggestions to improve this app. AMDROID

description: このアプリはニッポン放送のケータイサイト「オールナイトニッポンモバイル」で販売していたトークを数回分まとめて１つにまとめたもので、ちょっとお得にお求めいただけます。ファイルサイズが大きいので、なるべくWiFi環境でのダウンロードをおすすめします。 ※初回起動時のみ、アプリは認証のために通信を行います。 2012年3月配信　収録時間＝約59分 1:36枚目！？ガキさん最後のシングルはカッコよく決めるよ！▽2:矢島ちゃんの話で白熱！「私やっぱり性格悪いなって身に染みました！」（さゆ）▽3:ガキさん最後のツアーのオススメ！去年は生田が衣装なしで出るはずだった！？▽4:質問コーナー！だけどまぁちゃんのエピソードだけで終わっちゃった…▽5:ガキさんにラーメンブーム到来＆後輩からの愛にちょっとたじろぐ先輩2人…▽6:フリートークが盛り上がりすぎて前後編に！前編はおでんで盛り上がったりしてます！▽7:フリートーク後編はまたまた10期エピソードで大爆笑！さゆみんの鼻も暴走！ このコンテンツは過去に「オールナイトニッポンモバイル」で配信・放送されたものをまとめてAndroidアプリにしたものです。コンテンツ内で行っているお知らせは、それぞれの番組を配信した当時の情報です。現在では発売を終了したり募集を締め切ったりしている情報が含まれています。あらかじめご了承ください。

2048 Plus is an upgraded version of the current popular games of 2048. Join the numbers and get to the 2147483648 tile! Swipe to move the tiles, when two tiles with the same number touch, they merge into one. Get 2147483648 in one tile to win a game! Explore deep challenge for your mind! It is a super 2048,It has more features. 2048 Plus support auto move. Support two swipe modes: continuous sliding, moving once and moving several times. Support four auto move modes: Corner, Swing, Swirl, Random. Support multiple auto move speed: 0.1s, 0,2s, 0,3s, 0.5s, 1s, 2s. Support auto save. Support undo. Support Night mode. Support turn on/off sound. Support Gravity mode. Support English Alphabet skin. Support Chemical elements skin. Support Chinese dynasties skin. Support Merry Christmas skin. Support Custom skin, you can custom your own skin. Support Backup and Restore your game progress. Support custom game background and transparency. Support more play modes: 1. 3x3 2. 4x4 3. 5x5 4. 6x6 (default) 5. 8x8 More and more people joined the 2048 plus game, play it and enjoy it.

description: It is an evil time, when foul invading monsters lay waste to the lands of humans. Who will save the world from darkness and destruction? Suddenly, a spark of hope flares brightly in the all-encompassing gloom: the Lord of Magic has come! He is the only one who wields the power to stop the madness, defeat the creatures of chaos, and restore the balance! Description: Lord of Magic is a mix between RPG and Tower Defense game genres with a heavy dose of arcade action in a gorgeous fantasy setting. You are one of the last surviving sorcerers: both a keeper of long-forgotten arcane knowledge and a defender of the realm. You must use your magic abilities to crush your monstrous enemies and push them back whence they came. Only you can restore the peace! Lord of Magic boasts awesome innovations in mana presentation and spell-casting. All magic is controlled by gestures, from a simple swipe for a basic spell to the more complex patterns required for the lethal invocations known only to master sorcerers. As you progress through the game, you'll be able to learn new skills and spells in three different schools of magic to protect your lands from the monsters and villains who threaten all life. You are the wielder of the greatest power. You are the Lord of Magic! Features: • Master around two dozen powerful spells • Several passive skills to enhance your magic spells • 19 levels set in 3 fantasy lands • Face over a dozen fierce monsters with power levels and special attacks • Awesome innovation in controls [drag and aim with a chance of reflective damage] ** Please note that while the app is free, please be aware that it contains paid content for real money that can be purchased upon users' wish to enhance their gaming experience.You may control in-app purchases made within this app using password protection which can be enabled from the setting page of the Google Play Store app. **

description: Gradient bar is a modern and minimal skin for UCCW Gradient bar features a different way to view your time without complicating it Watch the video and you'll understand how it works +++++++If the skin doesn't appear on your list please before giving a bad review or uninstalling read the last part of this description+++++++ +++++++Features 1 - Unique analog clock 2 - battery percentage 3 - current temperature 4 - unique weather icons 5 - editable skin 6 - includes many hotspots 7 - 7 different colors to choose from +++++++Required 1 - UCCW (Ultimate Custom Clock Widget) free. 2 - Before Downloading this skin, make sure UCCW 2.1.2 or higher is already installed on your device : http://goo.gl/TZgw0 +++++++[HOW TO] Install 1 - Add a UCCW widget to your home screen like any other widget 2 - Select the analogo skin 3 - Touch the picture +++++++[HOW TO] Edit 1 - After applying the skin, launch the UCCW app (from your app drawer (not the widget settings). Tap Menu, tap "hotspot mode" and tap 'OFF'. UCCW will exit. 2 - Now tap anywhere on the Analogo Clock widget. It'll open in UCCW edit window. 3 - Scroll through the components in the bottom half of the screen. Assign apps to hotspots in this window. This IS a MUST If you want to enable hotspots. 4 - You can change some colors, fonts etc here if you want. 5 - When done, tap Menu, tap "hotspot mode" and tap 'ON'. UCCW will exit. 6 - Your done, enjoy the widget +++++++Backgrounds If you want something similar to the ones on the screenshots or anything in particular please let me know and i make one to fit your needs +++++++There is an apparent issue with some jellybean devices due to a new change in encryption from Google play. All third party themes and similar paid apps like Beautiful widgets, Go launcher etc, are affected by this new encryption. If you encounter this problem on your device there are two options to solve it: 1. If you are rooted: - launch Titanium Backup and scroll down to the list of installed apps -backup the app - then restore it and that should fix it. 2. If you are not rooted or don't have or don't use Titanium Backup please let me know before uninstalling the app and I'll send you a workaround right away+++++++

description: This is a multi-directional shooter video game. The player controls the tank SWORD, DAGGER or LANCE, must destroy enemy tanks before they arrived to the line of defense. Player has two weapons: direct fire and high angle fire. The direct fire has short range and attacks very quickly, bat it blocked by the wall. The high angle fire has very long range and attack enemies over the walls, bat it works very slow. While playing the game, the player tank has two white rings. The small ring indicates the range of direct fire, touch in the ring to attack. The large ring indicates the range of high angle fire. Touch in the area between two rings, to make a Lock-On and attack with high angle fire. -- Paid Version contains 50 stages and 3 player tanks, without Ad. https://market.android.com/details?id=juno.bts.paid -- Free Version contains only 10 stages and 1 player tank, with Ad. https://market.android.com/details?id=juno.bts.free *** *** Please tell us the name of your device if you found a problem *** *** Known bugs: *** - some alpha blending images appear too dark *** - fails to start the game on some devices ***

description: 10 entertaining and educational mini-games for 3rd Graders! Help them learn multiplication, grammar, geometry, division, and more all while they are playing fun and engaging mini-games. They won't even realize they're learning important 3rd grade concepts as they fly spaceships, race cars, and throw darts. All 10 games are designed using real third grade curriculums and conform to Common Core State Standards that school are adopting. These lessons are perfect for children about to enter third grade, or for current third graders who need a bit of helping mastering a specific lesson. This version includes 3 games provided for free, you may unlock all 10 through a simple in-app purchase. Games: * Decimals and Fractions: Convert from decimals to fractions, and back * Multiplication: Word problems, solve for x problems, and more * Geometry: Perimeter, area, and different types of angles * Measurement: Measure length, volume, temperature, and time * Division: Basic division and word problems * Sentence Jumble: Help with reading compression and grammar * Parts of Speech: Adverbs, pronouns, prepositions, adjectives, nouns, and verbs * Syllables: Sound out words to figure out how many syllables they have * Grammar and Tense: Learn the difference between past, present, and future tense * Analogies: Compare words to complete the analogy Perfect for kids and students who need a fun and entertaining educational game to play. ===================================== If you have purchased the games already and they are now showing locked you can tap the i or ? in the upper right corner, and then tap 'Restore Purchase' to unlock the games again for free! ===================================== If you enjoy this app, please try all of our fun and educational apps for kids: Preschool and Kindergarten Learning Games Barnyard Games For Kids 101 Kids Puzzles 1st Grade Learning Games 2nd Grade Learning Games 3rd Grade Learning Games 4th Grade Learning Games 5th Grade Learning Games 6th Grade Learning Games Barnyard Puzzles For Kids Coloring Book Fun Preschool Learning Fun Owl and Pals Preschool Lessons

Puzzle Trains is an original colorful jigsaw application designed not only for kids. Your task is to assemble all parts of a train. To set each wagon together, you have to find the correct positions for all four parts. Consequently, the most challenging is to place its wheels. But if you are correct the train starts moving and smoking:-) Two trains (summer and winter variants) are provided for free without any limitation. If you like the game, you can then buy another trains in different visual styles - circus, desert, night, ocean, space and dino variants. Check our website for further details. We appreciate any feedback. Thank you!

description: Features: 1. Accurate prayer times calculation, using VSOP87 algorithm for sun position. 2. Accurate calculation of hijriyah date based on lunar position using ELP-2000 algorithm. 3. Qibla hour (time at which shadow from the sun either toward or against qibla direction) 4. Shalat times widget. The criteria used for prayer time definitions is in accordance with the following. 1. ISNA (Islamic Society of North America) 2. Indonesia, Malaysia, Singapore, Brunei Darussalam 3. Umm al-Qura University, Makkah 4. University of Islamic Sciences, Karachi 5. Institute of Geophysics, University of Tehran 6. Egyptian General Authority of Survey Keywords: Salah Times, Salat Times, Ramadan, Muslim Prayer Times, Prayer Times ====================================================== Fitur-fitur: 1. Waktu imsak. 2. Widget waktu shalat. 3. Penghitungan waktu shalat secara akurat berdasarkan posisi matahari dengan algorithma VSOP87. 4. Penghitungan penanggalan hijriyah berdasarkan posisi bulan dari algorithma ELP-2000. 5. Jam Kiblat (waktu di mana bayangan menghadap atau membelakangi arah kiblat) Adapun kriteria penentuan waktu shalat yang didukung: 1. ISNA (Islamic Society of North America) 2. Indonesia, Malaysia, Singapore, Brunei Darussalam 3. Umm al-Qura University, Makkah 4. University of Islamic Sciences, Karachi 5. Institute of Geophysics, University of Tehran 6. Egyptian General Authority of Survey Kata Kunci: Waktu Shalat, Jadwal Imsakiyah, Imsakiyah, Imsakiyah Indonesia, Jadwal Imsakiyah Ramadhan, Jadwal Sholat

Animal Encyclopedia is a comprehensive guide (app) to the exciting world of animals. Here you can learn all about animals. The Animal Encyclopedia (app) is organized by taxonomy - mammals, birds, reptiles, amphibians, fishes, and invertebrates, further sub divided into families (Apes, Elephants, Whales Etc.). Each individual animal entry gives you a fascinating photograph and details as much interesting information as possible on their habitat, geographic location, size, lifespan, and conservation status. Each entry also contains the common names and scientific names. The app has a nice search feature to search by either the common name or the scientific name of the animal. Currently the app contains more than 400 Animals. We will be constantly updating the app with more and more animals.

Все рецепты теперь – бесплатные! Самое популярное приложение с рецептами на iPhone теперь и на Android! Более 1,2 миллиона пользователей оценили наши простые и вкусные домашние рецепты! «Готовят все!» - это более 2000 бесплатных пошаговых рецептов с профессиональными фотографиями каждого шага! Аналогов – нет! Очень-очень вкусно! Проще простого! Почему Вам стоит скачать наше приложение: - Доступ ко всем 2000+ пошаговым рецептам сейчас бесплатен! - Все блюда готовились специально для приложения, на их создание ушло два года работы и 5 тонн продуктов - Фото каждого шага для всех 2000+ рецептов – такого больше нет ни в одном кулинарном приложении с рецептами - Вкуснейшие домашние рецепты: от гарниров и основных блюд до закусок и десертов. - Много простых и простейших рецептов для домашнего приготовления для тех, кто только учится готовить. - Вы можете быть уверены – блюдо у вас получится. Авторами рецептов являются лучшие шеф-повара столицы различных кулинарных направлений. - Все ингредиенты рецептов можно найти в любом российском магазине. Практически нет дорогих и экзотичных продуктов. - Большое количество простых вкусных рецептов для мультиварки (почти 500 рецептов вкусных блюд!), хлебопечки, аэрогриля. Удобные фильтры поиска нужных рецептов с расширенными возможностями. Поиск по: - названию блюда или его части - ингредиентам рецепта (сотни вариантов) - диете (вегетарианская, веганская, постные блюда, без молочных продуктов, без орехов) - времени приготовления блюда (легко отделить быстрые рецепты) - сложности рецепта (легко отделить простые блюда) - кухне (русская, французская, итальянская, японская, средиземноморская) - типу рецепта (супы, салаты, закуски, десерты, выпечка и другие) Вы легко отыщете то, что вас интересует! Добавляйте рецепты в Избранное для быстрого доступа к ним. Имеется таймер, который поможет вам при готовке блюд следить за временем. Рецепты разбиты на 36 коллекций: - Рецепты из аэрогриля (подходят и для духовки) - Рецепты блинов и блинчиков (к Масленице – на молоке и кефире, дрожжевые) - Рецепты блюд из птицы (из курицы, утки, индейки) - Рецепты блюд на пару (диетические и постные рецепты, можно готовить не только в пароварке) - Рецепты Грузинской кухни - Рецепты Детского питания (очень полезные – из овощей, с творогом, с молоком, с крупами) - Рецепты диетических салатов - Рецепты завтраков - Рецепты консервирования ягод и фруктов - Рецепты карвинга - Рецепты с клубникой - Лучшие рецепты домашнего консервирования - 5 коллекций рецептов для мультиварки от супов до запеканки (Мультиварка от А до Я; Мультиварка. Вкусные блюда; Мультиварка. Легкие блюда; Мультиварка. Лучшее; Мультиварка. Русская кухня) - Рецепты блюд из мяса (из свинины, говядины, баранины, телятины; все типы мясных блюд – от стейка до котлет). - Рецепты пасты, лазаньи, ризотто (Итальянская кухня). - Рецепты пирогов и пирожков (дрожжевых и на кефире; в мультиварке и духовке; с яблоками, вареньем, капустой; Осетинские). Ряд вариантов теста. - Рецепты пиццы (в духовке) - Рецепты постных блюд (к Великому Посту и другим постам) - Рецепты праздничных блюд (к Новому году, Рождеству, 8 марта, Дню рождения и другим праздникам) - Рецепты праздничных закусок (к застолью, корпоративу, фуршету). - Праздничный стол (как украсить, чем удивить гостей) - Русский праздник (рецепты к Пасхе и другим праздникам в русских традициях) - Блюда из рыбы и морепродуктов (красная рыба, рыба в кляре, запеченная рыба, салаты с рыбой) - Рецепты любимых классических салатов (Оливье, Цезарь, Сельдь под шубой, Мимоза, Греческий, Винегрет) - Рецепты праздничных салатов - Рецепты суши и роллов (японская кухня) - Рецепты любимых тортов и пирожных по госту СССР (Наполеон, Киевский, С заварным кремом, Муравейник, Бисквитный) - Украшение праздничного стола - Рецепты фаршированных овощей (перец, тыква, баклажан, кабачок и другие овощи). - Хлеб своими руками (в духовке, без хлебопечки) - Хлеб в хлебопечке - Рецепты блюд на мангале, гриле, барбекю (шашлык и другие блюда) All recipes are now - for free! The most popular application with recipes on the iPhone now on Android! More than 1.2 million people are estimated by our simple and delicious homemade recipes! Virtually no expensive and exotic products. - A large number of simple recipes for delicious Multivarki (almost 500 recipes for delicious dishes!), Bread maker, aerogrill. Search for: - Name of the dish or part thereof - Ingredients Recipe (hundreds of choices) - Diet (vegetarian, vegan, meatless meals, no dairy, no nuts) - Cooking time (easily separated quick recipes) - The complexity of the recipe (easy to separate simple meals) - Kitchen (Russian, French, Italian, Japanese, Mediterranean) - The type of recipe (soups, salads, appetizers, desserts, pastries, etc.) You will discover easily that you are interested in! Add recipes to your favorites for quick access to them. There is a timer that will help you when cooking dishes keep track of time. Recipes are divided into 36 collections: - Recipes from aerogrill (suitable for the oven) - Recipes pancakes and crepes (for Shrove Tuesday - milk and yogurt, yeast) - Recipes from poultry (chicken, duck, turkey) - Recipes for a couple (dietary and meatless recipes that can be prepared not only in a double boiler) - Recipes Georgian cuisine - Recipes Baby Food (very helpful - from vegetables, cottage cheese, milk, cereals with) - Recipes dietary salads - Breakfast Recipes - Recipes canning fruits and berries - Recipes carving - Recipes with strawberries - The best recipes of home canning - 5 collections of recipes for soups to Multivarki from casseroles (Multivarki from A to Z; Multivarki. Delicious; Multivarki. Light meals; Multivarki. Best; Multivarki. Russian cuisine) - Recipes of meat (pork, beef, lamb, veal, and all types of meat dishes - from steak to burgers). - Recipes pasta, lasagna, risotto (Italian). - Recipes cakes and pies (yeast and yogurt; Multivarki and in the oven, with apples, jam, cabbage, Ossetian). A number of variants of the test. - Recipes pizza (in the oven) - Recipes meatless dishes (for Lent and other posts) - Recipes festive dishes (for the New Year, Christmas, March 8, the birthday and other holidays) - Recipes festive snacks (for the feast, corporate events, receptions). - Festive table (how to decorate, how to surprise guests) - Russian holiday (recipes for Easter and other holidays in the Russian tradition) - Fish and seafood (red fish, fish in batter, baked fish, salads with fish) - Recipes favorite classic salads (Olivier, Caesar, Dressed herring, Mimosa, Greek, Vinaigrette) - Recipes festive salads - Recipes sushi and rolls (Japanese cuisine) - Recipes favorite cakes and pastries GOST USSR (Napoleon, Kiev, custard, Anthill, Sponge) - Decorate the holiday table - Recipes Stuffed vegetables (peppers, squash, eggplant, zucchini and other vegetables). - Bread with your hands (in the oven, without bread machine) - Bread in the bread maker - Recipes for the grill, grill, BBQ (barbecue and other dishes)

description: Tilt Arena is a retro arena shooter (think Geometry Wars!) with sleek vector graphics and a zero button control scheme designed to get your fingers out of the way: just tilt! Paid version perks: * No ads! * Access to new game modes and content as they're released Game mode: Survival All about having a ton of weapons, using them to blow stuff up spectacularly, and changing them often. Grabbing weapon pickups increases the score multiplier so don't get too attached to one. Note: The permission to access identity and phone calls is for Scoreloop's online leaderboard. That system is changing soon so this (overly scary) permission is thankfully temporary.
release_text: Weekend Update - April 3rd * Unlockable weapons & bombs! * Fancier explosion effects (toggleable) * Added option to flip tilt axes

description: With Fragment, you now have the power to transform any image into totally unique, one-of-a-kind prismatic art you’ll want to share with everyone. Whether you’re looking to completely redefine and enhance your level of mobile photography, or simply want to add a subtle dose of creativity to your pictures, Fragment puts the artistry in your hands. It all begins with your images. Take your camera and compose a photo, or select from your Gallery. Once you have your image, the enhancing is in full effect. Unleash your inner artist and choose from a collage of inspired frames, shapes and patterns. Watch as your image is “fragmented” instantly into a myriad of prism-like glass pieces, thanks to a lightning-fast interface that works in real time. No lag time here, thank you. Now dive in and manipulate at will. Rotate, resize, frame, drag, zoom, crop – Fragment is completely scalable and a true reflection of your imagination. Add colors and adjust levels. Desaturate. Blend. Invert. Or go for something completely random and tap shuffle. It’s all up to you where you want to take it. Ready to share? Send your vision to Instagram, Facebook, Twitter and other photo enhancement apps with just a tap. Still going? Hit “Refragment” and keep creating. Simple, and yet so beautiful, isn’t it? With Fragment, the pieces add up to something extraordinary every time. Thanks to Dan Otis for the use of his photography in the fourth screenshot http://dan.exposure.so
release_text: 1.1.2 • More bug fixes 1.1.1 • Bug fixes from 1.1 release. 1.1 - This is a huge update to get you higher quality exports, and new effects! • Updated rendering engine to output higher quality images. • Adds three new effects: 3D glasses, Outline and Glow (on supported devices).

Get perfect skin with Photo Finish Premium by ModiFace. Photo Finish Premium is a powerful photo editing application that lets you retouch your photos to achieve beautiful skin. With this app, you can smooth away blemishes, wrinkles, and any imperfections in just seconds. ★ Features ★ ✔ Cloning Tool: Re-touch skin by replacing unwanted blemishes or imperfections with areas of even skin. Eliminate large blemishes, moles , piercings etc. ✔ Perfecting Tool: Get perfectly even skin by removing pimples, dark spots and small blemishes. Simply swipe the affected areas with your finger and see instant results! ✔ Smoothing Tool: Use the smoothing tool to eliminate deep wrinkles, dark circles under the eyes and large pores. ✔ Brighten Tool: Restore the natural shine on your skin. Brighten your complexion by swiping across the desired area. Say goodbye to those undereye bags! ✔ Erase Tool: We all make mistakes. But that is not an issue with Photo Finish Premium because you can always erase whatever effect you have applied already. Please give it a try, and tell us what you think. Publisher: ModiFace - the Virtual Makeover experts who also made the makeover tools for Vogue, Seventeen, and Prevention.
release_text: Photo Finish Premium (v1.0.4) - Fixed crashing after "Loading..." screen is shown - Improved adjustment interface - Other minor improvements Thank you for all the bug reports.

description: This is quiz game that consists on guessing the names of hundreds of logos from different companies. Within days we will launch a new version with more logos, more levels and more! And we are preparing hints, Logo trivial quiz more fun than ever! In brands with an ampersand in the name this can be replaced by 'and'. In brands with a dash in the name this can be left out. In brands with an apostrophe in the name this can be left out. Example: m&m's = mms There are 18 levels, with logos that you have to guess. When you're successful few will unlock the next level ...And the fun continues! More than 850 logos! These are many logos, but we are always looking for more logos to add to the game. But, How Many of Them Can You Recognize? Please note: All logos shown or represented in this game are protected by copyright and/or are trademarks of their respective corporations. This app, not anyone associated with it, claims any ownership (copyright or otherwise) of any logos used in this app. The logos are protected by copyright and/or trademark. The use of low res logo images in this app for use of identification qualifies as "Fair Use" under US copyright law.
release_text: - New level: 18 (50 logos more!) Any error, please contact with developers. What news you want to have in the next version?

description: Garfield’s wildest adventure! Garfield can finally do what he does best: sleep! But little does the fat cat know that his favorite lazy pastime is the key to excitement and adventure. In Garfield’s dreams, he can fly! Just touch the screen to take off and release to descend. Avoid obstacles and enemies to clear the various levels. On your way, collect coins and lasagna to help Garfield. With those, you will be able to customize Garfield with fun accessories and add power-ups. Dive into this colorful cartoon world that everybody can enjoy! • Both intuitive and easy to use for everyone • An ever-changing experience: sound effects and music change each time. • An original adventure game straight from Garfield’s colorful world • Endless mode for all 4 different worlds with 45 missions to clear. • Customize Garfield: numerous items and power ups available
release_text: A new holiday season theme Bundles of items, special effects and themes to customize and help Garfield Now you can use your lasagnas as revivals! Challenge your friends by sharing your best scores on Facebook: authorize Garfield to connect to your account, then go into your device settings and allow the app Minor bug fixes

description: Drop safely between the platforms to fall down deeper and deeper. Our friends from Ice Cream Jump are back! You still have to dodge the mean flies, but this time you have a huge range of power ups to help you fight back. There are more ice cream characters now, you can collect them all by picking up the coins in the game, or you can use your coins to upgrade power ups! This is a FallDown style game!
release_text: v1.1 Now with 6 new characters! Along with other tweaks and improvements. v1.1.1 Fixes minor bug with objectives. Updated to show as tablet compatible in Google Play.

description: iMathematics is the best app on Android Market for the study of mathematics! With more than 120 topics, over 1000 formulas, attractive interface and with 7 solvers and calculators! Try it for free, if you like it you can buy iMathematics Pro! ================================ FEATURES ================================ ✔ A complete porting of the famous iPhone version! ✔ 8 apps in 1: 7 calculators and 1 form! ✔ Over 1000 formulas, definitions and theorems! The more complete form on Android Market.. constantly updated! ✔ 7 magnificent Utilities to help you in the exercises: Quadratic Equations Solver, Fraction Approximator, Graphic Calculator, Advanced Calculator, Systems Solver, Matrices Solver, and math Glossary! ✔ Beautiful graphical user interface, simple and intuitive! ✔ Support for new High Resolution devices! ✔ Very complete form, divided into sections for an easy consultation! ✔ More than 50 Quizzes on the topics to test your knowledge! ✔ Links to Wikipedia for every topic! ✔ Possibility to try iMathematics for free or unlock it completely buying iMathematics Pro! ================================ COMING IN NEXT UPDATE… ================================ ● Differential Equations
release_text: iMathematics is now even more beautiful, smooth and fast! We have completely changed the structure of the app to use less resources and makes the user experience as smooth as possible. All formulas are now in high resolution, and tapping on a formula for 2 seconds it will be zoomed! The quizzes are now more fun and interactive, providing a rating for each topic that represent your preparation! Custom graphics for smartphones and tablets!

description: Committed to keeping you in touch with those who matter, Voxofon is all about making free calls, sending texts and messages with pictures, video and location to any mobile phone. In addition, you can make cheap international calls and send SMS texts to any phone number – even feature phones. You can always earn FREE call credits by doing everyday activities like trying new apps or watching ads. NEW FEATURES: • Send photo and picture messages • Share videos • Send your location via text • Improved user interface Voxofon is a calling and texting app for free VoIP and WiFi calling, cheap international calls and free texting to your friends and family anywhere in the world with attractively low rates to 200+ countries. FEATURES • Free calls over WiFi and 3G/4G • Cheap international calls to any phone (from 1 ¢/min) • Free texting between Voxofon users • Cheap SMS to any mobile in the world (from 0.9 ¢) • Use your data connection (WiFi/3G/4G) for VoIP calls • Receive replies to your messages • Earn free credits to make free calls over WiFi to anyone • Crystal-clear HD VoIP calls • Full messenger capabilies • Works on Android, iPhone, iPad, iPod, Windows Phone, or any computer • Works on tablets • No ads!
release_text: • Watch videos to earn free credits! • Stability improvements

description: Simple, but fascinating jewel based game. Collect all the "Cloons" by cloning into empty space. At times a game might be deceptively easy to play, but the next time you might be frantically racking your brains to win. Think hard and play hard, but make sure you earth your bonuses they might just be the edge you need. Enjoy the leisurely pace of classic mode or the crazy adrenalin rush of timed mode.

Bodyboarding Social is the world's best social network app for bodyboarders! Post status updates of everything & anything bodyboarding related, browse other bodyboarders posts, and make new friends! Share pics of your favorite surf spots, an epic wave, YouTube videos, or even the new board you just bought or are planning to buy! Comment on & like other people's posts. If you love bodyboarding you'll love Bodyboarding Social!

English - International version. You can find the spanish version ("¿Dónde estoy?") at Market. Powerful software that allows you determine your location, your Gmail contacts and your POIs (Point Of Interest) created by you. "Where am I?" will locate yo on a map indicating the postal address as well. This and more info (map link, weather link, street view link, etc...) can be added into SMS and/or Email. The main features of "Where am I?" are: 1. It indicates where you are usign GPS, TLF Network or WiFi. 2. It translates your location on a map with zoom, satellite view and traffic status. 3. This info and also current weahter, forecast weather, sunrise, sunset from location, info about the location (population, etc...), Street View (real photo of this place), detailed and simple map can be added into a SMS and/or Email and also saved to a TXT file on your SD Card. 4. It displays your Gmail contacts (those ones who are inside a 10km radius from your current location) on the map. 5. It displays your Gmail contacts on a list showing the distance between you and them. Also street view of their locations. 6. Posibility to create your own POIs that are saved on a database. You can backup & restore this database whenever you wish. This POIs will be displayed on a map and if you tap of them the info regarding each POI will be shown. 7. These POIs can also be configured with proximity alert (you select the radious in meters and if the alert must expire and when). The alert warns you with a notification, vibration and LED. Also you are warned when you exit the radius. 8. Options like "Refresh location..." and the posibility to a simple but useful navigation system can be also highlighted. 9. And much more...
release_text: 14.12 - "Push" notifications enabled 14.11.1 Some fixes 14.11 - Minor fix to avoid crash when the device has location problems 14.7 - Minor fixes 13.12.2 - Minor fix for eventual crash for the feature "Gmail contacts on map-navi" 13.12.1 - Minor improvements regarding location signal reception 13.12 - Solved issue with SMS feature on devices without telephony service 13.11 - Prepared for Android 4.x + Minor improvements Year 2012: Minor changes. Traffic status added.

description: TransmiSitp busca por ti la ruta con menos paradas para moverte entre dos estaciones del sistema transmilenio de Bogotá. Con esta aplicación accede a la información de cada una de las rutas, incluyendo estaciones, buses, horarios, alimentadores y mapas. Conoce las rutas del sistema integrado de transporte público bogotano (sitp urbano, complementario y especial), visualiza mapas y tablas de rutas. Aprovecha el GPS y google maps para encontrar la estación más cercana o los puntos de recarga de la tarjeta tullave. Todas las funcionalidades, menos google maps, se pueden acceder sin necesidad de tener Internet o plan de datos. Calcula la ruta Origen - Destino para llegar a cualquier lugar del sistema transmilenio o SITP con el menor número de intercambios y el menor número de paradas de transbordo. Se puede elegir el día y hora sobre los cuales se desea hacer el recorrido para que pueda planear su viaje desde antes. También se puede elegir si se tienen en cuenta solo los servicios activos o todos los servicios. Para cada bus se muestran todos los horarios y se resaltan los horarios activos. Lista de funcionalidades: * Búsqueda de mejor ruta dada una estación de origen y una de destino. La búsqueda se puede hacer por troncal, mapa, nombre de estación y google maps. * Costo del pasaje para el sistema. Indica cuanto tiempo resta entre los cambios de hora pico y hora valle. * Consulta el saldo de la tarjeta tullave (solo para dispositivos con NFC) * Troncales del sistema transmilenio. * Búsqueda de estación por palabra y por cercanía basada en información GPS. * Visualización de troncales y estaciones de transmilenio en google maps. * Búsqueda de bus. * Medición de velocidad y ubicación de estación para buses de transmilenio por GPS * Visualización de ruta de bus con mapa de recorrido incluido. * Búsqueda de alimentadores. * Consulta de alimentadores en una estación. * Integración con calendario de festivos. Muestra que buses se encuentran en operación en el momento de la consulta según el día. * Lista y búsqueda y detalles de las rutas del sitp. * Tablas de rutas del sitp. * Mapas de las rutas del sitp. * Puntos de recarga de tarjeta tu llave. * Ubicación de puntos de recarga por GPS. * Visualización de punto de recarga en google maps. * Mapa general del sistema transmilenio. * Consulta de estaciones desde el mapa. * Números de policía por troncales * Sitp y alimentadores en google maps * Noticias de movilidad No dudes en contactarnos si tienes información acerca de nuevas rutas o cambios en rutas existentes. Puedes ayudarnos enviándonos correos con este tipo de información o recomendándonos a tus amigos. Puedes apoyar nuestra comunidad de facebook en http://www.facebook.com/transmilenioysitp y twitter en https://twitter.com/transmisitp Si la aplicación te presenta algún error y quieres ayudarnos, puedes reportarlo desde la opción de reportar el error que automáticamente se abre, y en el comentario puedes indicar que te encontrabas haciendo cuando se presentó el error. Si encuentras problemas con rutas, o que falta actualizar alguna información, nos puedes contactar a nuestro correo electrónico o a nuestra comunidad en facebook indicándonos el problema. Hemos recibimos comentarios como por ejemplo "falta actualizar rutas" los cuales no nos son de mucha utilidad, si no nos indican cuales rutas son (si conoces y nos envías la página web donde está la información actualizada mucho mejor). Nota: La aplicación TransmiSitp no tiene relación alguna con transmilenio, sitp ni ninguna de sus filiales. Tampoco tenemos relación con moovit. La información de la aplicación es la información pública que se destina para los usuarios del sistema. TransmiSitp you looking for a route with fewer stops to move between two stations Bogota Transmilenio system. With this application accesses the information from each of the routes, including stations, buses, schedules, feeders and maps. Meet the routes of Bogota (city SITP, supplementary and special) integrated public transport system, displays maps and routing tables. Seize the GPS and google maps to find the nearest station or the charging of tullave card. All features except google maps can be accessed without having Internet or data plan. Calculates the route Origin - Destination to reach anywhere in the Transmilenio system or SITP with fewer exchanges and fewer stops transhipment. You can choose the day and time on which you want to make the trip so you can plan your trip before. You can also choose if we take into account only the active services or all services. For each bus schedules show all active schedules and highlights. Features list: * Find best route given a station of origin and destination. The search can be done by trunk, map, station name and google maps. * Ticket cost for the system. Indicates how much time is left between changes in peak and off-peak time. * Check the balance of the tullave card (only for devices with NFC) * Core of Transmilenio system. * Search for word station and GPS information based on proximity. * Viewing transmilenio trunks and stations in google maps. * Search for bus. * Measurement of velocity and location of Transmilenio bus station for GPS * Viewing route bus tour map included. * Find feeders. * Consultation feeders in a season. * Integration with holiday calendar. Shows that buses are in operation at the time of consultation by day. * List and search and route details SITP. * Tables SITP routes. * Maps SITP routes. * EV your key card. * Location of charging stations for GPS. * Viewing charging point on google maps. * General Map of Transmilenio system. * Consultation stations from the map. * Numbers police trunk * SITP and feeders in google maps * News Disabled Please contact us if you have information about new routes or changes to existing routes. You can help by sending emails with this information or recommending us to your friends. You can support our community on facebook and twitter http://www.facebook.com/transmilenioysitp in https://twitter.com/transmisitp If the application presents an error and want to help, you can report from the option of reporting the error that automatically opens, and the commentary you can indicate which you were doing when the error occurred. If you find problems with routes, or missing update some information, you can contact us to our email or our facebook community indicating the problem. We received comments such as "lack upgrade paths" which are not of much use, if not tell us which routes are (if you know and send us the website where the updated information is much better). Note: TransmiSitp application has nothing to do with transmilenio, SITP nor any of its subsidiaries. Nor have regarding moovit. The application information is public information that is intended for system users.
release_text: V10.5 * Mejoras en sugerencias de cálculo de ruta de SITP * Nueva ruta SITP T13 * Nueva parada servicio K97-L97 * Nueva ruta complementario 19-6 * Cambios en rutas alimentadoras 2-1, 2-6 y 2-13 * Modificación complementario 18-5 Recuerda que somos una iniciativa independiente. Usamos la información pública de los sistemas de transporte. Puedes ayudarnos enviándonos a nuestro correo los datos de rutas o datos de paraderos.

description: A home screen widget which provides an automatically refreshed view of web based images (various auto-refresh times are available). Developed originally for monitoring CCTV or webcam images Live Image Widget can be used for a variety of other purposes where an image URL is dynamically produced. - Support for Gingerbread (fixed size widgets) and Honeycomb and above (resizeable widgets) - Unlimited number of widgets and image definitions - Easy-add image URL via 'Share...' in Chrome / Browser - Auto refresh between six hours to five minutes (optional, can also be disabled when not on Wifi) - Three color themes and glass appearance (optional) - Short-term caching of images to reduce network load (10 seconds) - Time stamp (optional) - Holo theme on ICS / JB On-widget controls: - Manual refresh - Previous / Next image - Full-screen mode with pinch-zoom - Save current image to gallery - Settings IMPORTANT NOTES Live Image Widget caches any loaded image for TEN (10) seconds to ensure multi-widget performance and reduce network load. This means that repeatedly pressing the refresh button will only cause a refresh every ten seconds. To use Live Image Widget outside of your local network you must ensure that the URLs entered are accessible from the Internet (that is 'through' your router / firewall), this can also be a security risk if you do not properly obfuscate your external URLs.
release_text: - Improved reliability of widget rotation on tablets - New ICS/JB style launcher icon - Preliminary support for Jelly Bean 4.2 lock screen widgets

description: The Wordies is a colorful relaxing high scores word search game with thousands of possible words and addicting gameplay! How to play: Press on the letter and move your finger to the neighboring (horizontally, vertically, diagonally) letters to select the word, release your finger to submit the word. Perform combos to get the new letters! The combo is made when the letter in your created word is of the same color as the first letter in your word! (Example: First letter is pink, each letter of pink color in your word will add one combo!) * global high scores included * colorful word search game * thousands of possible words * each game is unique *Powered by Dolby® on supported devices*

description: The TD app (Canada) provides quick, easy, secure access to your TD chequing, savings, credit, and investment accounts. By clicking "install", you consent to the installation of the TD app provided by the TD Bank Group* and to any future updates/upgrades. You are also acknowledging that you understand that the TD app and any future updates/upgrades will/may perform the function described below. You may withdraw your consent at any time by deleting or uninstalling this app. The TD app is free to download, however standard wireless carrier message and data rates may apply. ~~~~~~~~~~~~ BANKING BENEFITS ~~~~~~~~~~~~ • Get fast access to our most-used banking functions with Quick Links, and check account balances without logging in using Quick Access. • Make TD Credit Card Account payments in fewer steps. • Add Interac e-Transfer recipients straight from your Smartphone’s contact list. • Make Canadian bill payments and add Canadian bill payees from your Smartphone. • Submit U.S. bill payments. (Subject to eligibility requirements and applicable fees. Foreign exchange costs may also apply. Customer must register for the U.S. Bill Pay Service and set up payees in EasyWeb first. A U.S. dollar cheque will be mailed to the payee.) ~~~~~~~~~~~~ INVESTMENT ADVANTAGES ~~~~~~~~~~~~ • Make trades, manage your watch lists and view real-time quotes for stocks and ETFs. • Monitor your positions and identify opportunities with Advance Charting and Heat Maps. ~~~~~~~~~~~~ TD MOBILE PAYMENT ~~~~~~~~~~~~ Make purchases (up to $100) on the go with just a tap of your Smartphone using an eligible TD Credit Card. Requires a Near Field communication (NFC) SIM card and an active account with Bell Mobility, Rogers Wireless, TELUS Mobility, or Virgin Mobile with data access and a potential OS upgrade. The app is free to download, however an NFC SIM card may need to be purchased from your carrier in order to use TD Mobile Payment. To obtain more information on supported phones and obtaining an NFC SIM card, visit www.tdcanadatrust.com/mobilepayment IMPORTANT DISCLOSURES ABOUT THE TD APP TD Mobile Payment: Upon initiation of the service, TD collects your mobile phone number, carrier, and device related technical information including device type, operating system, Integrated Circuit Card Identifier (ICCID), which identifies your SIM card, and shares such information with your mobile carrier to determine your eligibility to use TD Mobile Payment. TD Mobile Payment only reads text messages (SMS) sent from TD. This allows TD to complete the setup of your mobile credit card to your NFC SIM. TD will not read any other text message. General: If geo-location is turned "on" the app uses your location to automatically show the branches closest to you. If you require assistance call 1-866-222-3456, mail TD CASL Office, Toronto Dominion Centre, PO Box 1, Toronto ON, M5K 1A2, or email at customer.support@td.com . *The Toronto-Dominion Bank and its affiliates are collectively known as TD Bank Group and include the following businesses: TD Canada Trust, TD Wealth, TD Direct Investing, TD Insurance, TD Auto Finance, TD Asset Management, TD Commercial Banking, TD Merchant Services and TD Securities.
release_text: • We took the best of our TD app, gave it a new look & added new features: • Have your credentials handy as you will need them to log into the app • Quick Access: option to check balances without logging in • Add Interac e-Transfer recipients • Submit U.S. bill payments: register & set up bill payees in EasyWeb first. Conditions & fees apply • Add Canadian bill payees • Quick Links shortcuts • Multitask up to 10min before you are automatically logged out • Monitor stocks with Advanced Charting

4talk Messenger is all about instant communication between your smart devices so that you can keep your conversations going. 4talk is a free cloud messaging service that eliminates the divide between your handheld and desktop gadgets for you to enjoy a more rewarding experience talking to peers. No matter the mix of devices you choose throughout the day, be sure - all your conversations will be there for you. Along the usual features you would expect from a decent messaging app like: - Text and photo messaging - Unlimited personal or group chats and conferences - Stickers and smileys 4talk sets itself apart with: ● EASY SET UP: Phone number registration. You enter you phone number, we send you an SMS with activation code. Enter the code and enjoy talking to friends. Simple. ● UNLIMITED DEVICES PER ACCOUNT: So you can view your conversations on the screen that best suits your mood. ● SECURITY is core at 4talk. Starting from secure phone number registration, to interaction only with confirmed personal contacts, to fully managing your account from any device you use. ● CLOUD BASED: 4talk is a cloud messaging service meaning that all your devices are automatically updated to the last word you say. ● DOCUMENT SENDING: Right from the very beginning all documents and files that you share are stored in the cloud for an easy access when needed from whichever device you choose. With 4talk you can send files even if somebody is offline. ● VOICE AND VIDEO MESSAGING for a more impressive way to get your thoughts across. ● LOCATION SHARING so friends can find you at a hidden cafeteria for a lengthy chat over a cup of Brazilian roast. We are always glad to hear from you! For feedback and questions please email us: info@4talk.im . Join us and get latest news on: - Facebook http://facebook.com/4talk.im - Twitter http://twitter.com/4talk_im - Google+ http://plus.google.com/114677774002824806961 - VK http://vk.com/4talk

Qeo is the revolutionary communication framework from QEO LLC that interconnects devices and applications of all brands. Today's connected home is fragmented. Diverse networks, multiple platforms, technologies and ecosystems, a multitude of devices and changing access to different clouds lead to complexity rather than simplicity. Qeo is a communication framework made of a core set of modules from which can be developed fully-fledged software solutions for consumer devices in order to realize a full interoperability between them. Some of these modules can also be added to existing software solutions to maximize interconnections. Technicolor delivery Technologies brings the Qeo solution to the Android framework by offering this application, Qeo Settings for Android, which allows you to run Qeo-enabled applications on any Android device. This application is the service required to run a Qeo-enabled application on your Android device. It does not offer any functionality in itself. This application is currently in Beta-Test Phase. For more information, go to www.qeo.org or contact qeo-support@technicolor.com

Game features: Free play mode and challenge level.

Resco Mobile CRM app is a client for Microsoft Dynamics CRM that allows you to access your data on the go. It boosts the productivity of sales people, field technicians…anyone who needs to be mobile while working. The app works in online, as well as offline mode, so you will be able to view/create/delete/modify data whenever you need it. The application does not require any middleware - just install it on your device, connect directly to your Dynamics CRM and start using it. You can create new orders or quotes, access information about accounts and contacts, schedule appointments, track phone calls and e-mails, and much more. This app is going to be your irreplaceable companion throughout the day. Features • Works seamlessly in online, as well as offline mode - you can select one of 4 modes the app will work in: Always online/ Never Online/ Online when connected to Wi-Fi/ Manual • No Middleware needed — insert Dynamics CRM URL and login credentials and you are good to go • Interactive map with navigation • Multimedia support (pictures, documents, iFrames, signatures...) • Calendar for scheduling appointments and creating tasks • Advanced find for creating personal views • Multilanguage support • Photo capturing • SharePoint support • Option to Run Reports • Adjustable filters and sorting • Encrypted database • Fully customizable IMPORTANT: For full experience, the Resco Mobile CRM app requires an access to MS Dynamics CRM server (4.0, 2011, 2013 or 2015 - on-premise/online). Without this access, you will be only able to work with the local demo database.
release_text: 8.0.3 • Bug fixes & improvements • x86 support 8.0 • In-app PDF Viewer • Open email attachments in external apps • Exchange Email Support • Gmail integration • HTML email viewer • Compatibility with Dynamics CRM 2015 business process flows • 'Revise Quote' support • Ability to create a record directly from a lookup view • Create a Lead from QR code • Re-designed setup section • Unified images across platforms • Additional SharePoint credentials • Sync optimization: twice as fast on a large sync

description: Welcome to Fairy Pony Forest, where you get to dress up and interact with your cute pony friends! As you explore the forest, keep an eye out for treasure chests. They contain new dress up items and treats for your ponies. While "My Fairy Pony" was specifically designed with small children in mind, everyone can enjoy exploring the magical beauty found throughout Fairy Pony Forest. Be the stylist that every pony dreams of! All ponies keep their states saved after leaving the app, so there's no need to start again from scratch if you have them dressed up exactly how you want them. All the ponies animate, talk, and even the dress up items you choose for them animate right along with them! After beautifying your ponies, you can watch them trot around the forest, or explore the forest's majestic scenery for yourself. Toddlers enjoy customizing each pony to their liking with the intuitive dress up menus. Kids also love the treasure hunt aspect of this game. All of this makes "My Fairy Pony" so much more than just another dressup app. You can customize your ponies with many different styles and colors, including: * Body colors * Hairstyles * Pony tail styles, * Unicorn horns * Eyelashes * Shoes * Wings * Eye colors * Cutie marks * 200 dress up items, which make thousands and thousands of combinations! Since you can dress up your ponies anywhere in the forest, the gorgeous backgrounds are never the same twice. Like living pony dolls, these little pony girls will pose in your awesome outfits and amazing styles that you pick out for them, in a beautiful setting! They're like the barbie dolls of ponies! No irritating in-app purchases or ads. Just pure pony goodness. Little girls can unleash their inner pony princess and even guys can unleash their inner brony with this pony discovery and dress up game. description: Put some particles on your screen! The current features are: - Reacts on touch (can be disabled) - Different colors - Special color that varies with your battery state (Select color "Varies with battery" in settings) - Number particles displayed is configurable - Refresh rate is configurable (High refresh rate gives smoother motion but consumes more battery) - Moving speed of the particles is configurable New features will be added soon. Once Particles Wallpaper is installed on your device, you must complete the following steps to activate it: - Go to your home screen. - Press the "menu" button on your device. - Select "Wallpaper". - Select "Live Wallpapers". - Search and select "Particles Wallpaper". - Select "Settings" to see the settings or select "Set wallpaper" to activate it.

Gain a mastery of Spanish! Spanish Class contains a complete offline Spanish course, offering both written content and audio, together with interactive verb, vocabulary, grammar and listening exercises. Great support when you learn Spanish. Easy to practice your verb conjugations, vocabulary, grammar and phrases with. In this demo, only the first semester is available: * Tenses: Present, Gerund, Participle * 300 words * Basic grammar * 30 useful phrases And the following features: * Highly customizable exercises on all of the above, with a fun awards system which makes practicing fun, with separate awards for the vocabulary, verbs, grammar, listening and speaking exercises. * Keeping track of your progress by saving statistics and summaries of all done exercises, together with errors made. The fun of this demo lies in its fun, addictive and useful exercises. The full version comes with tons of content, while the content of this demo is rather limited. The app also contains a fun speaking exercise, which should not be taken very seriously as it is now Also, although basic voices are included, it is also possible to enable additional higher quality voices from within the app, but these have to be bought first from the third party company Svox. If you are serious about learning Spanish, please give this demo a try. IMPORTANT We believe in a long term strategy for this app and customer feedback is very important to us. If there is something you do not like, please contact us at our developer email instead of giving us a 1 star rating. If you give us a 1 star rating, we do not even get your details so we cannot contact you back to solve the problem. If you contact us with a remark or problem and we fail to help you within a few days/weeks, depending on the severity of the problem, we understand that you give us a bad rating. Also, if your audio sounds way off, please read http://www.ceardannan.com/products/android-language-classes-text-to-speech . PLANNED UPDATES * Writing exercises: the word, verb and grammar exercises will get a “writing” instead of multiple choice option, which will present the user with a textbox to type in instead of the multiple choice questions, for a bit more of a challenge. * Image exercises, such as on clock times. * Making it possible to add your own words and phrases to the app through http://www.languageshq.com .
release_text: * Content updates * Some ui improvements * Added search to vocabulary * Fixed bug with verbs exercise

The Interpretation of Dreams is a book by psychoanalyst Sigmund Freud. The first edition describes his work thus: "In the following pages, I shall demonstrate that there is a psychological technique which makes it possible to interpret dreams, and that on the application of this technique, every dream will reveal itself as a psychological structure, full of significance, and one which may be assigned to a specific place in the psychic activities of the waking state. Further, I shall endeavour to elucidate the processes which underlie the strangeness and obscurity of dreams, and to deduce from these processes the nature of the psychic forces whose conflict or co-operation is responsible for our dreams."

description: Opinion - is a social application for creating polls, which will help to know the opinion of the world, your country or friends using the statistical criteria: country, city, gender, age, marital status, etc. Do you need to make a decision or make a choice, and only one day to think? Our magic apps are featured in the most famous newspapers, magic magazines, high-tech blogs... The New York Times - Kit Eaton "Simple, great-looking design and adorably funny!" MUM Magazine (The Society of American Magicians) - Bruce Kalver "Mikael Montier churns out some real winning apps. Bravo!" The Unofficial Apple Weblog (TUAW) - Mel Martin "These magic apps are very clever!" --- Perform one of the most famous mentalism magic trick that is kept alive by modern magicians such as Derren Brown and Chris Angel: the Book Test. The magician lends his smartphone to a spectator performing the following steps on the calculator: multiply a random 3-digit number by another random 3-digit number then divide the new number by a random 4-digit number. Then the spectator selects any of three readable and examinable books or any of three ebooks available on a tablet. The spectator flips the pages to the corresponding integer result number. The magician tells the spectator to concentrate on this random page then reveals few words at the top and the bottom on this page. This app showcases a brilliant mind reading method pioneered by magician Mikael Montier. It is very easy to use, and it will work 100% of the time. - Simple to learn - Easy to perform - Use any normal book/pdf ebook - No gimmicked book - Any language/alphabet book - No memorization needed - Instant reset - Mentalism magic - Mind reading The coolest and most versatile Book Test available out on the market at the cheapest possible price ever! Please be aware that you can't perform immediatly the trick, you have to set up your first use of the app. Once you set up, you won't regret it ;-) --------------------------------------------------------------------- More magic tricks? Visit www.magicapps.me ---------------------------------------------------------------------

Today’s lifestyle has definitely become easier and more convenient, thanks to constant upgrades, advances, and improvements in technology. But all these don’t necessarily guarantee that life is happier. With so many catastrophes and bad news all over the world, not to mention the stress brought about by living life on the fast lane, it’s becoming more and more difficult to look at the bright side of life. What the world needs is less negativity and more positivity. So bring positive vibes with you wherever you go with the Positive Quotes app by Cimaxapp! Pick-me-uppers, cheer-me-uppers, and words of wisdom from some of the world’s smartest, most famous, and most successful people — as well as well-loved fictional characters — are all packed into one neat, handy package that you can carry in your bag or tuck in your pocket. Check out these awesome features: • It's completely FREE!!! • A super simple, easy to navigate interface • A cool, clean corkboard-type design that will appeal to guys and gals alike • Don’t worry about the app eating up your memory space — its file size is only 1.7MB. • Compatible with all Android smartphones (version 2.1 and up) • No need for WiFi or wireless Internet connection in order to get your daily dose of positivity — this app works offline! • Over hundreds of quotable quotes to give you some food for thought! Each tap of the “Next random quote” button produces a different, thought-provoking aphorism. • Inspirational words and statements from some of the world’s greatest minds, such as Vincent Van Gogh, Mark Twain, Confucius, Buddha, John Lennon, Henry Ford, etc., as well as well-known fictional characters like the Cheshire Cat of Alice in Wonderland to give you a much-needed boost! • This collection of sayings is a wonderful reminder that life is not as bleak as it seems — and that you are stronger than you think. Use these pearls of wisdom as encouragement for you to live out your dream and be a better version of yourself. So whether you’re feeling a little blue, need a bit of inspiration to inject some cheer into a dreary workday, or simply want to have one-liners to start your day right, surround yourself with positive vibes — Positive Quotes is the way to go!

The Weekender for Mobile is the mobile version of the New York Metropolitan Transportation Authority's popular Weekender web site. This is your guide to getting around New York City when Planned Work changes subway service. The app uses a diagrammatic map designed by Vignelli Associates, whose founder Massimo Vignelli created the iconic subway map used during the 1970’s. Features: + Blinking dots for stations indicating NYC subway planned work + View subway planned work by Station, Line, or by Borough before you start your travel + Download and view neighborhood maps for areas around your station + View real-time Subway Service Status and more.

Candy Ninja is a free action/casual (Fruit Ninja alike) game of cutting candies. Your challenge is to cut as many candies as you can. Cutting multiple candies in one move rewards extra points. Candy Ninja is a fun, free action game for your phone and tablet! Join now that sugary adventure!

Business Card is a digital business card that you can carry on your portable device. The main idea is to replace your traditional business card in the simplest possible way. You won't have to deal again with the problems of paper business cards: What if you run out of cards? What happens if you change jobs? What if you have several jobs? Will you have to order new cards and notify all your contacts? All these problems are solved with digital Business Card. Synchronize your data with your LinkedIn account, and after only 3 single steps, you will be able to share your data: - Open the application - Press share menu - Enter the other person's email And that's it! Main features: - You can import your professional contact data from your LinkedIn profile (you need a LinkedIn account) - You can show up to 3 current jobs. - The data is stored locally on your mobile phone, so you won't need connectivity all the time. - You can refresh your local data if you modify your LinkedIn profile. - You can share your professional data. You will only have to write the other person's email and Business Card will write a template for you with all your info. You can always edit it before sharing. If there is no internet connection, the email will be sent when connectivity is available. - You can show your professional data on the screen of your device (vertical and horizontal format), as if it was a traditional paper Business Card. - If your contact has CamCard Lite installed, or any other Business Card Reader app. then he/she can take a picture of your digital Business Card, and your data will be automatically imported to his/her contact agenda. - You can take a screenshot of your business card and print it, or share it. *Business Card stores and shows your own professional data. It does not store or share data from your contacts *Your personal data will never be accessed or processed by 3rd parties. *If you are using a tablet, Business Card will work only with the main account. *No Ads version here: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.hdrs.businesscard

“It controls just so perfectly..”, IGN. Chopper Mike is a challenging, fast-paced, arcade helicopter time trial game featuring super smooth graphics and amazing controls. Don't be fooled by the charming graphics, this game will test you to the limit! Have you got what it takes to beat Expert Mode? Fly through 3 difficulty modes and 48 levels, picking up gems, avoiding collisions, and landing as quickly as you can! Skillful play will be rewarded with mysterious bonus aircraft! Complete the levels, beat the target times, then replay to beat your best times! - - - - - - - Chopper Mike supports phones and tablets! - - - - - - - Playing tips. * Start off in the Rookie 1000, but as soon as you get to grips with the controls, switch up to the Red Squirrel for greater speed and agility! * Each difficulty has different levels. Once you master the Easy difficulty, move on to Normal. * Fast Stars are hard to earn in Normal and very hard in Expert. Try getting the Perfect Stars first, you can go as slowly as you want - just don't hit anything. With all the Perfect Stars from Easy and Normal you'll unlock a faster chopper that will help you beat them, (although they are all beatable in the Red Squirrel). * Try to find the 'racing line' in a level. Turn before you get to the gems so you're already aiming for the next one as you collect the first. * Try using the Rookie 1000 to earn Perfect Stars in later levels. You won't beat the Target Times, but Perfect Stars are about clearing the level without bumping into things! - - - - - - - Note 1: Chopper Mike is designed to run at 60 frames per second, and features complicated graphics shaders. As such it requires a moderately powerful device to run at its best. Chopper Mike runs well on a Samsung Galaxy S2, Google-Asus Nexus 7, and ASUS Transformer Pad TF300T. Note 2: For best presentation, Chopper Mike requires a minimum screen height of around 448 pixels, (when in landscape orientation).
release_text: * Tablet support. * Fixes for Nexus 10 graphical issues. Now draws perfectly! * Support for Back button in the user interface, and to shut the game down from the title screen. * Added auto-pause when game is suspended.
