description: A wonderful memory game and a cute collection of animals for toddlers and kids. your kid loves memory games , puzzles and want to play with every kind of animal in the Zoo ? This is the app for you! Your child will discover animals and their sounds and in the meanwhile will exercise his memory! Zoo memory games for toddlers and kids is an educational and entertaining game. It is a nice, simple, fun, and colorful game for toddlers and kids! Play with cute animals ! A lot of different kids memory games and many funny animals to keep your kid busy. Easy to learn and to control: -touch the screen and try to match the animals pairs hidden behind the bush, find the couple! -interact with all the elements on the screen when a game is solved -when a game is completed tap the arrow to change to the next level You can also choose the difficulty level: easy, medium and hard, to suit the needs of each child and exercise your toddler memory. Available for all screen resolutions and devices, including tablet device as Kindle and Samsung ! Simple and intuitive, your baby will have lots of fun for hours ! This educational game will help your toddler to improve skills in problem solving, logical and cognitive skills, concentration and memory. Find out all the animals hiding under the bushes! Features: - high quality memory game for toddlers and preschool kids from ages 0 to 7 with very cute animals - Easy to use and control - fun for children of all ages, babies, preschoolers, school children and pre-teens, designed for preschool boys and girls - Simple for toddlers and babies with different levels of difficulty - Toddlers develop their fine motor skills and improve their memory - Play with your child or let them play alone - use it to keep your baby or toddler occupied - more than 100 animals in the FULL version: lion, tiger, elephant, birds, pig, ants, sheep, fox, horse, chicken, dog, bear and many others wild animals - randomly generated memory games! this educational game will never get old! This is the FREE version (Ads supported), If your kid likes this app, then you can buy the FULL version with more memory games, more animals and no ads https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=co.romesoft.toddlers.memory.zooFull Fun and enjoyable to learn and play with great colorful memory games, this is a must have app! A lot of educational animals memory games for toddlers and young kids!! Your child will admire every kind of animal and will hear funny sound effects! Ideal for children but also fun for adults who want to play with their kids! This app is a memory trainer for all the family ! A fun brain training app for kids! Are you ready to challenge your memory ? Match up the baby animals pairs! Zoo memory games for kids is a funny memory game which also helps your kid training his memory ability. A lot of game for children, the best games for kids, apps for babies, games for girls, match game, puzzle, educational games, all from romeLab !

description: Blue Fone is the Mobile Dialer that allows to make VoIP calls from any of the android devices and it uses 3G/Edge/Wi-Fi Internet connectivity. It is developed based on the requirements of VoIP Providers business needs. Blue FoneFeatures:- It uses SIP protocol based for signaling Supports G729, PCMU, and PCMA codecs Runs behind NAT or Private IP User Friendly Interface Auto Sync of Balance Real Time Sip status messages Call History Address book integration Compatible with all sip standard switches Blue Fone has very efficient implementation of jitter buffer to play voice smoothly. Silent suppression and comfort noise generation has been used to reduce the bandwidth usage, and this makes the dialer more efficient in making VoIP calls. It easily integrates with mobile phonebook and auto detects (+) sign when contact is picked from phonebook.”

FlightAssistant is an aviation "moving map" GPS application. Developed by pilots, it will be your best co-pilot on your Android phone or tablet. Prepare your flight, download AIP (aeronautical) data, NOTAMs and weather data as well as airport charts (only available in selected countries) and you are ready to take off. FlightAssistant will help you to follow the flight plan that you have defined and will provide you with all the information you might need in flight. Main features... •Multi-zoom moving map (can show either North up or track up) •Airspaces awareness and alerts •Horizontal situation indicator •Integrated maps library (free maps) •Flight preparation: create a flight plan from aeronautical or user waypoints •Weight & balance: flexible weight and balance calculation (user defined weight station, CG limits, etc.) •Electronic navigation log with offline access to the route documents (airports charts & data, NOTAMs, METARs and TAFs) •Flight recording in Google Earth compliant format •Versatile usage modes; flight plan (prepared navigation), GOTO, or "free flight" •"Nearest" feature, providing a list of the closest airports •Download airport charts & diagrams for in flight offline use (only available for France for now) •Download NOTAMs, METARs et TAFs for in flight offline use •Choose your units (metric or imperial for speed, distance and altitude) Getting started ? Visit our website http://www.flightassistant.org/getting-started/ . Please read the manual ( http://www.flightassistant.org/assets/FlightAssistant_UG.pdf ) and make yourself comfortable with the application before taking off. Follow the application news on Twitter ( https://twitter.com/droidfa ) or Google+ ( https://plus.google.com/111047533766475644105) . This version of FlighAssistant uses "community" AIP data (airports, waypoints, etc.) and doesn't include official data provided by national or federal administrations. This application requires a GPS (either embedded or Bluetooth connected).

description: Big Wheels, Heavy Loads and a Name King Trucker are simply the things that do not go well together except in racing game. Meet King Trucker, he can drive just about any truck you throw at him. From huge cranes, cement truck, Farm tractors and the regular “small” sized road truck. He can drive but can he do that well? mmm… All NEW - "King Trucker Industrial Truck “ - This is a Mad Truck Reckless Racing Game where YOU get to play King Trucker and recklessly drive huge trucks super fast on the highway road. -- What online reviewers had to say about King Trucker Industrial Truck -- * Superb graphics well designed for Android Devices * I love racing and I love blowing stuff that's why I love tis game, it has both and lots of them * Hardcore gamers are sure to love this, Thumbs up form us no questions asked Drive recklessly on the highway streets collect coins, generate power ups and get as far as you can with out getting killed. Cross lanes to gain double points. The further you ride the more powerups you generate from the coins collecting. -- Some of the awesome feature this Hot racing game has -- * Addictive as hell, start easy and progress to harder stages * Lots of powerups and upgrades to unlock with each bike * Awesome 3D graphics and amazing gameplay * Easy to control - Tilt for a more realistic steering experience Buttons for those racers that like precision ( useful for steering between cars and staying on track! ) * Nitro and Super charge bombs to clear the highway road traffic ! "King Trucker Industrial Truck" Is based on an endless race mode where your objective is to do your best not to crush your bike while collecting as many powerups and coins that will assist you to go faster a longer down the track. if you love trucks and crazy driving then we are sure you are going to LOVE this game. It has everything a racing fan wants. Fast cars, Fully powered engines, Nitro and Bombs and yes… It is addictive as hell -- Fully enjoy the game. Easily collect coins to unlock features with out needing to IAP your way ( You can use IAP to save time but it is not a must!! ) ## King Trucker Industrial Truck ## Make sure you rate us so we know what you love and what you want added to the game. Please note that you can come meet the other racing guys on our facebook page!

Grid Nav allows you to obtain GPS location data in angular geographic coordinates and in Military Grid Reference System (MGRS) format, and is able to be shared. Perfect for land navigation. Features: -Displays current location in decimal and MGRS format along with accuracy reading, number of GPS satellites seen, altitude, course and speed. -Rangefinder allows you to find approximate distance to an object based on angular difference. -Converter converts coordinates between degrees and DMS and UTM and MGRS Note: This app is only as accurate as your device's sensors. Most device compasses are very inaccurate, causing poor rangefinder performance. DO NOT USE THIS APP IN LIFE CRITICAL SITUATIONS. Use at your own risk. Always have a backup.

Everything according to the TCM (Traditional Chinese Medicine). ★ Same point descriptions from http://www.acupuncturepointsatlas.com ">www.acupuncturepointsatlas.com ★ Full description of 390 acupuncture points with illustrations (all regular points plsu 29 extra points). ★ Each point includes: - Original Chinese name - Meaning of the name - Point Category - Localization with high quality images - Point Actions - Point Indications - Point target area of effect - Unitary Channel ★ Option to add your own notes and information about each point. This data is sync between other devices and included in suggestions search. ★ A search for point suggestions according to signs, symptoms and patterns. ★ Time counters for patients rest time control. ★ Buy once and use in all your Android phones and tablets. Acupuncture Assistant is more than an Acupuncture Point Atlas, it has a quick search where you can look for any information like signs, symptoms, desired point actions and instantly has suggestions of the most adequate points for the treatment. This Application is just starting. New features soon! Any suggestions or complains please, feel free to contact us: http://www.acupuncturepointsatlas.com/contact/ "> http://www.acupuncturepointsatlas.com/contact/ ABOUT APP PERMISSIONS: Internet: We need internet access to backup and sync your notes (if enabled). Read User Accounts: We need access to your accounts to backup and sync your notes (if enabled) in your own Google Drive, so we don't need to store any of your data. Wake Device Up: To sound an alarm when your counters finish. Read External Drive: In case you have songs or ringtones installed in your external drive for the alarms. We don't collect any user information.

Craigslist Mobile provides a simple and intuitive interface, but an extensive set of features to search, post, browser and reply on craigslist.org. What will you find inside? ✓ ✓ The only Android App that allows you to search and post an ads directly from your phone!! ✓ Sophisticated mobilizer algorithm to make the Craigslist webpage fit in the phone screen nicely. ✓ Posting ads directly from your Android Phone. ✓ Posting with or without an account. ✓ Browsing and searching the craigslist.org ✓ Quick preview of the posts along with thumbnail of the photos. ✓ Support all major countries and states. ✓ Email the post to friends or yourself. ✓ Contact the poster via email or phone call. ✓ Battery life friendly! No background service to drain your phone's battery. ✓ Save the post to favorite. ✓✓ And more! If you have any question and suggestion, please email us at duduapps@gmail.com . Please include the Category, Location and search keywords when you report any problem. Thanks and enjoy! NOTES on Permissions needed by Craigslist Mobile App: - DIRECTLY CALL PHONE NUMBERS This feature is only used when you are trying to contact the sellers on the craigslist via phone call. - TAKE PICTURES AND VIDEOS This feature is only used when you need to post a new ads on craigslist with a picture taking with your phone.

description: Name Learner makes it easy for teachers and other users to learn names of people quickly. You simply add the names of the students along with their pictures, which can be imported from Dropbox, selected from your device or taken directly from the camera. A great way to have staff learn the names of students quickly, or have easy access to students, who can be arranged by grade level, homeroom or any other grouping you prefer. A quiz feature allows you to test your name knowledge by offering four possible names for each student. The app is completely free. You will also find links to other apps for teachers that I offer as well. Some are free and others have Demo versions to try for the paid apps that I offer. Enjoy! Key features - Up to 100 students per class - Up to 30 classes - Save and Import data with Dropbox - Quiz feature to practice your faces recognition

description: Mark Crossfield, AskGolfGuru, Golf app brings together all of his YouTube videos and delivers them organised by theme, making videos much easier to find and view. If it is club reviews, swing tips or even your own golf swing lesson the Golf Pro app from one of YouTube's most loved golf instructors will help you play much better golf. Mark posts new videos every week and with automatic updates, you'll get them as soon as they're posted. More than 12 lesson categories including: -Backswing -Downswing -Driving lessons -Short game -Grip and set up -Mobile golf fun Reviews from more than 10 companies including: -Mizuno -Titleist -Ping -TaylorMade Also included within the app is a chance to star in one of Mark Crossfield's next YouTube video lessons. Record your swing within the app and send it straight to Mark and see if your swing gets chosen to take part in the The Golf Swing Weekly Fix Show. Improve your golf today with this great app. There are NO further charges or in app purchases, all content is free!

Estadistica Lite es una aplicacin enfocada al rea de la estadstica que se ocupa de inferir resultados sobre una poblacin a partir de una o varias muestras ingresadas por el usuario. Permitiendo obtener la Suma Total del muestreo, Adems de tener la comprobacin matematica de la Media, Mediana, Moda, Esperanza, Varianza y la Desviacin Estandr. Ayudando a resolver problemas de ndole estadstica, acortando el proceso del tiempo de resolucin del problema planteado al solo ingresar su poblacin. De ante mano agradeceria que me brindaran de sus comentarios o criticas para mejorar esta aplicacin y asi mismo recomendarles la version Pro que hasta este momento ya es gratuita y de acceso para el publico en general. Stats Lite is an application focused on the area of ​​the statistican infer that deals with results on a poblacina from one or more samples entered by the user. Can benefit from Total Sum of sampling Besides having the mathematical check of the Mean, Median, Fashion, Hope, variance and deviation Estandr. Helping solve statistican Ndole, shortening the time resolution of the problem to just type your population. From hand to provide I appreciate your comments and criticisms to improve this so it aplicaciny recommend the Pro version which so far is already free and accessible to the public.

Budget Control is a small free widget that lets you see your expense, income and budget managed by the HandWallet app on the home screen of the phone. In order to use this app you MUST install first HandWallet - a free professional expense manager that helps you to control your expense, accounts, bills and budget: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=mediavision.handwallet • FREE • Show you your current expense, income and budget. • Show comparison (gap) between budget and actual expense • Show overspending in red! Options : • Can control the currency of the graph (Dollar, Euro etc) • Can control the period (budget this month, budget of last month, yearly budget and so on). • Control the categories, for example car budget / car expense, groceries budget / expense and more.. • Font size, colors, background and date format • Support multi currencies transactions • Enter new expense in one click • Start the HandWallet app in one click Why a budget control app is better than Excel? Because it is more simple and yet has more options Because it will give you the full picture and not just the bank or credit card status Why to use our Budget Control Widget? Because it's the best expense & budget widget. And because we are creating expense manager and budget software for 10 years and know exactly why most people want to manage budget & expense but only few succeed. How to start? Download the HandWallet app for free. Then enter few expenses for example a car expense, a travel expense, mortgage and so on. Now put the Budget Control Widget on you home screen a see the total of all your expense. How to control budget? In the HandWallet app press the "data" button then categories. Select your category, for example "car expense". Press the "advanced" button and select the type of budget: fixed budget, summarized budget and so on. You can define a different budget for each period. Repeat this process for other categories: health budget, food budget and so on. Finally make sure that the general category "expense" has a budget of type "summarized budget", meaning that the budget is calculated from all its sub categories.

description: Highly recommended for Gymnasts, parents, coaches and teachers. The 4-title Gymnastics series, is a well produced comprehensive, instructional series that assists coaches, parents and teachers to instruct students in an easy step-by-step, hands-on process. Many elite gymnasts including 17 Olympians have benefited from the proven techniques and approach to excellence that form the basis of the Mulvihill System. This system is both a scientific and aesthetic method for achieving the highest levels of success in all Olympic Gymnastic events. These same techniques can be applied to students nationwide. Application Intro The system is both a scientific and aesthetic method for achieving the highest levels of success in all Olympic Gymnastic events. Advanced Tumbling: The final step in understanding the forces at work in al gymnastic movements. Technical aspects are clearly broken down to ensure retention. Artistic orientation to skills is clearly explained and developed.

Bubble shoot is a free game presented by the reputable Green Mango Games. The game is fun, super addictive and a great way to spend free time on an airport, on the bus or train and what not. Even though this game is similar to the bubble pop games, this one has a unique edge. Bubble shooter is similar in both the features and controls to the traditional classic bubble shooter games. The objective is, as usual, to adjust your gun’s angles and position it correctly. Then tap your finger to blast away at similar colored bubbles. The more bubbles you pop together, the higher the score. The addiction lies in the fact that it has several levels. Competitive people will definitely love the arcade version of this fantastic game. Bubble shooter is without a doubt a free game which can help lift any dull moods. The interface is nice and clean and clutter free. The game mechanics are superb and flawless. The entire thing runs so smooth that you’ll immediately notice it. This game can be so addictive that it can cause a mania! A mania of bubbles popping here and there and everywhere! You can continue your game to make sure that you don’t lose any progress. This is a neat little feature although since the game super smooth and flawless, it will almost never have any glitches. So just sit back, relax and blast away your stress alongside those colorful bubbles. If you like bubble shoot games then you have to try this one!

description: 내 반쪽 초대하기 기능 탑재! 이제 언제 어디서든 혼자서 결혼준비 하지 마세요~ 예랑이와 같이 준비하는 웨딩의 여신! 나와 예랑이가 앱을 깔고 초대하기 버튼을 눌러 초대를 하면 한 공간에서 이미지를 담고 우리만의 댓글로 결혼준비를 할 수 있답니다^^ 뿐만 아니라 나의 정보를 입력하면 자동으로 무엇을 언제 어떻게 준비해야 하는지 알려주는 스마트한 D-Day 기능까지! 더욱 강력해진 웨딩의 여신을 만나보세요♥ 결혼준비 필수앱! 웨딩의 여신! 웨딩의 여신을 통해 스마트한 결혼 준비를 해보세요. 웨딩 스튜디오, 드레스, 메이크업을 카테고리 별로 확인이 가능하며, 러브를 눌러 자신의 페이지에 마음에 드는 것을 담을 수 있어 언제 어디서는 확인이 가능합니다. 담은 것을 기준으로 어떤 업체가 가장 맞는지 자동으로 분석하여 순위를 제공하는 것은 웨딩의 여신만이 가지고 있는 특별한 기능입니다. 자신이 가지고 있는 다양한 SNS를 통해 한번에 쉽고 빠르게 가입하여 지금 웨딩의 여신을 사용해보세요^^ 웨딩의 여신 주요 기능 *D-Day 결혼 준비 기능 : 여신님의 간단한 정보를 입력하면 웨딩의 여신이 언제 무엇을 어떻게 준비해야 하는지 바로 가이드가 나타납니다. 뿐만아니라 상세 To Do 리스트를 정리하고 예산관리까지! 반쪽 초대가 되어 있으면 같은 D-Day 정보를 공유하면서 D-Day톡으로 대화하며 앱으로 편하고 빠르게 준비할 수 있어요^^ *추천 페이지 추천 페이지에서는 가장 인기 있는 이미지 위주로 보여지며, 웨딩 드레스, 스튜디오, 메이크업 등 인기 있는 이미지만 선별적으로 볼 수 있습니다. *웨딩 리스트 웨딩 리스트를 통해 스튜디오, 드레스, 메이크업 등 카테고리를 선택하여 필터링 할 수 있으며 이미지를 클릭하여 좀 더 큰 이미지와 관련 업체 페이지로 들어갈 수 있습니다. 하트를 눌러 마음에 드는 것은 마이페이지에 담을 수 있습니다. *마이페이지 마이페이지는 자신이 하트를 누른 이미지를 확인할 수 있어요. 자신이 담은 것을 모두 확인할 수 있고, 스튜디오, 드레스, 메이크업 텝을 눌러 분야별로 나눠 확인 가능합니다. 또한 선호업체 탭에서는 자신이 담은 이미지를 분석하여 자동으로 어떤 업체가 가장 맞는지 한번에 볼 수 있어 결혼을 앞둔 예비 부부에게 꼭 필요한 기능입니다. *내 반쪽 초대하기 마이페이지에서 내 반쪽 초대하기 버튼을 누른 후 코드를 입력하면 끝! 내 반쪽과 마이페이지를 공유하며 이미지 및 댓글을 한 공간에서 담을 수 있답니다. 댓글을 달거나 이미지들 담으면 상대방에게 알림이 가서 멀리 떨어져있더라도 스마트한 결혼준비를 할 수 있어요. *정보 정보 탭에서는 웨딩의 여신과 파트너쉽을 맺는 방법이 있습니다. 웨딩의 여신 대표 이메일을 통해 관련 정보를 보내면 검토 후 연락을 드립니다. 또한 효즘 핫한 웨딩의 여신 페이스북 페이지를 바로 갈 수 있는 아이콘이 있습니다. ■ 문의 : mewed@naver.com ■ 웨딩의 여신 페이스북 : www.facebook.com/weddinggoddess ■ 웨딩의 여신 관련 키워드 입니다 ^0^ 웨딩 드레스 / 결혼준비 / 결혼 / 웨딩 / 웨딩준비 / 웨딩홀 / 스드메 / 메이크업 / 드레스 / 스튜디오 / 웨딩 스튜디오 / 아이웨딩 / 웨딩박람회 / 예물 / 예단 / 혼수 / 함 / 이바지 / 폐백 / 신혼여행 / 상견례 / 결혼반지 / 동행서비스 / 웨딩플래서 / 웨딩 컨설팅 / 부케 / 나우웨드 / 아이니웨딩 / 듀오웨드 ■ 웨딩의 여신과 비슷한 앱이에요 +_+ 아이웨딩 / 웨딩바이미 / 셀프웨딩 / 웨딩클럽 / 결혼적령기테스트 / 웨딩 플랜북 / 웨딩 노트 등등

Everybody knows the paper version of this game. You make some dots and connect them to triangles. The player with the most triangles at the end of the game wins. There are only three rules: 1. description: A #1 mobile game!! How fast can you make it rain? No, really… how fast??? It’s a fiendishly clever game, that’s too simple and too easy and too hard and too fun. But what does it all mean… Well, just start swiping and watch the money pile up. Hundreds, then thousands, then millions, then billions, then kili-billies, mega-billies, and beyond. But to get that much you’ll have to make some wise investments! Maybe you’ll invest in venture capital, loan sharking, or offshore drilling. Maybe you’ll start a lemonade stand or a casino or a clown college. Or maybe you’ll buy off a federal judge and watch the dollars roll in! Or maaaaybe the FBI will show up on your doorstep and grab your cash. You better be careful… or just be ready with a bribe. So swipe, swipe, swipe, swipe, swipe, swipe, swipe, swipe, swipe, swipe, swipe, swipe, swipe, swipe, swipe, swipe, swipe, swipe, swipe, swipe, swipe, swipe, swipe, swipe, swipe, swipe, swipe, swipe, swipe, swipe, swipe, swipe, swipe, swipe, swipe, swipe, swipe, swipe, swipe, swipe, swipe, swipe, swipe your way to glory. Is it a stupid game? Or are you just falling behind your friends and looking for excuses? Oh, and don’t forget to buy that bucket. Even someone as vibrant and dashing as you can’t keep swiping forever… Note: Make it Rain: The Love of Money is a free game but does offer in-app purchases of various kinds. Let us know what you think! Problems? Questions? Love the game? Get in touch! makeitrain@spaceinch.com

description: Bring engineering to the point of the problem with Autodesk® ForceEffect™, a mobile engineering app for simulating design concepts in the field or in the office. Unlike the traditional approach of using paper, pencil, and a calculator to develop equations for design options, Autodesk ForceEffect does all the simulation and engineering calculations for you right on your mobile device, helping you to quickly and easily simulate design options during the concept phase to determine the viability of a design. ✓Fast—Real-time solving capabilities and immediate feedback on the simulation performance. Print, email, or view a results report on any HTML-enabled browser or mobile device. ✓Easy—Intuitive interaction for drawing, constraining, and simulating concepts. Simply tap objects to select, and then move, rotate, and scale. ✓Complete—Solutions for both statically determinate and over-constrained or indeterminate problems. ✓Integrated—Easy workflow continuation into CAD with industry-standard export capabilities via DXF™ files and email for file sharing. The Autodesk ForceEffect engineering app is ideal for static systems analysis using free body diagrams: •Freehand sketching of elements and construction lines with snaps, constraints, and inferencing •Object dimensioning, global scaling, units, constraints •Import image as background •Create joints (welded, pinned) •Break element at joints •Create supports (fixed, grounded, sliding) •Create loads (known, unknown, distributed) and moments •Add weight to individual elements •Compute reaction forces and moments for equilibrium and over-constrained systems •Toggle forces to show force vector components •Results reporting with picture, results, all equations •Save and load files from Autodesk 360 •In app tutorials

Personal spam filter will protect you from annoying mailings. Stay always in touch with the Mail.Ru app! ★ ★ ★ ★ ★ Did you know that developers can not respond to comments in Google.Play? Therefore, any requests, suggestions and comments, please send via the "Feedback" in the app or email mailapps@corp.mail.ru . In this case, we will respond quickly and solve the problem as soon as possible. ★ ★ ★ ★ ★ - Multiple accounts support. Add all of your boxes and switch between them easily. Now, move between work and private email is as simple as between folders within a single mailbox. - Full synchronization. It does not matter from a computer or mobile you read, flagged, or moved messages. All changes will be saved on the server and synchronized between devices. - Protected folder. Mail.Ru app enables you to store information and protect it. Create a folder with a password in the web interface. It will be visible in the application and accessible only after you enter the password. - Search the entire correspondence. Use our search engine to quickly find any email in the mailbox. - Push-notifications for new emails. You will be notified about new message almost instantly if your Android device is connected to the network. - Filtering notifications. Set a time to receive notification, select services, folders or create a personal filter to receive only those alerts that are important! - Caching emails. Emails are stored in the phone's memory and are available without a network connection. Read messages and view attachments in transport or, for example, in the countryside. - Personal spam filter. Bored coupon mailing list? Emails from services that you are not using any more? Tap Spam and all subsequent letters from the sender will automatically be sent to the appropriate folder. Read only the important messages for you. - Avatars. It's easier and more convenient to navigate through applications with photos of recipients. ★ ★ ★ ★ ★ The application has been tested and is compatible with Android version 4.0 and higher. Particular attention is paid to the stability and performance on devices with Android 4.4 and Android 5 Lolipop. The application has been additionally checked on the following devices: Samsung Galaxy S5, Samsung Galaxy S4, Samsung Galaxy S3 Mini, Samsung Galaxy Note 2 and Note 3, HTC One, Samsung Galaxy Quattro, Sony Xperia Z, Sony Xperia Z2 (Sirius), Sony Xperia Z3, Lenovo P780, Samsung Galaxy Grand, HTC One S, Google Nexus 5, Sony Xperia C, Samsung Galaxy Core, HTC Desire 600, HTC One, Samsung Galaxy Alpha, Asus T00J, Samsung Galaxy S Duos, Samsung Galaxy Tab 2, Samsung Galaxy Tab 3, HTC One X, Samsung Galaxy S II Plus, LG G2, Asus Google Nexus 7, HTC One (M8), Samsung Galaxy Core II (Lenovo S820, LG G3 Beat.

***WARNING*** This is a legacy version (1.10) of the game. 1.12 is available here: http://wesnoth-on-android.sf.net/ and is published on google play ***WARNING*** This is an unofficial android port of the PC game Battle for Wesnoth. Battle for Wesnoth is a turn-based fantasy strategy game, featuring many addictive campaigns, lots of units, different races, AI controlled players, multiplayer gaming and much more. On startup the game will need to download and install data from the internet, so be sure to have a good connection and free space on your device on the first run. * Minimal difference from PC version With the goal of making easier to follow official game releases, this port is focused on doing minimal modification to the PC game. This means no UI changes. Thus, to allow precise clicking even on touchscreens, a finger-dragging mouse emulation techinque is used. On startup you'll watch a small tutorial about it. Also, the game needs a fairly good hardware to run on. At least a 800x480 screen and 512MB RAM are required and also a good cpu is suggested (700Mhz minimum). Trackball and hardware keyboard will help interaction, but are not needed to play. * Splitted data files Game data files, which will be downloaded on first startup, are split into core, music, campaign and translations files. This way, you can choose to download and install only what you are interested into. So for example if you don't care about game music you won't need to download music files, saving 140MB of download and memory. The core download, which is 89MB, will allow you to: - play single scenarios vs. another player or the AI - download extras (campaigns and more) from the official server - connecto to a game server to play network games This port does not include server mode, so you cannot use this software to host a network game (but you can connect to one hosted somewhere else). *** *** *** *** *** *** If your device has a very high DPI value (i.e. small screen, high resolution), game fonts may be too small to read. To fix that, tap on "Change Configuration" button which appears for a few seconds on startup, select "Startup options" and check the "Set custom display resolution". Close the popup leaving default values (Width: 800, Height: 480). This will force the game to 800x480 resolution, and make everything in the screen look bigger, including fonts, and this setting will be kept for following runs. Also, if you experience trouble or have some questions, you can use official BfW forum: http://forums.wesnoth.org/viewtopic.php?f=6&p=582351 *** *** *** *** *** ***

description: This game is one of the best thinking games and never-ending source of fun and positive. Bright and colorful look of the game connected with funny music makes you feel yourself full of joy and lots of positive emotions, besides it helps you to train you logical thinking by looking for the best solution as fast as you can. How to play: The main idea of the game is to put the figures, which are falling down from the top one by one, in a right position. It means that you should fill out empty spaces with a figures with the similar shapes. If you create horizontal line without empty parts it will burn and disappear, so it will give you more space for the next falling figures. The game has lots of levels, the speed is faster in each upper level, so it getting more hard to play (there is less time to find the best position for the falling figures). Hope you will like the idea and visual interpretation of the game. Enjoy!

*** THE 2015 AFL SEASON IS NOW LIVE IN THE APP *** *** PLUS NAB CHALLENGE *** Footy Live is the ultimate way to follow the AFL with lightning fast live scores, comprehensive news, video highlights and in-depth stats, delivered in a stunning design. Footy Live for 2015 includes: Features: • Worm score and live text commentary – follow the game from every angle • Push notifications – never miss a minute of the action with customizable game alerts • Advanced statistics – including contested possessions and disposal efficacy • Breaking news and opinion - coverage by Australian Associated Press and Sportmate’s own team of journalists • Expert analysis – opinions from Terry Wallace, Liam Pickering, Cam Mooney, Nathan Brown and new AFL experts Barry Hall, Jake King and Brad Sewell • Pre-match coverage – including KPIs for Champion Data, team line ups and exclusive Sportsmate previews • Team overviews – review season performances and stay up to date on the developments of any AFL team Extra Competitions: • NAB Challenge as well as VFL, SANFL, WAFL and NEAFL Enhancements: • Design – cleaner layout and improved graphics • Match day engine – receive news and live scores quicker and easier • Player profiles – new player card style layout including Dream Team tallies • Head to head analysis - review past games between players and teams There are plenty more updates in the pipeline, so keep an eye on our Twitter page for future announcements - @sportsmate We actively use Twitter to let you know about updates, new features, interesting stats and anecdotes, plus respond to any questions that you may have. Please send all feedback to info@sportsmatemobile.com
release_text: Changes: * Refactoring and bug fixes * Widgets UI update * Push notifications upgrade for more effective battery usage (additional permissions were required)

description: KeyboardTerm 是由 LunaTerm 衍生而來，用於 Telnet BBS 連線的終端機軟體。 注意：關於大部份輸入法無法選字的問題，目前尚無找到辦法解決，請愛用字串輸入工具 KeyboardTerm 強調於透過自定虛擬按鍵，來強化單手使用上的瀏覽與操作，主要的改動皆為了單手使用做修改。 預設帶了多組鍵盤可以自行選擇喜歡的來使用，再依各人喜好作調整。 可長按即可移動游標位置功能，以及單擊進入文章功能，方便使用 虛擬按鍵可以自由的調整，並有設計可組合的樣式，避免點擊虛擬按鍵時，可能誤觸到邊緣的實體鍵，可以設定保留邊緣的空間，虛擬按鍵也可以自己設定需要的寬度，0.2.6增加虛擬按鍵可以捲動的設計，0.5.0 增加按鍵定義匯出功能 匯出、匯入的檔案放在 SD 卡的 keyboardterm 目錄中 匯入方式： 將設定檔放在 SD 卡的 keyboardterm 目錄中，(目錄不存在的話自行建立) 在虛擬方向鍵設定中，Menu -> 匯入即可 也希望大家分站自己的按鍵組合操作方式 其他重大重新: 0.6.0: 預帶了多組鍵盤，可供選擇 增加嘗試登出功能，會送出指定的字串，可以確保登出 0.5.0 增加匯入、匯出按鍵定義功能，可以將匯出的檔案分享給別人匯入 0.4.0 增加自行定義按鍵功能，可自行定義需要的按鍵或字串 0.3.5 增加手勢設定，可以自定手勢動作來組合最適合自己的使用方式 0.3.0 加強了點擊連結的判斷，有較大的許可範圍，如果兩個連結接近，會出現列表選擇(並非把所有連結帶出到列表中，而是以點擊位置附近的連結) 0.2.8 增加延遲自動登入功能，對部份站台(如巴哈姆特)有效 評論中無法回覆，有問題請用 mail 通知，我會盡快處理 mail: kenshinnn@gmail.com 更新記錄： 0.7: 預設安裝路徑改為 Auto，可避開部份 Rom 安裝到 SD 卡無法使用的問題，仍然可以手動調整到 SD 卡 修正平版上 back 鍵造成關閉的問題 修正輸入法無法選字的問題 (Sync Lunaterm) 修正部份 Galaxy Note 無法連線的問題 (Sync Lunaterm) 增加功能按鈕可移至側邊鍵盤的選項 功能按鈕增加點擊後開啟鍵盤的設定 使用一段時間後，如誤觸再次送出登入資訊，會先提示做詢問 其他 Bug 修正 0.6.1: 修正新安裝沒有站台列表沒有任何內容的問題 修正部份崩潰問題 改善手勢判斷 0.6.0: 增加匯入預設鍵盤功能，預定帶了幾種鍵盤 增加可調整鍵盤切換模式，可以用滑動方式切換 匯入鍵盤設定時，增加預覽功能 移除語言設定項目 移除顯示狀態列功能，在終端機視窗中，點擊選單時，狀態列就會出現 簡體中文系統時，會使用 GBK 做為預設編碼 在終端機視窗中，長按 back ，即會強制斷線，短按則是離開不會斷線 增加登入/登入功能選單 增加嘗試登出功能，可自行設定登出用的功能字串 增加重新送出登入字串功能，自動登入失敗時，可嘗試此方式 移除用不到的資源項目，減少空間 0.5.2.1: 修正點擊連結可能崩潰問題 增加匯出成功訊息 0.5.2: 加大點擊連結範圍，許可範圍改為上下各真實單位的 2mm，不會因解析度許可範圍變小 修正點擊連結時，仍會觸發手勢問題 修正實體鍵盤對 alt, shift 的支援 (同步自 lunaterm) 0.5.0: 增加匯入、匯出鍵盤設定功能，匯出的檔案放在 SD 卡的 keyboardterm 目錄中，並包含預覽的圖片，也可以分享給別人 在終端機畫面中，選單出現時，顯示狀態列 修正一些崩潰問題 0.4.0: 增加更多預設手勢，如[,], 空白都可以反向手勢畫出 修正第一次啟動手勢無作用問題 增加設定，點擊功能按鈕(Fn)時，功能按鈕消失 增加自行訂義按鍵功能，可以自行字義需要的按鍵或字串 0.3.8: 增加貼上功能 (同步自 LunaTerm) 修正英文字畫字問題 (解決方式採用 LunaTerm 的方式) 隱藏停用的按鈕 增加 /\= 按鍵 主要功能： KeyboardTerm 新增加部份： 彈出 Menu 時，顯示狀態列 延遲2秒自動登入，對某站台有效(如巴哈姆特) 增加長按畫面移動游標功能(原來的手勢依然支援哦) 可自行設定畫面比例 可自行定義在畫面一邊的按鍵(亦可以隱藏) 虛擬按鍵可調整寬度，或是自行決定要放置於左方或右方 可以增加與畫面邊界的距離，避免誤觸 按鍵包含呼叫鍵盤及呼叫原 LunaTerm 功能鍵 在列表畫面時，點擊畫面會預設送出 Enter 鍵，即可進入項目 在文章畫面時，點擊畫面會預設送出空白鍵，可快速翻頁 可移動到 sd 卡，節省空間 點擊連結範圍加大，遇到連結位置接近時，會帶出列表供選擇 很多人問自動登入在那裡，自動登入就在站台列表長按後，就可以設定了 bbs站台形式眾多，作者沒辦法每個都測試過，如有發現問題歡迎回報 有在評論回報 bug 的，拜託如果有修復好的話，修改一下評論吧！ 原 LunaTerm 支援部份： 雙色字支援 放大鏡(移除大部份功能) 單向 UAO 轉換 軟體鍵盤顯示 自定的功能鍵 貼上功能 提醒您：BBS 是需要一直保持連線的，網路品質不好的狀況下是不適合使用的 本軟體的相關功能也會受到影響 本專案原始碼公開於開發人員專案網站
release_text: 預設安裝路徑改為 Auto，可避開部份 Rom 安裝到 SD 卡無法使用的問題，仍然可以手動調整到 SD 卡 修正平版上 back 鍵造成關閉的問題 修正輸入法無法選字的問題 (Sync Lunaterm) 修正部份 Galaxy Note 無法連線的問題 (Sync Lunaterm) 增加功能按鈕可移至側邊鍵盤的選項 功能按鈕增加點擊後開啟鍵盤的設定 使用一段時間後，如誤觸再次送出登入資訊，會先提示做詢問 其他 Bug 修正

Follow the installation instructions: Home - > Menu - > Wallpapers - > Live Wallpapers - Motion of flashes and lights keeps changing with time. - You can choose from several different background themes. - Optimized Battery Usage - Compatible with 99% mobile phone devices. - The wallpaper app will sleep when your phone is inactive, so this live wallpaper will not drain your battery. - Ocean Live Background fully supports horizontal orientation and looks amazing on both mobile phones and tablet devices. Do not miss this fabulous opportunity to beautify your Samsung Galaxy mobile phone with “ocean wallpaper” for free! Get these HD Wallpapers, inspired by ocean world completely free of charge. description: Welcome to a new world of Flashcards. AR Flashcards make learning fun with the technology of Augmented Reality! "It’s definitely unique and a very clever way to get children involved in learning the alphabet and animal names." - TheiPhoneMom.com “Through the use of augmented reality (AR) and flashcards – this app allows your children to learn in a new and exciting way! A new approach to flashcards!” - Digital Mom Blog “My daughter was repeating the letters and animal names and I could tell that she was learning a lot from this app, which of course is what is most important to me as a parent.” – MidwesternMoms.com “Children will love playing around with the cards and animals while learning the letters of the alphabet.” – Appysmarts.com "I absolutely love this unique twist on flashcards. I really think the novelty of AR, in this case, will help capture kids’ attention and get them primed to learn." -FunFindsForFamilies.com AR Flashcards are a new way to interact and make Flash cards more entertaining for toddlers and preschoolers. With AR Flashcards, learning is fun! When you point your device at the printed flashcard a beautifully rendered 3D animal will pop up on the screen. Tap the animal to hear the letter and animal name. Sometimes to get a good view of the 3D Models it is sometimes necessary to use the camera's autofocus. Double tap on the screen to bring up the focus option. Features: - 26 beautifully rendered Animals to help your toddler or preschooler learn the alphabet! - 6 beautifully rendered Dinosaurs! - Tap on each Animal to hear the Letter and name of the Animal! - Tap on each Dinosaurs to hear what it is! - Tap the screenshot button to save your pics of the beautiful AR animals! - Double tap the screen to bring up the focus button so that you can adjust your device's camera to better bring up the animals. - You can print out the flashcards or if you own two Android devices you can access the flashcards from within the app in a beautiful swipeable gallery! - Works on both phones and Tablets! *Note* You must visit http://www.arflashcards.com/ to download and print the free Flashcard Markers necessary to make this app work. Make sure to print the flashcards in color as they will not work in black and white. This app will only work on devices with a camera.
release_text: - Bug Fixes - Made the buttons react to touch so you know you've tapped them

description: A game set about Vehicles including 8 games. This entertaining and educational game for preschool kids helps develop motor skills, hand-eye coordination, imagination, and creativity. It aims to teach children shapes, image recognition, and number pronunciation. Memory: This is the classic game of cards where you have to find pairs of Vehicles images. It has over 40 stages, each of them harder than the last and will challenge even the adults ability to memorize positions at the later levels. Matching games are a great way to improve your kids' short-term memory skills, develop their concentration, and cognitive skills! Advanced Memory Game: The idea as in the previous game, just need to find 3 identical cards. Jigsaw Puzzle: One of the many Vehicles images gets cut up into small pieces and it’s up to you to put it back in the right order to complete the image. It has over 60 stages, each of them harder than the previous. You can see a preview of the image if you don’t know what it is you’re trying to put together. Shape Puzzle: The goal is to move shapes into the outline of an object. Once all of the puzzle pieces are in place, the object fills in with a compete image, and a voice gives some sort of encouragement, such as, "Good job!", etc. When you place the piece inside the puzzle's outline, it snaps into place. Comes with 100 levels, which should keep you kids busy for a long time. Connect The Dots: This game allows your preschool-age child to practice numbers and image recognition. The child must simply touch the numbers in sequence, and the app will draws the line for them. Each number is announced after pressing. The program is able to announce the numbers in 20 different languages: English, Spanish, German, French, Japanese, Korean, Russian, Italian, Dutch, Finnish, Norwegian, Swedish, Danish, Portuguese, Hindi, Chinese(Traditional), and Chinese(Simplified), Polish, Arabic and Turkish. When a child reaches the last number, the object fills in with a detailed cartoon image of the thing that you just traced. Scratch: Draw your finger over the screen to clear out a piece of the image. This is the one with the most creative freedom. With three thicknesses of the pen and three modes, you or your child can create nice effects or frames on the pictures. There’s Block Mode, that blocks out the image with a blue screen. As you draw over the screen, you see more of the image underneath. A creative person might make a nice frame or draw figures on the blue surface. The Black And White mode has a B/W image and as you draw over it, you get colors. The Frost Mode makes the image look like you’re seeing it through a window with frost all over it. As you draw, you clear some of the frost, making it look like you’re scratching away the frost on the window to peek inside. The game is optimized for Android phones and tablets. With this learning exercise children will have hours of fun.

Opera Max is a free, data-savings and data-management app that extends your data allowance. With Opera Max, you can easily manage your data by monitoring daily data usage and limit data-hogging apps to Wi-Fi only. Opera Max also provides data savings by compressing videos, photos, media and more on almost all of your favourite apps and websites - without any noticeable loss of quality. Data overage fees are a thing of the past with Opera Max! FEATURES Data savings Get 50% more out of your data allowance.* Opera Max extends your data allowance by compressing videos, images and media from apps and websites. Less data to download from websites also means faster mobile-browsing speeds for your phone. Watch more video Opera Max is the first app of its kind to compress mobile video, a huge consumer of your mobile data. This means you spend less data and time to watch videos on the web. Opera Max can condense a 10 MB video down to 3 MB* and significantly reduces instances of video buffering. It does this on almost any app on your phone - not just your browser. Data manager Opera Max helps you manage your data by providing real-time, daily and monthly data usage statistics. Monitor your data usage to find out what apps are consuming most of your data and block the data hogging apps from your mobile data. Private and secure Opera Max doesn't optimise any data sent using encrypted connections, so all your private data gets forwarded directly to the desired destination instead of being proxied through the Opera Max savings cloud. We neither analyse nor store your private data like photos, videos or emails, so you can have peace of mind. If you want more information about how privacy works in Opera Max, check out our FAQ at http://www.opera.com/help/max/faq/ . It's free! With Savings Pass, Opera Max is 100% free. Renewing your Savings Pass with Opera Max only takes a second, and we'll let you know when you're running out of savings time. We only ask that you occasionally watch an ad from our sponsor, share us on social media or rate us in the Google Play store. REVIEWS ★★★★★ "Opera Max has one goal: to save your mobile bandwidth." – Mashable ★★★★★ "It's a pretty seamless experience … It just works." – TechCrunch ★★★★★ "The trend towards capped data for mobile carriers has put some stress on users' browsing habits. Fortunately, Opera Max can compress data … so you use less of your data cap." - LifeHacker * Savings based on sampling of U.S. beta users. Your results may vary. Discover more at http://opera.com/mobile/max/ . Technical questions? Please refer to our FAQ at http://opera.com/help/max/faq/ . Connect with us on: Twitter - http://twitter.com/opera/ Facebook - http://facebook.com/opera/
release_text: * Updated First Run Experience * Opera Max popups are not displayed over critical system UI items * New translations * Various tweaks and stability improvements

description: THIS IS VERSION 1 (LEGACY) AND IS NO LONGER SUPPORTED. LOOK FOR VERSION 3 HERE: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=air.com.bajasim.atc4real.pro **************************** ATC4Real is the most realistic ATC Simulator for Android. It gathers real airplanes flights timetables so you could control only real aircrafts in your radar screen. No fictional flights were added. You will be able to simulate an ATC officer shift at Frankfurt International Airport EDDF / FRA. The scenery was based in real data navigation so you could practice real STARs and SID procedures. Lead every arrival into the actives runways and clear them to land and guide all departures into their exit fixes. Features: - ATC4Real simulates approach and departure control plus take off and landing runways assignment in EDDF airspace. - Real flight data gathered from real timetables (Not in realtime). - Timetables are updated periodically. - All controls are reachable through your touch so you do not need any keyboard input for main functions. - Separated strips for Arrivals and departures. - Toggle radar screen elements visibility. - Terrain heights simulated, avoid crashing into mountains! - Fixes and vors are accurate placed so you can practice instrument procedures published for EDDF airport. - Real weather updated every 10 minutes (Requires internet connection). - Satellite image as background optional. - There is no pause button just as in real life. - Zoom feature so you can do precise vectors. - Ranking system Start controlling now, play ATC4Real Frankfurt HD and have a lot of fun! Visit www.atc4real.com and check out all our airports. Compatibility: - We suggest you to install our free versions first to check your mobile device compatibility. - Adobe Air is required (Free download). You could be prompt to install it when starting. - This application has been designed for best viewing in HD tablets. Resolution 1024x768. Developed by Bajasim Keywords: EDDF, airplane games, aircrafts, atc, control tower, radar, flights, atc simulator, tracon, live atc,

Drug Interactions is a powerful international application to list and document interactions for all drugs. It also includes Prescription Checker, our application to detect more than 200 million potential drug interactions between two pharmaceutical forms. Drug interactions are detailed and drugs can be searched for from generic or brand names. Substitution by a similar drug or search for a drug are facilitated by browsing our comprehensive pharmacological classification. Patient management to store prescription history was added from version 1.2.7.

Free Words Puzzle Game. Try to find your ability of identifying meaningful words within a minute. The aim of the game is to gain points by creating words from the selection of eight letters given to you on-screen. Longer words give more points. Add letters to a word by clicking on the letters then click the 'OK' button. This is the first version of my game for free. Depending upon the response, I am planning to add many features. Your idea's are welcome. If you find any bugs please send me an email to shasunder@gmail.com

It is simple bubble popping game. Beat screen slowly filling with bubbles and pop as many bubbles as possible to move to the next level. Earn points by popping groups of bubbles of the same color. You can select and pop from the game board groups of 3 or more bubbles. New lines of bubbles will be felling from the top of the screen. To move to the next level you need to add number of rows of balls shown in the right top corner, each level you should add more balls then before. You will get more points for group of 6 balls, then for 2 groups of 3 balls. Pop and crash balls in this casual game.

description: Create vehicles with simple step-by-step instructions. Playing is fun and will add a lot the development of motoric skills. This puzzle game is really for all ages. Bring the bricks together and follow the color pattern. Have fun creating an airplane, car, boat, rocket and lots of other examples. The larger pieces allow toddlers to use the blocks with their own small hands. They will lose their imagination with these kinds of three dimensional designs. Let your creativity go and try alternative colors or add small changes. Let the youngest children play and be surprised with the results. Create those elegot figures and get the real and legot figures. These games are intended to play with colorful interlocking plastic building block toys. The blocks can be assembled and connected in many ways to construct such objects as vehicles, animals, buildings and even working robots. Anything constructed can be taken apart again and the pieces can be used to make other objects. Help your child as a parent and you will be surprised how fast the toddler and children will pick up the game. Take a picture and post the creation online. Happy faces will follow and your family and friend club will enjoy. This kid puzzle needs a set of building blocks like lego or mega bloks. Start with a basic set and have fun exploring this game. The step-by-step instructions are intended to let your kids get more out of these beautiful toys. Most duplo or mega blocks come with limited instructions. These instructions will help you to get the most out of the toys. There are also alternative sets available. If you like to play with building blocks, then this puzzle game is definitely for you! Have fun with these great constructions. Features: - Easy and clean user interface - Free puzzles - Nice graphics - For all ages - Share creations on social media

A very classic and addictive game ‘AE Bubble’ is free at your phone now! Come on, Follow our Roundy to have a Round-the-world Bubble Travel. Any feedback please emails us, because we can’t reply on comments. Thanks very much for all your support in our games! AE Bubble is a very casual game with elements of puzzle and shooter, unique machanics and easy- to- learn concept, various bonuses levels , colorful graphics and smooth gameplay make it an addictive game, it also requires strategy thinking, it’s a great way to kill time! The task of the game is to clear the playing field by forming groups of 3 or more like-colored bubbles, the goal of the game is to get the highest possible score, a player wins when there are no bubbles remaining on the playing field. Game includes: (1) 9 different color of Bubble (2) 7 varieties of Bubble type (3) 5 varieties of gorgeous game background (4) 2 varieties of game mode: Puzzle and Endless. If you like bubble shooter, or other shooting and elimination games, you shouldn’t miss this game! Come on! You will love the exciting shooting and playful music in game! Go and make more collapse and avalanches of bubbles!!

Ever wondered how it feels to drive and park Real Oil Truck or European Container Lorry? Or maybe you’re thinking of becoming a professional Trucker and wish to train your parking and driving skills? #Enjoy one of the largest maps and most realistic car games on the store# Truck Parking Simulation 2014 is designed for both casual players and pro drivers. The car physics engine used for trucks contains more than 50 different parameters adjusted precisely with the specs of different truck models. Parking lot in campaign mode is adjusted to typical parking lot in actual trucker exams. Experience over 140 3D levels in a real trucker parking environment and unlock all parking stars. Each level requirers different approach and set of truck parking skills. Have fun and become the best trucker in this driving and parking simulator! ### Game features include ### - 140+ Levels in parking campaing designed for oil truck and semi-truck - 400+ PRO Trucker Stars to earn - 4 Different Trucks with distinct driving and parking parameters (2 real trucks and 2 trucks in Kids Mode) - Realistic and huge city map (over 1000 square miles) - Kids Mode - smaller trucks to train parking and driving skills BONUS - UNIQUE FEATURE! - Some levels require to attach and unattach truck trailer. COMING SOON: Snow & Rain - realistic change of truck behaviour in different weather conditions with over 250 new levels. 3D Truck Parking Simulation is high-end driving and parking car simulator. Drive and park european container lorry and oil truck in this realistic and free racing simulation game. Note: 3D Truck Parking Simulation - Trucker Simulator may contain information about our other games or games advertised by our partners. You can remove all ads served by our partners and unlock additional elements in the game by purchasing an in-app, though it is not essential to pay in order to enjoy our game. If you like Truck Parking Simulation 2014 - Trucker Simulator, please support us by giving us 5 star rating in the Google Play Store. If you have any questions or suggestions concerning our simulation game, feel free to e-mail us.

app_name: Moo, Baa, La La La! - Boynton
description: ★★ Children's Technology Review Editor's Choice ★★ ★★ Parents' Choice Recommended ★★ ★★ Kirkus Reviews - Kirkus Star ★★ ★★ Common Sense Media - 5 Stars ★★ JUST MOO IT! Sandra Boynton’s best-selling book of all time comes alive with sound and movement and gloriously unpredictable interactivity. The wryly inventive Moo, Baa, La La La! digital book app will intrigue and amuse little kids and big people alike, and perhaps even elicit an appreciative snort from the occasional uninvited rhinoceros. “This is my second digital book project with the perfectly wonderful team at Loud Crow,” says Sandra Boynton, “and I’m really happy with what we’ve created together. As with The Going to Bed Book, our interactive book app version of Moo, Baa, La La La! succeeds in retaining the original board book experience, while adding multi-sensory dimension. It’s such a cool enterprise.” Far beyond any e-book experience, the Moo, Baa, La La La! interactive book app has all the magic and appeal of a traditional pop-up book, offering lively interactivity and nifty discovery. Of course you can hear each animal make its unique sound. (In some cases, VERY unique.) But there’s more! Help the perplexed chicken stagehand raise the curtain on a stageful of dapper dancing pigs. Turn day to night with the touch of the moon. Slingshot the running cats away from the barking dogs. A touch of the duck activates a quack which brings in another duck. And another. And another. Even the back cover has a curiously articulate spokesman that you really mustn’t miss. Features: * The second Boynton Moo Media book app (following their top-selling debut, The Going To Bed Book app), venturing far beyond what an e-book experience can offer * Touch the animals to hear them moo or oink or quack or even, in the case of three incongruous showbiz pigs, harmonize * Boynton has redrawn and recolored the original illustrations for her most popular book ever, Moo, Baa, La La La! (over 5 million in print!) * Includes an original instrumental soundtrack, "Country Air," a wonderful uptempo pastoral string quartet written by Michael Ford * Realistic page turning interactions just like the original board book * "The Big Guy Reads It" with word highlighting to help improve reading skills * Or “I want to read it myself” and hear individual words pronounced with the tap of a finger

description: 1日のうちで最も体重が軽い「朝」と、最も重い「晩」。 「朝晩の体重差を理想値に抑える」という目標を毎日作ることで 自然な減量へと導く朝晩ダイエットを、強力にサポートする便利なアプリです。 【朝晩ダイエットを成功に導く！アプリの特徴】 ●目標体重やダイエット結果を毎日表示。 　みんなのダイエット結果もチェックできるから、やる気アップ！ ●朝晩の体重変化をわかりやすくグラフで表示 ●毎月の達成状況を、月ごとに一覧でチェック ●あなた専用の減量アドバイスをお届け ●スマートフォンをかざすだけで体重を記録！ （オムロン体重体組成計（HBF-208IT, HBF-215F, HBF-252F,HBF-254C）に限ります。） もちろん手入力でも利用可能！ ※「朝晩ダイエット」監修 独立行政法人国立病院機構京都医療センター 臨床研究センター 予防医学研究室長 坂根直樹先生 「朝晩ダイエット」アプリの詳細はこちら http://www.wellnesslink.jp/p/s/app01.html?link=googleplay 対応機器についてはこちら http://wlm.jp/?link=googleplay ---------- 本アプリをご利用いただくには、「WM（わたしムーヴ）」への登録（無料）が必要です。 「WM」はドコモ・ヘルスケア株式会社が運営する、からだの記録＆健康管理のためのポータルサイトです。 詳細はこちら⇒　 http://www.watashi-move.jp/pc/wm/about.html ---------- ■対応スマートフォン一覧 スマートフォンでご覧の方はこちら http://www.wellnesslink.jp/p/s/env.html?link=googleplay PCでご覧の方はこちら http://www.wellnesslink.jp/p/support/364q4b0000004gfz.html?link=googleplay ※一部機種を除く ※iPhone、Windows phoneには対応していません ※NFC(Near Field Communication = 近距離通信)のFeliCaに対応しています Most weight and light "morning" of the day, the heaviest "evening". It is possible to make a goal of "suppressed to the ideal value the morning and evening of the weight difference" every day The morning and evening diet leading to natural weight loss, it is a useful app that strongly support. [Morning and evening I lead to success on a diet! Features of the app] ● To display the target weight and diet results every day. And because everyone's diet results can be checked, motivated up! ● The displayed in easy to understand graph the morning and evening of weight change ● Check the monthly progress, in the list on a monthly basis ● Delivering your own weight loss advice ● To record the weight by simply holding the smartphone! (Omron body composition meter (HBF-208IT, HBF-215F, HBF-252F, but only HBF-254C).) Also available in the course manual input! ※ "morning and evening diet" supervision National Hospital Organization Kyoto Medical Center Clinical Research Center Preventive Medicine Research Office Sakane Naoki teacher For more information about "morning and evening diet" app here http://www.wellnesslink.jp/p/s/app01.html?link=googleplay For compatible devices here http://wlm.jp/?link=googleplay ---------- To get use of this app is a must have "WM (I Move)" registration to the (free). description: Aaj Tak is a 24-hour Hindi news television channel run by TV Today Network. Aaj Tak news channel website covering breaking news, latest news, entertainment, bollywood business and sports. India's No. 1 Hindi news channel Aaj Tak TV was launched in 2000 as a 24-hour Hindi News Channel, covering India with insight, courage and plenty of local flavour. Aaj Tak website provides latest Hindi news, breaking news and much more. Apart from a plethora of text and video content, the website also has photo galleries.

With sixteen radio stations and a news agency, Cogeco Diffusion has something for every listener in Québec. That’s 16 radio stations at your fingertips! The Beat 92.5 is the group's only English-language station and is Montreal’s only English-language Hot Adult Contemporary station. French-language stations include the Rythme FM network (Montreal, Estrie, Mauricie, Outaouais, Saguenay et Abitibi), 96.9 CKOI FM, 98,5 fm Montréal and its talk network (104,7 fm Outaouais, 107,7 fm Estrie and 106,9 fm Mauricie), Radio Circulation 730, 102,9 Québec, FM 93 Québec and CIME (Laurentians). Cogeco News Agency is the information provider for all of the stations operated by Cogeco Diffusion and also provides many other radio stations with national and international news. Cogeco News is heard throughout most of Québec. Cogeco Diffusion - Radio for everyone, across Québec.

For Jehovah's Witnesses - a tablet tool for preparing and delivering talks. Helps keep speakers organized an on time with an un-cluttered view of each heading/section of an outline. Includes a talk timer. Upon launching the app, there are now three buttons - two of which are completely new - one for creating a new outline and another for editing outlines you have already created and saved. The third button opens the talk timer outline screen, which previously comprised the entire app. It has not changed and you can deliver and time your talks with it in the same manner as the original app version. This update creates a new folder named "Talk Outlines" beneath the tablet's internal storage directory, which is typically named "sdcard" by most tablet manufacturers. Look for the "Talk Outlines" folder within "sdcard", or "sdcard0". Outlines created with the new editor will now be saved with the .outline file extension. If you are updating from the previous version, you will still be able to use any outlines you already have by browsing to the appropriate folder where they were previously saved. When you re-save a previous outline, it will be saved in the new "Talk Outlines" folder as a .outline file type. Download the Instructions/Tutorial file directly onto your tablet at: http://www.clicsys.com/taptalk/Tutorial.txt If the tutorial opens in your browser, use "Save As" to save it to your "Downloads" folder. Open the Tutorial.txt or Tutorial.outline file directly in the app for a demo which provides instructions. If you have limited financial means, please contact the developer ( admin@clicsys.com or visit www.clicsys.com/android and send a message or private posting)- we will provide it free of charge. We have to charge a small amount, mostly to cover the cost of participating in and managing our various app store accounts and hosting services. Otherwise, this would be free. This app will also be provided without charge to Special and Regular Pioneers. Please provide your name and location when requesting a download link from admin@clicsys.com . If you need to use this type of app for commercial purposes, please see our other app listings - or search for TapTalk. Thanks for looking.
release_text: Jan 18 2014 Edit screen adjusted to improve scrolling with on-screen (soft) keyboard. Solves issue of lines overlapping which occurred on some tablets. Jan. 11, 2014 *** JW Outline now includes a full editor so you can create (write), and edit your talk outlines from within the app. No additional editing apps or software are needed to create new outlines.

Comme son nom l'indique "The longest game ever" est... le jeu le plus long du monde ! Aucun être humain n'a encore été capable de terminer ce jeu ! Affrontez "7804j", l'intelligence artificielle ultra-performante et poussez-la à bout jusqu'à ce qu'elle abandonne. Jusqu'à présent, aucun mortel n'est encore parvenu à la vaincre et tous ont fini par abandonner, morts de fatigue. Attention : selon de récentes recherches, le taux de suicide des individus ayant tenté de terminer ce jeu serait approximativement 72% plus élevé que la moyenne ! Allez-vous relevez le défi ? Combien de centaines d'heures allez-vous tenir avant de craquer ? Pour terminer ce jeu, votre meilleure arme sera la patience. Pas de difficultés, ou très peu, tout ce qu'il vous faudra est de la persévérance, de la ténacité et un peu d'acharnement ainsi que d'obstination ;) Avertissement : Jeu hautement addictif... et pourtant également terriblement ennuyeux, sans intérêt, assommant, un peu casse-pieds, très chiant et assez collant, relativement contrariant, crampon et désolant, embêtant (voire même emmerdant), parfois empoisonnant, aussi fâcheux que fastidieux, fatigant ou insipide (peut-être même les deux), lassant, monotone, narcotique (oui !), dans tous les cas pénible, rasoir comme un rasant raseur, soporifique et pour finir agaçant (liste non exhaustive évidemment). Commencer ce jeu et ne pas le finir, c'est ajouter votre nom à la longue liste de ceux qui ont échoué. description: Experience the thrill of retro racing on crazy tracks in the very first social racer – completely in the style of 8 and 16-bit classics. Enjoy the reinterpretation of old-school gameplay in combination with perfect controls and the driving beats of unique artist Bit Shifter! Be creative: Race on self-designed tracks and share them with people all over the world! Countless level objects and a user-friendly editor offer you virtually infinite possibilities to let your creativity run free. Compete against friends and the highest ranking players and beat their times on original tracks and maps created by them! Fight your way to the top of the global leaderboards! Thanks to pick-up-and-play controls, you can jump right in and you'll soon be drifting through the bends and speeding along the virtual tarmac like a pro! FEATURES - A large selection of tracks and vehicles - Powerful level editor with countless objects and functions - Various control modes to suit everybody's style - Fast-paced racing game with a fresh interpretation of the 8-bit/16-bit style - Fantastic soundtrack by Bit Shifter - Global cross-platform leaderboard system for constant competition - HID Controller support, NVIDIA Shield and MOGA support - Supports Tablets & Smartphones

description: Even Better Password Maker (EBPM) creates an unique password for each website. You supply a "master password" and the URL of a website. EBPM then generates an unique password for that website. App *NEVER* accesses the internet (check permissions if worried) and does not store any secret on disk. Compatible with other applications based on Passwordmaker ( http://passwordmaker.org ) namely the google-chrome and firefox plugin. All code is open source under a Gnu GPL license at: https://github.com/joninvski/even_better_password_maker Any problems or sugestions/feedback please email: trindade.joao@gmail.com

description: Flashcards Deluxe is an easy to use yet powerful and full-featured flashcard app which you can use to study just about anything you want. (There is a free lite version available.) Features: • Two smart study modes that automatically focus more on the cards you miss: Leitner and a more advanced Spaced Repetition mode (similar to SuperMemo or Anki) • Quizlet and Cram.com integration - Browse and download any of their 4 million+ flashcard sets. • Text to speech (TTS) audio in 18 languages (no internet connection needed to study) • Multiple choice option • Spelling tests (listen to audio and use keyboard to answer) • Searchable listing of your cards that allows you to easily look up other terms as you study • Organize decks in folders and combine decks for studying • Several flashcard color themes to choose from (sky, wood, chalkboard, etc.) • Divide cards into categories • 1 to 5 sided cards • Include pictures and sounds. Zoom into pictures. Auto repeat sounds. • 3 response levels: Wrong, I kind of know, I know really well (vs the standard correct/wrong) - for more efficient studying • Easy navigation - swipe or tap to answer (customizable) • Draw self-graded answer with your finger (drawing not saved) • Automatically turn cards off after getting them correct a certain number/percentage of reviews • Clean, efficient user interface, including full-screen and landscape viewing • Custom text and background colors • Browse mode that lets you easily navigate forward or back without keeping score • Slideshow mode • Large number of cards (10,000+) can be imported easily • Backup your flashcards to your computer • Dropbox and Google Drive support • Very easy to get started, with lots of features and options for advanced users • Great support! I promptly respond to any questions or feedback you may have. Use my website's public forum or email me. You can create flashcards either on your computer or directly within the app. If you don't want to make your own, you can browse and download flashcards from Quizlet or Cram.com. Please see our website at OrangeOrApple.com for more information. If you are not satisfied with the product for any reason, please let me know why and I'll try to help.
release_text: • Quiz - Simulate an in-class exam. Use bottom-center button in study screen to start. • For those studying HTML, added "Don't Parse HTML" option. Decks > Edit > (tap deck) > Advanced > Don't Parse HTML • Bug fixes

description: THIS IS EXTREME VERSION = NO ADS, NO IAPS, PURE ARCADE CHALLENGE! Ultimate arcade challenge with innovative controls and minimalist design - that's what the 0-SNAKE is about. description: Access your Delicious bookmarks from your Android device. Add new bookmarks, and browse your bookmarks by tags. An excellent way to find websites you thought you'd forgotten

Allows you to edit and delete records in any SQLite database on your phone. For root users, lists all installed apps which have local internal databases. You can then select an app and edit any of its databases. Fully integrated with Root Explorer. When browsing files in Root Explorer, selecting a database file automatically launches this app instead of the database viewer that is built into Root Explorer. Non-root users can browse and edit databases on the SD card. Data is displayed in a smooth scrollable grid and records can be filtered on any field value. To quickly get to regularly accessed databases you can either add them to the bookmarks list or look on the recently accessed tab.

description: From Genii Games' Àsà stable comes this culturally and morally rich African folktale. What happens when the Monkeys suddenly stop disapproving of their looks? Well, the Monkeys have taken a stance against the Humans and are ready to measure up with them, whatever it takes. If you have ever wondered why Monkeys look like Humans, follow them on their mission to find out. Features * Moral and cultural undertones to the story * Three ways to read: Read to Me: automatically reads each page of the story to you; Read it Myself: allows you to read yourself; Auto Play: automatically reads the entire story to you. * Ease of Navigation: Swipe the screen to change pages or use the navigational arrows. * Repeat Narration: Repeat the narration for any page * Page selector: select which page you chose to read or commence reading from via the menu. * Folk songs: Enjoy beautiful folksongs complete with drums, voice etc. * Cultural highlights: Pick up simple cultural tips on different pages by selecting highlighted texts and pictures. * Games: Play through a selection of puzzle games to put together scenes, crafts picked up from the story. * Hide or remove narrative texts: Hide or show the narrative text depending on your choice. * Mute or Play background music: Allow or disallow the matching background music at any time * Mute or Play narration: Switch from 'Read to me' to 'Read it Myself' reading mode by simply muting the sound button * Parent Section: A secure Parent section provides parents or adults with a secure means of providing feedback directly from the app. Recommended Ages: 2 – 12 years. Also, if you're looking to get started on African culture in a subtle manner then this app is for you. To catch up with more culturally rich fables and other apps in our growing collection, Visit us: www.geniigames.com Like us on Facebook: www.facebook.com/geniigames Follow us on Twitter: @genii_games Feedback You’re welcome to reach us anytime. Mail us at info@geniigames.com . You can also do so without leaving the app by accessing the form feature under the Secured Parent Section of the app. We’d also appreciate your review on Google Play.

app_name: Speech to text / Voice to text
description: Sensation! Throw out your keyboard and forget about buttons on your smartphone! Our app will record everything you say! Stop wasting time for routine typing. Using a speech synthesis system the app transforms human voice into text, which can be saved and sent via e-mail. Now you can create texts in your device very fast, using only your voice. The convenient app will be useful for different specialists – copywriters, writers, translators, businessmen etc. The program can be used during conversation with a client or a partner when you need shorthand, when you need to rapidly create a text, for people with disabilities etc. Advantages of the Speech to text messenger: • Recognizes texts automatically, no need to transcribe them manually; • High accuracy of recognition; • Convenient and simple interface, special knowledge is not required to work with the app; • Created text can be sent as SMS or via e-mail; • Multi-language feature—several languages are built into the app, so you can dictate text not only in Russian, but also in English, German, French, Italian and so on. To do so you have to choose the right language in settings. How to work with the app: 1. Download and install the Voice-to-text messenger, and let the app work for you; 2. Choose the “Notes” section – here you can type the text or dictate it into the microphone; 3. After the note text is ready, you can save, delete, or send it via SMS or e-mail. System requirements: Android 2.2 Internet connection Using Google Voice text

description: Map of the Subway of Delhi offline. If you are not in your own country, you probably need an offline map of Delhi subway. This map is a simple image, and we think that's all that you need. Isn't it?

This app was developed by an medical oncologist for hematologists in order to not miss important new publications. The app allows you to scan relevant journals in hematology in a fast and efficient way for the newest papers. In addition you can define pubmed searches of your topic of interest and add custom rss-feeds. You can scroll abstracts (or even full text with the weblink) to quickly decide whether that is a relevant paper for you or not. If so, you can mail the link and read/store the paper in your library on your PC or laptop. Or you can save it to the myarticles section of the app and read it later on your iphone. You can also share with friends and colleagues by email, facebook or twitter (iOS 5). Although the big journals have apps themselves, you tend to loose yourself in all the additional content provided. Moreover it is often not convenient to read articles on the iphone. Journal Scan Hematology is the answer for fast and efficient scans of important information.

If you can't install after bought, you can email me at vplayer@yixia.com Please install 'VPlayer Video Player' at first. VPlayer 3.x is next generation of VPlayer, which brings experimental HW accelerated decoding and rendering to HD MKV/AVI/MOV/FLV/TS/M4V/3GP for most Android devices. Also a new designed UI is available now, and of course, a new icon. Access your NAS/Wifi/UPnP/DLNA/DVR/Dropbox/Facebook/Gmail videos from VPlayer seamlessly!!! Play Youtube videos and Vimeo videos directly in VPlayer! VPlayer is a HW accelerated Media player for android. It use HW video decoder at various containers and audio codecs combination. Dual Core/High end devices ( Sensation , Galaxy S/S2 , Nexus-S ) can play 720p even 1080p MKV/AVI/MOV/FLV/TS/M4V/3GP. VPlayer drains less bettery than SW based players such as MX Video Player, MoboPlayer. ICS devices can play 1080p files with full HW accelerations, Honeycomb tablets can play 720p MKV with Full HW accelerations. If you use MIUI, CM7 or unofficial ROMs that can not play MKV/FLV/MOV/AVI using default player, VPlayer is the best solution. Features Formats - AVI,MOV,MKV,FLV,AVI,3GP,3G2,ASF,WMV,MP4,M4V,TP,TS,MTP,M2T Video Codecs - HW : MPEG-4,H.264,H.263 - SW : MPEG-4,H.264,RMVB,XVID,MS MPEG-4,VP6,H.263,MPEG-1,MPEG-2, H265, VP9 Audio Codecs - AAC,Vorbis,FLAC,MP3,MP2,WMA - Mutitle audtio tracks support Subtitle - (Advanced) SubStation Alpha(.ssa/.ass), SAMI(.smi), SubViewer(.sub), Subrip(.srt), MicroDVD(.sub), MPL2(.txt) - MKV subtitle extraction supported - Unicode/Multibyte charset supported. - Mutiple subtitle tracks support - Increased subtitle readability with thicker border and shadow around text. Transport - HTTP - RTP/RTSP/RTMP - MMS - HTTP Live Streaming with multiple bitrate Supported devices * ICS devices, Galaxy Nexus, Nexus S * Honeycomb tables(TF101,GT10.1,Iconia500) : 720p High@4.1 ( no weighted prediction ) * Samsung Galaxy S2 : 1080p H.264 high@5.1/MPEG-4,1080i AVCHD MTS * Samsung Nexus S, Galaxy S and variants : 720p H.264 High@5.1 * Samsung Galaxy Tab(7') : 1080p H.264 High@5.1. 1080i have interlace artifacts. * Samsung Galaxy Note : 1080p H.264 High@5.1 * HTC Desire HD,ThunderBolt : 720p High@3.1/4.0(some Level 4.0 file have shutter problem) * HTC Desire and QSD8250 baesd devices : 720p H.264 High@3. * HTC Evo 3D : 720p High@5.1/1080p High@5.1(some 1080p files have shuttering) * Dell Streak,Venue : 720p H.264 High@3.1 * HTC wildfire: video capability depends on your firmware. * Moto Atrix: 720p High@5.1 * Xiao mi: 720p High@4.1 More devices are supporting... Limitations * Video capability depends on your devices HW video decodes' capability. * Some devices(Moto Defy, Galaxy S/Tab) need gingerbread update. * Tegra 2 based devices : H.264 High@4.1 ( no weighted prediction )

description: Crochet Stitches Tips And Tricks is an eBook app that provides comprehensive information and resource about crocheting. This is an updated version of Crochet Stitches 2012 eBook app. This is an all-around reference that covers the basics from tools and materials to an in depth quick study of the crocheting lingo. This crocheting book contains all the basic information needed by a crocheter like it’s history, the materials needed to start a crochet project, using the proper technique in catching the yarn, how to use a row counter as well as tapestry needles and the basic stitches necessary to start a simple project. It will teach the crocheter the proper use of an afghan hook as well as various innovations in crocheting. Various techniques on different kinds of stitches were also discussed, like the Persian and Bullion stitch, how to do treble crochet and other techniques that will guarantee a more professional–looking output. The book is a compilation of more than twenty years experience in crocheting and was designed to dish out all the tips, tricks and techniques everyone needs to know about the craft. Thus it can supplement or add value to your various crochet books collection. The book presents the basics about crocheting as well as the latest innovations in the world of crocheting today. It’s like having a personal crochet instructor right at the comfort of your smartphone, which would prove very handy indeed. The end of the book provides you references and resources to further your knowledge and skills. Resources for crochet patterns are also mentioned. This is a book-type application, meaning, you can flip through the pages as if it is a real book. The display font size can be customized to suit your preference. The default setting is 45 pixels. The day and night color mode settings can be customized as well. These settings can be found on the 'Config' option. You can jump through any topic by clicking the option button on your smartphone and then selecting 'Catalog'. You can also create bookmarks of your favorite pages. Enjoy!
