description: Create smooth stop-motion animation and time-lapse in minutes, on the move - anywhere. Clayframes is easy to use and has a rich set of professional features for making stop-frame animation (or claymation) and time-lapse movies. Please try before you buy: Clayframes Lite is the free trial version. Try making a movie with the Clayframes Lite demo app before buying to confirm compatibility with your device. Clayframes includes these powerful features: * Mp4 video exporter for Android 4.3 and higher. Plays with built-in Android player. * AVI video exporter and player. * Onion-skinning (transparent overlay) for smooth movement. Align the current shot with the previous one. * Preview Loop: Review your movie as you shoot it! Make fast progress without stopping to review. * Trigger camera shutter remotely using a hand clap or the phones proximity sensor. Avoids camera shake. * Timed shutter release option for time-lapse movies. Any interval from 1 second to 1 hour. * Add audio using the microphone on your device. Record your own vocals, effects or soundtrack. * Import images. * Draw over your photos. * Preview your stop motion at different speeds before exporting to video. * Edit ANY frames; add and remove frames at any position in your movie. Get that timing just right. * Add to your movie at ANY time; add more frames to older movies. * Adjust playback speed (frames per second) at any time. * Quick single frame duplication and deletion. * Copy, reverse and delete clips of frames or the whole movie. * Review slider gives quick navigation and touch controlled playback speed. * Choice of image resolution; including HD. * Share your stop motion directly with email, YouTube or Facebook. * Play the whole movie or selected clips, without exporting. * Compact app can be installed on SD card. See our site for stop motion samples, help file and FAQ. Please email us if you have any problems or questions and would like a response. Tip: If the silent shutter option has no effect on your device then try turning the volume control down. Tip: Do not use the Force GPU Rendering option in Ice Cream sandwich. [stopmotion, stop motion animation, stopframe, stop frame, time lapse, timelapse, clay frames, clay frame, animation, claymation]
release_text: 16 Oct 2014 Duplicate last frame when drawing Use Nexus 7 upside down (updated) Increase time lapse limit to 100 hours Camera preview update Bug fixes 1 Jun 2014 Draw on frames. Bug fixes on startup and in playback options. 18 Apr 2014 New Icons 31 Mar 2014 Use counter button to play recent frames in camera preview. 22 Mar 2014 YouTube upload fix for Android 4.2.2 YouTube upload FAQ Alpha Brush edit images to erase wires and rigs (Android 3.0+ only) Extra SD card support: see last FAQ

description: In this game you will be firefighter! In different missions you can drive fire truck, jeep, car and transporter. You will be able to perform firefighter tasks in 8 different missions and 45 levels: • Town • City • Downtown • Viaduct • Highway • Village • Big city • Huge city Advantages: • Beautiful city scenarios • Complete game size is only 48 MB - no extra download needed • Changing weather conditions • Simple but colorful and fast graphics rendering • No extra permissions needed for installation • Easy quit from game • 4 different vehicles • Big highway intersections • Simulation mode (1st person, no damage allowed, no time limit) • Freedom mode (select any vehicle, no objective, just drive) • Random mode will open you one of completed levels with random vehicle and random sky Features: • Unity 3D engine • Possibility to configure difficulty level: easy, medium, hard • Possibility to configure way to control your vehicle: by touch, by slider, by using wheel and by tilt screen • Possibility to reduce visibility range, to increase frame rate on low-end devices • Possibility to change camera during game (in car, follow car, rotate cam, dynamic and static) • During loading of levels check new games from our partner advertisement network This game is available in 2 versions: • LITE (free, total download size 48 MB, some levels) • FULL (paid, total download size 48 MB, all 48 levels) Warning: • BEFORE YOU BUY FULL VERSION, PLEASE CHECK LITE VERSION (free) ON YOUR MOBILE PHONE • IF DOWNLOAD OR INSTALL DOESN'T WORK, RESTART YOUR PHONE AND TRY OVER Wi-Fi AND OVER MOBILE INTERNET • MAKE SURE YOU HAVE ENOUGH FREE SPACE ON YOUR MOBILE PHONE • THIS GAME MIGHT NOT WORK ON LOW END DEVICES AS IT NEEDS A LOT OF RAM MEMORY • TO GET BEST RENDERING PERFORMANCE CLOSE OTHER ACTIVE APPLICATIONS ON YOUR MOBILE Notes: • Use LITE version to check Duty Driver Firetruck LITE performance, before downloading full version! • You need better Android device to run this game. If you have low-end device and game works to slow, even after reducing visibility range and turning off fog and other effects, please don't rate this game with 1 star. Just get faster Android. • On some devices visibility range, model details and textures might be different, depending of device that you are using • In case of bad performance, reduce visibility range in OPTIONS/GRAPHICS to 150 meters and turn the fog OFF • If you will like this game, check occasionally Google Play for new versions of Duty Driver • Vehicle traffic use simple physics model in order to work fast on mobile devices • Loading of some levels might be longer because world is built element by element to reduce total game size to 48 MB • There is no animated walking people as it could decrease rendering performance • Auto-detect mode will decrease visibility range if rendering speed drops below 20 frames per second (FPS) and increase above 30 FPS • During loading of levels check new games from our partner advertisement network • Email us your experience with this game: ideas for new episodes of Duty Driver, what you don't like and what kind of missions did you like the best Enjoy the game!

Mieux gérer votre stress avec Psychologies coaching Apprenez à vivre votre quotidien en toute sérénité, en définissant votre programme personnalisé d’exercices et de conseils. Avec l’appli Zéro Stress conçue par Psychologies magazine, gérer votre temps, maîtriser vos émotions et communiquer sereinement n’auront plus de secrets pour vous. Par ailleurs, découvrez les bons réflexes pour faire baisser très vite la pression en cas de situation de stress : respiration, relaxation, méditation…, autant d’exercices que vous trouverez dans la trousse d’urgence antistress. Neutraliser le stress est un processus qui comporte plusieurs étapes. C’est pourquoi l’application Psychologies coaching est composée de 4 coachings pour apprendre jour après jour, selon un vrai programme de formation. Bonne nouvelle : cinq minutes par jour seulement suffisent pour se relaxer et assimiler les clés d’une vie apaisée ! Coaching 1. Faire baisser la pression Le stress est un poison. Vous en êtes persuadé, vous le subissez et vous voulez neutraliser ses effets toxiques, vous relaxer. Pour cela, nous avons élaboré un coaching spécial pour vous aider à retrouver la paix du corps et de l’esprit. Au menu : des exercices et conseils psychocorporels et comportementaux. A la clé : un quotidien apaisé et des relations plus sereines ! Coaching 2. Gérer son temps Est-ce urgent, important, les deux à la fois ? Relax ! Découvrez nos méthodes pour hiérarchiser vos tâches et prendre du temps pour vous. Coaching 3. Réguler ses émotions Êtes-vous une « éponge émotionnelle » ? Faites notre test et suivez nos conseils pour ne plus vous laisser déborder par vos émotions et celles des autres. Coaching 4. Communiquer sereinement Comment oser (enfin) dire non ? Recevoir une critique sans vous effondrer ? Appliquez nos exercices pour vous exprimer avec calme et fermeté. Avec cette application Psychologies, vous pourrez : • Avoir à portée de main les outils de votre trousse d’urgence antistress pour vous relaxer • Apprendre au travers d’exercices concrets et pratiquer quand vous voulez et où vous voulez • Vous mettre au défi avec les «challenges» A propos de l’auteure : Flavia Mazelin Salvi est journaliste à Psychologies magazine depuis plus de 10 ans. Spécialisée en psychologie et en développement personnel, elle a écrit plusieurs livres sur le zen parus aux Presses du Châtelet. Ce que la presse en dit Elle "Grâce à des tests et des exercices personnalisés, elle nous guide pour gérer notre anxiété au quotidien. On apprend à mieux gérer son temps, à réguler ses émotions et à communiquer plus sereinement, avec calme mais fermeté Huffington Post "Une méthode d'apprentissage (...) qui conjugue esprit ludique et volonté pédagogique, remèdes d'urgence et techniques au long cours. " e-santé "Une bonne appli très pédagogique ... utiliser une telle application permet enfin de prendre un peu le temps de s’occuper de soi." better manage your stress with Psychologies coaching Learn to live your life with confidence, defining your personal exercise and counseling program. With Zero Stress app designed by Psychologies magazine, manage your time, manage your emotions and communicate confidently no longer have secrets for you. Also learn good habits to the pressure in case of stress quickly down: breathing, relaxation, meditation ... so many exercises that you find in the antistress emergency kit. Neutralize the stress is a process that involves several steps. That is why the coaching Psychologies application consists of 4 coaching to learn every day, according to a real training program. Good news: only five minutes a day is enough to relax and absorb the key to a peaceful life! Coaching 1. To lower the pressure Stress is a poison. You're convinced you suffer and you want to neutralize its toxic effects, relax. For this, we developed a special coaching to help you find peace of body and mind. On the menu: exercises and psychocorporels and behavioral advice. At stake: a calmer and more serene daily relationships! Coaching 2. Time management Is it urgent, important, both at once? Relax! Discover our methods to prioritize your tasks and take time for yourself. Coaching 3. Regulate emotions Are you an "emotional sponge"? Take our test and follow our advice to not leave you overwhelmed by your emotions and those of others. Coaching 4. Communicate confidently How dare (finally) say no? Receive criticism without collapsing? Apply our exercises to express yourself calmly and firmly. Psychologies with this application, you can: • Have on hand tools busting your emergency kit to relax • Learn through practical exercises and practice when you want and where you want • You challenge them with 'challenges' About the Author: Flavia Mazelin Salvi is Psychologies magazine journalist for over 10 years. Specializing in psychology and personal development, she has written several books on Zen published by Presses du Châtelet. What the Press Says It "Through testing and personalized exercises, she guides us to manage our anxiety everyday. You learn to better manage their time, to regulate emotions and communicate more confidently, calmly but firmly Huffington Post "A learning (...) method that combines playful and educational control, emergency and technical remedies in the long term." e-health "Good app ... very educational use such an application can finally take some time to look after yourself."

Multi-function pregnancy calculator. Please email me if you would like to help translate the app into your language. Localizations done: English, Portuguese, Russian, Polish, Spanish, Hebrew, French, Japanese (incomplete) Try the Free version (also available on Market)! Calculate dates of pregnancy: -Last menstrual period (LMP) -Estimated date of conception -Weeks gestational age (WGA) -WGA obtained by ultrasound -Estimated due date (EDC) -Adjust length of cycle and luteal phase -Store multiple patients for easy retrieval -Full Help pages available -Export data to XML on SD card -Import saved data (Pro version only) -Save app to SD card (PRO version only) -"Time Machine" mode can calculate "How many weeks will patient be on xxxx date?" and "When will patient be xx weeks gestation?" -Include extra notes in patient data Please note: This app may be used for personal tracking purposes, but it is primarily meant to be a clinical tool for professional healthcare workers. ******************** ***IMPORTANT NOTE*** ******************** This app calculates exactly 280 days (40 weeks) from LMP to EDC, and accordingly for any date in between. Please note that the paper/plastic wheels used by obstetricians or ultrasound technicians are inherently inaccurate. Different pregnancy wheels may vary by as much as 3 or 4 days. Please keep this in mind when comparing the values obtained here to those given in clinic/hospital. Key words: pregnancy calculator, obstetrics, obgyn, obwheel, ob wheel

description: Photoelectric Effect is a well known principle of Quantum Theory, taught in the higher grades in science curriculum across the globe. Particle Nature of Electromagnetic Radiation is one of the fundamental principle on which Quantum Theory is based. This is lucidly explained by Photoelectric Effect, formulated by Einstein. The rules behind this effect can be summarized as: 1. No electrons are ejected, regardless of the intensity of the radiation, unless its frequency exceeds a threshold value characteristic of the metal. 2. The kinetic energy of the ejected electrons increases linearly with the frequency of the incident radiation but is independent of the intensity of the radiation. 3. Even at low light intensities, electrons are ejected immediately if the frequency is above the threshold. These observations suggest that the photoelectric effect depends on the ejection of an electron when it is undergoing a collision with a particle-like projectile (the radiation) that carries enough energy to eject the electron from the metal. If we suppose that the projectile is a photon of energy hv, where v is the frequency of the radiation, then the conservation of energy requires that the kinetic energy of the ejected electron should obey hν = φ + Kinetic Energy hν = φ + qVs where Vs is stopping potential. Here φ is the work function which is Planck’s constant times the threshold frequency (v0), a frequency below which the electrons cannot be ejected. Therefore, φ = hv0 This threshold frequency is the characteristic of the metal. Important Results: Increasing the frequency of the incident beam, keeping the number of incident photons fixed (this would result in a proportionate increase in energy) increases the maximum kinetic energy of the photoelectrons emitted. Thus,the stopping voltage increases. The number of electrons ejected also changes because the probability that each photon results in an emitted electron is a function of photon energy. If the intensity of the incident radiation is increased, there is no effect on the kinetic energies of the photoelectrons. Increase in intensity of incident beam (keeping the frequency fixed) increases the magnitude of the photoelectric current, though stopping voltage remains the same. Above the threshold frequency, the maximum kinetic energy of the emitted photoelectron depends on the frequency of the incident light, but is independent of the intensity of the incident light so long as the latter is not too high.

Bubble Shooter for Christmas is a classic match-3 puzzle game that is now available on Google Play for FREE ! Another classic bubble puzzle game come to Google Play. Try to clear all the bubbles on the screen to level up, and try to get 3 stars on each level. How to play: 1.Tap where you want the bubble to shoot. 2. Make a group of 3 or more bubbles to make them burst ( match-3 ). Tips: Breaking the bubbles more than three can get points as bonus. Features: - Puzzle Mode,use the bubbles to clear all the bubbles on the screen in limite time. - Having 10000 different and challenging levels. - Having many beautiful scenes.

Fans of Coin VS Zombies rejoice, as you will definitely love this version of the game where zombies are in a vacation mode! Take absolute pleasure and satisfaction in shooting down funny zombies in leisurely holiday fashion-wear from straw hats to Hawaiian shorts, scuba masks and more! The silly, comedic expressions on the zombies’ faces are simply to die for! Play with the funniest zombies on a vacation, accompanied by an authentic coin-push machine and cute rock-and-roll music. Be entranced by the countless zombie items that will drop along the way. Just take aim and shoot the zombies that appear to collect more coins! Smart Thermometer is a simple app to use the temperature sensors in your phone to show the temperature near your phone. With a beautiful design and great precision, this will be your default way of checking temperature instantly! Please make sure your phone has a temperature sensor, otherwise this app can only show you temperatures from web services like any other weather app No ads, use of internet connection is optional, and internet + gps are only required for devices not having an integrated temperature sensor. This app offers an upgrade package which adds charts with historical data of your phone's readings plus better widgets. Designed with Full HD in mind, so it's a perfect match for the Galaxy S4 and all other phones, but will work on any other device as well, provided GPS and an internet connection is available Permissions breakdown: INTERNET - required for uploading data, and getting stats in return GPS - optional for associating the temperatures with a location, and required for getting temperature data on devices which don't have a temperature sensor

description: ***Make The Connection, Clear The Board, Feel The Rush! Play Linkies Puzzle Rush!*** Linkies Puzzle Rush shakes up the world of match-3 games with a twist. Link matching shapes as they collapse, collide and rebound before time runs out. Unleash powerful special effects and beat your friends' high scores. Collect enough stars in each level to unlock new worlds and new puzzles! Every level is a surprise! Linkies Puzzle Rush features: * Match-3 gameplay with a physics twist! * 7 worlds to explore! * Boosters to help you beat the clock and clear the board! * Hilarious Linkies to comment on your scores! * Hidden treasures to discover! * Facebook connections to let you continue your game on any device! * Leaderboards to let your compare scores with your friends! Don't let the adorable Linkies down! Play now! Linkies Puzzle Rush requires the following permissions. * Network Communication: Required for the Facebook and server connections. * Your Accounts: Required for Google Cloud Messaging. * Storage: Required for game save files. * Phone Calls: Required to determine the application status. * System tools: Required for Google Cloud Messaging. We do not in any way use these permissions in a harmful way, they are only required for game functionality. By installing this application you agree to the terms of the licensed agreements.

Manage a castle and set up your cannons to defeat the evil enemy! This is a classic turn based cannon game in which two medieval castles face each other in battle. You can choose the angle and amount of gunpowder for your cannons to aim for the enemy king. Also mind the wind, which can deviate the trajectories of the cannonballs. Increase your income by building headframes. You will need it to buy supplies like cannonballs and gunpowder. The game includes a campaign mode in which increasingly difficult AI players must be beaten. Multiplayer games are possible on one device where players share the screen. An online mode will be added in the future.

Feel comfortable to visit doctor now! Clean and beautiful feet are best so take care and remove rashes, cuts, pimples, dust and all the discomfort for toes. When is your expected date of delivery (due date)? How far are you in your pregnancy? Are you in the First Trimester, Second Trimester or Third Trimester? When is the date of conception? When will your pregnancy reach Full Term? My Pregnancy Calculator is a simple to use application to determine the milestones of your pregnancy. By just recording the first date of your last menstrual period, the average number of days in your menstrual cycle and with a click of a button, the questions above will be answered. You can also work backward if you only know your expected date of delivery as in the case when you have forgotten the date of your last menstrual period or your periods are very irregular and the expected date of delivery has to be determined by ultrasonography. Other features: 1. The app is password protected. 2. There is a Personal Notes Page for you to record your notes e.g. symptoms you are having, questions you want to ask your Midwife, Obstetrician.
release_text: What’s New: 1. The app is now available in multiple languages. 2. There is now a brief description for you to understand how the milestones of your pregnancy are determined.

description: This action packed space shooter combines 8 artistically magical 3D worlds, superb controls, challenging enemies, upgradable weapons, and futuristic sound effects to make for a truly immersive gaming experience. Whether playing with natural-feeling tilt and touch controls or console-feeling Moga Controllers, the controls in Solar Warfare do not disappoint! Dive into futuristic combat and navigate through a variety of supernatural landscapes while piloting your starship with intuitive, precise tilt controls. The clean interface allows you to press anywhere on the right side of the screen to rapid fire your main weapon, and press anywhere on the left side to hover. The hovering feature adds a whole new dimension to the game, as you can shoot enemies and dodge their fire without needing to fly past them. Enemies are all tracked in the real-time radar. Low altitude cruising through detailed close-up terrain sets this game apart from other third-person shooting games. The game play in Solar Warfare lends to up close and personal battles with enemies, and intense slot canyon flying. Though the controls make you feel like you're air borne, this game is much more than a flight simulator - you also need to eradicate an army of hostiles in each world. Collect coins throughout the game to buy new weapons, upgrade existing weapons, buy stronger shields, buy seeking missiles, and buy revive kits. There is an option to purchase coins within the app for those who just can't wait to own their very own Obliterator. Or you can just save up for all your upgrades by collecting coins in each level. Each of the 5 main guns is upgradable, with upgrade behavior unique to each weapon. Each shield has unique characterstics as well. Try the seeker missiles for some real fire and forget fun. Stock up on revive kits to continue right where your ship died. Each of the 8 worlds you explore and cleanse of various hostiles with various behaviors is unique, and simply beautiful. Destroy enemy fighters, jets, space craft, tanks, turrets, airplanes, and more. A different boss at the end of each level is sure to satiate your thirst for epic battles. You play the hero in modern star wars type science fiction combat, using your space ship to reclaim the galaxy by destroying all of the space invaders. The scenery in Solar Warfare, from space stations, to lush floating mountains, to ice planets, to desert terrain, to asteroid belts and everything in between this sci-fi galaxy's solar halo is detailed and unique. The graphics are great and the FPS is high in this interstellar combat game. With alien robot exploding laser guns and missiles, Solar Warfare is an exciting space shooting adventure that’s sure to keep you engaged and well entertained. So, soldier - duty calls. Go shoot some bad guys. If you like games like StarFox, Star Wars, Arc Squadron, Radiant, Galaga, R-Type, Tyrian, Sky Force, Metal Storm, AirAttack, 1942, 1943, Star Battalion, Near Orbit Vanguard Alliance, Siberian Strike, iFighter, Air Strike, Flying Shark, DoDonPachi Gradius, Espgaluda, Swiv, Asteroids, Shogun, Bullet Shooter, Warblade, and any other shoot 'em up, you'll love this game!

Play the first 19 Levels of ShatterBall for free in ShatterBall Lite! Super easy to learn and crazy fun to play! The ShatterBall experience is unique, but gameplay can be described as a combination of mini golf, billiards, and pinball, but with a puzzle flare. You can learn to play ShatterBall in a matter of seconds. However, each new level offers a complexity that will make you feel truly awesome as you advance through the game. You can bounce your glass ball off of bouncy objects, but you'll need to avoid hitting the concrete blocks or metal pipes which make it shatter. With a multitude of moving and spinning objects, it will take some skill and strategy to get your ball to its goal. Use your expert aim and timing skills to get your glass ball to the star, and light it up. There are varying degrees of difficulty from level to level, but in general, the first levels are easier and the last levels are harder. Each time you beat a level, the next one is unlocked and your progress is auto-saved. Beat all 19 in ShatterBall Lite. You can then purchase the full version of ShatterBall for less than the cost of a bad cheesburger off the dollar menu, and prove yourself worthy by beating all 70 levels! Features: - Exciting, intuitive game play with precision ball control - Physics based interactions between the glass ball and other objects - 19 unique, beautifully rendered, fun-filled levels that can be played and played again to your heart's content - Progress is auto-saved after each level is beat Tips: - Every level has been thoroughly tested and is beatable. If one method isn't working for you, try changing angles, speeds, and which objects to bounce off of. - You can drag your glass ball from anywhere on the screen while the ball is within the flashy box, but you will lose control of your ball as soon as it goes outside of the flashy box. You can catch the ball when it comes back into the flashy box. - Zoom in and out by pinching. - If you decide that you have set your ball's speed too slow, you can start the level over quickly by triple-tapping the screen to bring up the pause menu, then tapping the Restart button. - You can adjust the game difficulty to "Easy" or "Wicked." By Troy Tegeder Copyright TegTap Keywords: shatter, ball, balls, pinball, mini golf, billiards, pool, glass, break, flick, bounce, aim, bowling, marble, brick, breaker, strategy, puzzle, free, action,

Turn your tablet into a professional animation desk with Animation Studio’s unique feature set: - Export animations to AVI, FLV (Flash), MP4 (QuickTime), or WMV (Windows Media Player) formats - Import frames from videos to trace over or to add throughout your project - Unlimited layers - Link layers or copy layers between frames, allowing you to preserve static layers and only animate what you need to animate - Define the camera’s position, rotation or zoom, separate from the frame - You can import pictures from your gallery, your camera, or from the clipboard - Onion-skinning - Eight realistic, pressure-sensitive brushes - A track bar to help you view all of the frames and layers of your animation - Cut out elements from a scene and save them to a clipboard for later use or to share between your projects

app_name: Show Me Tell Me Driving Free
description: Show Me Tell Me Driving Guide Free is designed to help those who are about to take their UK car driving test with the 'Show Me, Tell Me' section of the exam. At the start of your driving test, the examiner will ask you two 'Show Me, Tell Me' questions based on basic vehicle maintenance. This app illustrates the 19 possible questions and provides answers and instructions with pictures ensuring you a great start to the exam! The Study Questions section lets you view the list of all questions and tapping them will reveal the model answer. The Random Questions section shows a single question at a time, you can view the model answer by tapping 'Reveal Answer' or show another random question by tapping 'New Question'. This app is completely free and is supported by advertisements. You will NOT receive any icon ads or push notification ads from this app. In App Billing is supported via the 'Remove Ads' button. Upon purchasing this upgrade this app will no longer serve any adverts. If you have any questions, requests or suggestions, just send an Email or Tweet us and we'll happily respond.

Diese Übung ist eine der grundlegenden Übungen für ein effektives Gedächtnistraining. Du lernst Assoziationen, also Eselsbrücken zu bilden. Damit trainierst Du die effektive Zusammenarbeit Deiner zwei Gehirnbereiche. Du verbindest Deine logisch, analytischen Fähigkeiten mit Deiner phantasievollen Kreativität. Die Übung baut auf der App "Gehirntraining Bilder merken" auf, die ebenfalls im Play-Store erhältlich ist. "Gehirntraining Worte merken PE" ist die kostenpflichtige Premium-Edition mit 3 Trainingsleveln. This exercise is one of the basic exercises for memory training. You learn associations, so as to form mnemonics. So you train the effective cooperation of your two brain areas. You connect your logical, analytical skills with your imaginative creativity. The exercise builds on the app "Train your Brain to tag pictures", which is also available in the Channel Store. "Brain Challenge words remember PE" is the paid Premium Edition with 3 training levels.

Hotel Coupons app allows to keep easily discount coupons in the phone and to buy more goods at the low prices! All best discounts in your smartphone. Now it isn't necessary to look for the necessary coupon in a handbag or a pocket, it is rather simple to open Hotel Coupons app and to use the necessary discount. Convenient search of coupons in brands: Hotels.com, Marriott, Hilton, Holiday Inn, Best Western, Extended Stay America, La Quinta, Starwood, Country Inn & Suites, Venere, Sheraton, Omni Hotels, Days Inn, Super 8 Besides, we choose for you the most popular and actual discounts every day! Simply add coupons interesting you in bookmarks and go on shops. Download the Hotel Coupons app right now free of charge.

ReadItToMe Pro reads out your incoming callers, sms messages and other app notifications, translating txt speak into normal language. In ANY language. Translates txt speak ReadItToMe will translate your sms messages into proper english so you can understand what's being read. You can even add your own words and translations easily through the UI. With ReadItToMe this: SMS from John: Btw dat woz amazin, I dunno y I wasn't gonna go lol Becomes This: "New message received from John. By the way that was amazing, I don't know why I wasn't going to go laugh out loud” Any Language ReadItToMe supports ANY language as long as your TTS engine (and Voice engine) has that language installed. If the default Android TTS doesn't support your language I'd recommend trying IVONA TTS. Voice Reply ReadItToMe Pro also has voice reply for sms messages so you can reply to or call that contact using your voice, completely hands free. Not only that but ReadItToMe Pro allows you to record your own commands for much better voice recognition. Contact Blacklist With ReadItToMe you are able to choose which contacts are read and when. You can choose to have specific contacts only read over headphones or bluetoth, or you can mute contacts so you are only notified of a message from that person but the message is not read aloud. Profiles ReadItToMe lets you set profiles based on what device your using. Maybe you want voice control over bluetooth but not headphones. Or you want to lower the music volume over headphones but pause the music over the speakerphone. Automatic Unlike other applications ReadItToMe can be set to run automatically when you connect to a bluetooth device or you plug in your headphones, as well as over the speakerphone. You don't need to manually turn it on and off. Feature List - Read incoming sms - Read incoming callers name - Read incoming notifications from any other apps such as Google Talk or Whatsapp - Voice reply for sms - Read always - Read only when bluetooth is connected - Read only when headphones are connected - Translate text speak before reading ie lol is translated to laugh out loud - You can define your own translations of specific words - Can reads sms over music (music volume is turned down and then back up afterwards) - Icon in notification bar to show when it is running - Fully customizable Known issues and fixes - GoSMS users go to your Settings, Advanced, Receive Settings, Disable other message Notifications. Uncheck that for this to work - It uses the notification stream to read messages and calls by default, so if your phone is on silent you will hear nothing. However if you check the use music stream option it will use the music stream, in which case it will play at the media volume, so if your on silent you can still hear notifications. - Anyone experiencing the issue where it reads on both speaker and headphones/bluetooth simultaneously use the music stream option. There is also the speaker fix option but this is experimental and will only work on some phones. - For any other issues visit the faq at iamrobj.com/ritm_faq.html Please don't leave negative feedback or a bad rating if you find a bug or if it does not work on your device as that won't help me fix it. Please email me with details of your issue and I will see if I can fix it. And free to email me with any queries and feature requests. I'm always open to suggestions.

description: The CTV News Cottage Traffic App is a real-time personalized traffic reporting system for Simcoe County, Muskoka, Georgian Bay, Parry Sound and southern Ontario. With hands-free visual and audio feedback advising you of traffic conditions on your route, you’re always aware of any traffic congestion well in advance. The Cottage Traffic App will change the way you drive! Using anonymously collected data gathered from other users, live accident and construction information, and the knowledge of your saved routes the CTV News Cottage Traffic App guides you to your destination with informative, real-time updates. It’s like having a personal traffic helicopter watching your route every time you get into your car. You can also help other users by reporting traffic issues with a press of a button on your phone. You will be connected to our traffic reporting centre where you can provide us with traffic updates which will then be put into the system right away. With your input, other users will not only know the traffic ahead may be slow, but will also be told why. Download the app and join the the CTV News Cottage Traffic App community today! FEATURES YOU WILL LIKE: 1. Monitor traffic issues at any time along your recorded routes, and 5km ahead of you even if you haven’t recorded a route. 2. Real-time voice alerts on any unexpected traffic issues, with affected road segments and speed. 3. Community Favourites for commonly travelled routes, such as Barrie to Huntsville... or Barrie south to Toronto.

Food Allergy Journal is your friendly weapon in the fight against food allergies. Tired of eating something only to experience symptoms hours, or even days, later and still confused as to which item is making you ill? Prescription for Feeling Better: Download the App. Record. Analyze…. Then move on to enjoying a world where your food allergies don’t ambush you anymore. This food Allergy Journal can help you “take back the plate”! After all, an ounce of prevention is worth a pound of cure. ✓ Simple format makes it easy to enter information, find and edit it, then run reports and analysis ✓ Create custom entries for foods and symptoms in the words you use - no more scrolling through long, irrelevant lists ✓ Convenient auto-fill for dates and times of eating foods and experiencing symptoms ✓ Select level of symptoms: Mild, Medium or Severe ✓ App remembers your entries, making it quicker and easier to enter data each time ✓ Journal allows you to quickly scroll through all of your entries, showing foods and symptoms in different colors for easy identification ✓ Run reports to help you analyze collected data ✓ Report 1: View all symptoms experienced [#] hours after eating [FOOD] ✓ Report 2: View all foods eaten [#] hours before experiencing [Mild/Medium/Severe] [SYMPTOM] ✓ Save or email reports to your doctor, yourself, your personal chef – anyone!

description: HOW TO PLAY: Tap the tiles in the right orders. Do not miss any tiles or tap incorrectly. Otherwise, the game is over. FEATURES: - Piano melody sound effect - More than 30 musics available - 3 different game modes - Fun and addictive - Easy to play, hard to master - Simple interface - Leaderboard ranking - Social sharing (Facebook or Twitter) 3 game modes available: - Classic mode- tap all 60 tiles correctly as fast as you can. - Arcade mode- try your best to tap as many tiles as you can. Miss one tile or tap the wrong tile and the game is over! Tiles' speed will increase over time. No time limit. - Relay mode- tap 30 tiles in 10 seconds to gain 10 more seconds for another 30 tiles. Challenge yourself to see how far you can go. Test your speed and accuracy at the same time with this cool game.

description: Create your own bustling town in the exciting LINE Dream Garden, an official game from the free call and messaging app LINE. Fill your attic with pretty houses, stylish stores, and adorable characters to make your very own tiny town. About the Game Dolls shaped like various animals are gathering in the attic when one day Lewis decides to drop by for a long-awaited visit. He spies the adorable Alice waking up from a long nap, and together they decide to build a town in the attic to lift everyone’s spirits! - Listen carefully to the dolls’ needs to find out how to develop the town! The whole game can be played just by tapping the screen. Tap to place all kinds of cute buildings in the attic, and level up for even more astounding variety. - Level up to reveal hidden locations! Level up to reveal hidden doors in the attic, and explore new areas full of exciting friends. - Everything grows from nuts! Collect nuts on the ground to make items at the laboratory, and make more items with those! Keep on collecting nuts and make your city magnificent! - Everyone’s happy when the carnival is in town! Tap the dolls walking around to give them a boost of excitement. Once you’ve got enough Happy points, host a carnival and watch everyone’s spirits soar! - Enjoy the game with your LINE friends! Invite your LINE friends to visit their towns. Help them out to get Coins! About LINE Games LINE Dream Garden is an official game from the free call and messaging app LINE. Link the game with your LINE account to have even more fun with your friends.

description: הריון ילווה אותך במהלך ההריון, ויאפשר לך לעקוב מדי שבוע אחר שלבי התפתחות העובר, השינויים החלים אצלך, והבדיקות הנדרשות והמומלצות לאורך שלבי ההריון: אולטרסאונד, שקיפות עורפית, סקירת מערכות, אקו לב עובר, דיקור מי שפיר ועוד. מחשבון הריון ייתן לך את תאריך הלידה המשוער, וכן מידע עדכני בהתאם לשבוע ההריון בו את נמצאת. את המידע תוכלי לקבל גם באמצעות עדכון שבועי ישירות לנייד. הריון כולל ספריית תמונות וסרטוני אולטרסאונד, המציגים את העובר לאורך שבועות ההריון. המידע המוצג בהריון נותן מענה לשאלות המתעוררות בתקופת ההריון, ויסייע לך לעבור את ההריון באופן נינוח וחוויתי. תוכלי לתאם תור לבדיקה, שיירשם ישירות ביומנך, ולקבל הכוונת GPS להגעה למרפאה. הריון הוכן עבורכן על ידי ד"ר ליאת גינדס, שהיא רופאה מומחית בכירה ביחידת האולטרסאונד המיילדותי והגניקולוגי במחלקת הנשים והיולדות בבית החולים שיבא בתל השומר. ד"ר גינדס עוסקת במחקר בתחומי האולטרסאונד הגניקולוגי והמיילדותי והינה מומחית בבדיקות הנדרשות לאישה ההרה במהלך הריונה. ניסיונה של ד"ר גינדס הוא הן אקדמי והן מקצועי ומתבסס על שנות עבודה רבות. Pregnancy will accompany you during pregnancy, and will allow you to track every other week fetus development stages, changes you, and tests required and recommended throughout the stages of pregnancy: ultrasound, nuchal translucency, review of systems, passing echocardiography, amniocentesis and more. Pregnancy Calculator will give you the date of the birth, as well as updated information in accordance with the week in which the pregnancy is. The information can be obtained either through weekly update directly to mobile. Pregnancy library includes ultrasound pictures and videos, featuring the fetus throughout pregnancy weeks. The information displayed pregnant gives answers to questions that arise during pregnancy, and will help you through the pregnancy as comfortable and experienced. You can make an appointment for testing, registering directly in your diary and get GPS directions to reach the clinic. Pregnancy prepared yourselves by Dr. Liat Gindes, which senior specialist physician obstetrical ultrasound unit and Gynecology Department of Obstetrics and Gynecology at Sheba Hospital in Tel Hashomer. Dr. Gindes engaged in research in gynecological and obstetrical ultrasound and is a specialist in the required testing pregnant woman during her pregnancy. Experience of Dr. Gindes is both academic and professional, based on many years of practice.

Need to create great homebrewing beer recipes on the go? BeerSmith 2, the world's top selling home brewing software, comes to Android. BeerSmith Mobile gives you all the tools to design, edit and brew your best beer from your phone or tablet. BeerSmith home brewing is tightly integrated with our recipe cloud service and desktop BeerSmith program making it easy to create recipes from your desktop computer or phone and share them transparently. Save a recipe on your desktop cloud folder and open it on your phone. In addition our BeerSmithRecipes search function puts thousands of new recipes at your fingertips. An integrated brew day timer with step by step instructions, brewing calculators and tools for converting units rounds out this great app! The ultimate app for BeerSmith users - create a recipe at your desktop cloud folder, walk our the door and edit the recipe from your phone or tablet! Features: - Ability to fully edit recipe and brew session data - Editing of ingredients including hops, grains, misc, water, and yeast - Full edit of profiles including equipment, mash profiles, aging and carbonation - Functions to scale a recipe by equipment, alter color, original gravity or bitterness - Ability to save profiles or ingredients from an existing recipe to your phone database - Search, view and select from thousands of recipes on BeerSmithRecipes.com - Brewday timer for steep, mash and boil with notifications and alarms - Ability to store recipes you find locally or to your cloud account - Full integration with the desktop version of BeerSmith via your cloud folder - Any recipe you move to your desktop cloud folder can be used in the app! - Full beer style guide in app for reference - Seven calculators including: hydrometer adjust, infusions, alcohol/attenuation, mash adjust, weight/volume, refractometer and carbonation - Five unit converters: temperature, gravity, weight, volume, pressure
release_text: - Corrected error in build 34 where alarm was not playing on some phones - Corrected incompatibility issue with Android 5 and build 2.2.37 - Be sure to turn up notification volume in Android settings for alarm function - Security update - fixed a number of potential vulnerabilities - Updated to more modern look/feel - Added confirmation box to prevent accidental ingredient/profile deletion - Corrected IBU display when building recipes

Deadly Forest is a Game where your first objective is to stay alive as long you can. To gather more points you need to increase the multiplier value. for this you have more options: - every time you start a new race you have a multiplier determined by your previous races, for coins and distance; - after every 100 coins collected, coins multiplier increase for that race; - after every 250 m, distance multiplier increase only for that race; - for increasing your starting multiplier you have to collect at least 500 coins or run more than 500 m. I recommend this game to install on devices with at least: - RAM 512 Mb or more; -CPU single core 1 GHz or higher.

description: 千万家长选择《宝贝听听》，您最贴心的儿童教育软件！ 海量资源，精心挑选！故事、儿歌、中英文动画、苗苗互动应有尽有。 免费下载，故事每周更新，每周都有新惊喜！ 细化年龄分类，量身推荐最适合您孩子的故事！ “宝贝秀”与全国百万宝宝同台，秀出您宝宝的风采！ 最时尚的亲子活动，把自己讲的故事录下来，播放给宝宝听吧！ 【精品资源】 海量资源，种类齐全，具有教育意义，任您挑选！ 每周更新，第一时间告诉你！ 专业播音员精心录制，发音标准； 按照年龄推荐给孩子最合适的故事； 【特色功能】 宝贝秀，把您宝贝的好声音和全国百万家长一起分享！ 细化年龄分类，量身推荐最适合您孩子的故事！ 互动苗苗，陪伴小朋友一起听故事！ 清新界面，全新设计，使用简单，让孩子爱不释手； 【精品故事】 《睡前小故事》 临睡前是亲子阅读的最佳时间，故事中的小动物们都很有趣，他们有的不自信，有的固执，有的不爱睡觉，有的爱捣蛋，这些在孩子身上也让爸爸妈妈伤透脑筋的问题，都可以借助于里面的故事得到启发和建议，孩子们也会从故事中学会做人的道理和体验生活的乐趣。 《365童话故事》 将世界最畅销的儿童童话故事精选收录其中。白雪公主、小兔乖乖、不听话的小山羊、兔子的尾巴、卖火柴的小女孩、灰姑娘、小蝌蚪找妈妈、龟兔赛跑、猴子捞月亮、狼来了、拔萝卜、三只小猪...... 让好故事陪伴孩子度过每一个美好的夜晚，让故事里面的天使、精灵、大力士将他们的有趣经历讲给孩子听。愿小朋友喜欢它，愿他们整夜都有美丽的梦。 《格林童话》 享誉世界的儿童文学经典，其中著名故事，灰姑娘，小红帽，睡美人，小矮人的礼物、傲慢的狐狸、白蛇、比目鱼、大拇指、公主的婚礼、国王和王后、聪明的小裁缝、金钥匙.....都深深地刻在一代又一代孩子们的心中。这些故事充满新奇的幻想，十分扣人心弦。听听这些故事，小朋友们可以感受到正义和坚强，启迪智慧，让梦想飞翔。 《三字经》《唐诗》《弟子规》 是我国古代著名的蒙学经典，给孩子们传输古人经典的思想，使中华民族优良的文化得到传承。让孩子从小阅读经典，无疑对培养孩子的人文素养有着巨大的作用。 《科普益智故事》 独家录制“华语世界最具影响力的原创儿童科普故事”，专为学龄前儿童设计，孩子最理想的科学启蒙老师，助家长把握启蒙良机，让孩子变得快乐又聪明。 【每周更新，新故事首发第一时间告诉你！】故事太多不一一列出啦，更多精彩内容敬请使用宝贝听听哦O(∩_∩)O~ 【联系我们】 官方QQ群1:210285298（已满） 官方QQ群2: 372810934 腾讯微博： http://e.t.qq.com/Qbabyting 新浪微博： http://e.weibo.com/qbabyting 微信号:babytingtingvip 联系邮箱: sjkp@21kunpeng.com 联系电话: 0411-82376688-43083 Ten million parents choose "baby listen", your most intimate childhood education software! Motocross.it è dedicata all’attività motociclistica off-road italiana e internazionale. E’ organizzata nelle in sezioni: - News: notiziario a rilascio continuo quotidiano, compresi gli immediati dopo gara del sabato e domenica - Piste: elenco dei crossdromi italiani, impianti supermoto, aree autorizzate trial, con informazioni sui servizi offerti, localizzazione cartografica; funzione di navigazione stradale verso l’impianto stesso - Motoclub: elenco dei club che gestiscono attività sportiva off-road in Italia - Eventi: le notizie importanti del nostro mondo, esposte anche in agenda nella data specifica - Calendario gare: manifestazioni mondiali, internazionali, nazionali, territoriali - Cronometro: stopwatch con funzione di partenza simultanea o separata di più piloti, con tempi sul giro o tempi dal via; salva e archivia i tempi agganciandoli al crossdromo dove sono stati rilevati - Tempario: scadenzario tecnico dedicato a gestire la manutenzione di ogni genere di moto, con componenti selezionabili da elenco o personalizzate, programmabili una per una. Aggiornando il numero delle ore o dei chilometri dalla moto, al raggiungimento delle varie scadenze, manda una indicazione di allarme - Motocross: archivio delle copertine della Rivisita Motocross (mensile in lingua italiana) con sommario ed editoriale - Albi d’Oro: i campioni mondiali e italiani di tutte le discipline del fuoristrada moto Motocross.it is dedicated to the activity motorcycle off-road Italian and international. E 'in organized into sections: - News: continuous daily news release, including immediate after race on Saturday and Sunday - Slopes: list of crossdromi Italian, plant supermoto, trials authorized areas, with information on the services offered, location mapping, navigation function road to the plant itself - Motoclub: list of clubs who run sports off-road in Italy - Events: important news of our world, also on display on the agenda in the specified date - Calendar races: world events, international, national, regional - Stopwatch: Stopwatch function starting with simultaneous or separate more pilots, with lap times or times from the start, saves and stores the time hooking them to the motocross circuit where they were bought - Labour time allowance: schedule dedicated technician to manage the maintenance of all kinds of motorcycles, with components selected from a list or custom programmable one by one. Updating the number of hours or kilometers off the bike, to the achievement of various maturities, send an alarm indication - Motocross: Motocross Revisit the archive of the covers (monthly in Italian) with summary and editorial - Albi d'Oro and the Italian world champions in all disciplines of off-road motorcycles

description: This is an IV drip rate calculator for paramedics and nurses. Most of the features of this app are available on modern pumps - but modern pumps aren't always available. Add a drug amount in mg, mcg, grams or units to a volume of fluid, select the dose ordered, and voila! The ml/hour necessary to deliver that dose is displayed. All parameters MUST be verified prior to infusion! However, if you accidentally enter an incorrect parameter, you may back-screen to correct it without having to re-enter each piece of data. This program will NOT save preferences. Also, drug manufacturers and distributors sometimes change their concentrations, therefore this program will NOT let you simply enter "Amiodarone" and perform all the calculations for you. This is BetterWare (for lack of a better term) - if you think of any way to make it better, please share it with me so I can share it back with everyone. Thanks!
release_text: Changes for version 1.4: Some internal coding changes; fixed ML/HR rounding. Changes for version 1.3: Consolidated into two screens, ditched the finger-slide panels (it was cranky on some devices). Hopefully a better fit for newer device screens.

description: Dashclock NFC Extension is an extension for the Dashclock Widget that displays information about your device's near-field communication status. This extension is free to use when used alone but when used simultaneously with other extensions made by this developer, a small one-time purchase is required to unlock them all. This application is entirely open-source. If you'd like to have new features or additional languages/locales please raise an issue ticket at https://github.com/mridang/dashclock-fielder . This extension requires the requires the Dashclock Widget by Roman Nurik: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=net.nurik.roman.dashclock

description: - prologue – When I opened my eyes, I found myself in a deep hole that had been dug in the snow. In front of me, I saw the secret hideout me and my friends used to play in 20 years ago. It was made by reforming a shack, but it should have been destroyed ages ago. As if possessed, I entered the secret hideout that should not have been there anymore. Your mission is only to escape from the room by opening the door. However, to do this, you'll need to gather some items and use those items in solving puzzles. The rules are very simple. You can tap various locations, and you can also flick when you need to move about the room. Language:English,Chinese,Korean,Japanese [compatible devices] Xperia acro HD(IS12S) GALAXY S2(SC-02C) GALAXY S3(SC-06D) GALAXY NEXUS(SC-04D) GALAXY Note2(SC-02E) We cannot guarantee that the apps will work on any model for which proper functioning has not been confirmed.

description: App Features: ◉ Countdown app and Countdown Widget ◉ 1x1, 2x1 and 4x1 Widget included for the home screen ◉ Embed Countdown into a website ◉ 300+ FREE HD Background images ◉ Shows year, months, weeks, days, weekdays, hours, minutes and *seconds*! ◉ Share live personalized countdowns across mobile platforms Android, iOS and web share countdown through Facebook, Twitter, Whatsapp, Google+, Instagram, Kik, Vine, Tumblr, Sina Weibo, text sms, email ◉ Milliseconds - We have that too! ◉ Import events from live phone Calendar ◉ Import Facebook birthdays ◉ See live countdown from Web View on Mobile, Desktop, Smart TV ◉ Recurring repeating calendar events (daily, weekly, monthly, yearly) ◉ Customizable HD skins + 12 widget skins preloaded Allows you to design your own widget skins ◉ LCD, LED, Roboto fonts, plus extra special fonts ◉ Choose and crop your own background image! ◉ Pre loaded events for Christmas, New Year and the Weekend ◉ You can also Count Up from a point in time! ◉ Supports multiple countdowns - as many as you want ◉ Low CPU/Battery usage ◉ Reminder and to-do alerts ◉ Custom alarm ringtones ◉ Automatically accounts for Timezone and Daylight Savings Time changes. ◉ Has a simple countdown timer for short-term countdowns App Description The only live Countdown timer that has seconds on the widget to add to your home screen. You can also see the milliseconds roll off fast to your live event. You only live once (yolo), so put a timer on your life and begin living with purpose every day. A free truly one of kind live digital timer to add urgency, excitement, calendar reminders and positive thinking to your life. Even Add the widget directly to your home screen. Anticipate to live events that you have been looking forward to: Big events, Birthday, New Year 2016, Vacation, Concerts, Military service returns, Baby Due dates, games, Holiday, Wedding, Anniversary, Season Premiers and Finales, Graduation, to-do, Soccer, Football, Baseball, Basketball games. Never forget another special calendar day. Did you get here by clicking a link such as "fncd.net/v/?id=xxxx"? install then click the link to have that same exact LIVE countdown. You can also view the live countdown on your home screen by adding a widget. Share your live countdowns with others! share with others to have the same live widget on their device! Go to http://www.fncd.net to add the latest live calendar we are sharing. Rating & Feedback Our team loves feedback. If you enjoy using the Final Countdown - Please consider rating 5 stars. If you think the app deserves less, please tell us. Live each day with purpose! Follow us on: YouTube https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCxSSu-1vJtHm9moEUeghzbQ Twitter https://twitter.com/TheCountDownApp Facebook https://www.facebook.com/games/hdn-countdown/ Instagram http://instagram.com/thecountdownapp/
release_text: 3.94 - Fix IAP not refreshing purchased upgrades - Improved backgrounds navigation 3.93 - Fixed new font alignment in 1x1 widgets - Fixed FC on countdown re-position - Fixed FC on background select 3.91 - New Fonts - Long-press to re-position countdown - Past event divider - Material design updates 3.88 ** Added 60+ FREE New Year backgrounds - fixed shared screenshots missing extension

description: Drivers Ed California is brought to you free of charge by DriversEd.com!! _________________________________________ Need a license in California? Study anytime, any place with Drivers Ed California for any Android device. FREE from DriversEd.com, the leader in online drivers education, this full-featured study companion can quiz you from a database of more than 350 MVD questions. Your results are recorded so you can track your progress and review your incorrect answers. Retake past tests as many times as you want to make sure you know the material. Pick the length of each test—take a test of 5 questions or as many as 100. It’s your choice! Use the Flash Card feature to quickly study the important facts you need to know for the test. Of course, you’ll still need to read the California Driver's Manual to prepare for the permit test. With Drivers Ed California, you can download the CA Driver's Manual to your device anytime! After the first download, the manual is saved on your device so you don’t have to wait for the download again. The CA manual is an official DMV publication in PDF format. The text is crystal clear (pinch to zoom, just like a web page). This app works with DriversEd.com’s California drivers education course, which you can take to get your drivers license! DriversEd.com is approved by Road Safety Educators' Association & The Driving School Association of the Americas. Features: + Over 350 questions + Each Quiz pulls random questions, giving you a different quiz each time + Select the number of questions you want in each quiz + Results for each quiz are saved for your review and study. Tests can be retaken. + Download California’s Drivers Manual so you can read and study any time + Study with flash cards

A user friendly reddit app, designed to be fast, easy to use and nice to look at. Designed with modern Android in mind, Rapid Reddit is designed to operate on both phones and tablets. Rapid Reddit synchronises with your Reddit profile, allowing you to manage your Inbox, add or remove subscribed subreddits, and to discover new subreddits via the Discover! screen. Other features include Themes (Day and Night), multiple accounts (with account switcher), an in-built web browser, support for imgur links, PDF files, GIF files and lots of advanced features. The year is 1849, and gold has just been discovered in California. You decide to head out west, to seek fame and wealth in the approaching Gold Rush. Will you strike it rich and become an overnight mining magnate? Or build your fortune bit by bit by supplying 49ers with pickaxes and blue jeans? Gameplay: 1849 is a city management game set during the California Gold Rush. Your task is to build towns, populate them with workers, and keep your citizens housed, fed, and entertained. You’ll have to manage and coordinate extensive production and trade networks to make sure your towns thrive. Key Features of 1849: - A campaign mode that traces the development of the Gold Rush from mining camps to bustling cities. Each city scenario presents players with unique starting conditions, victory goals, and obstacle events. - Sandbox mode with a procedurally-generated map for your location, based on geography (from the Pacific coast to the Sierra Nevada mountains), precipitation, resource availability, and starting lot size. - Vivid Old West towns with geography and architecture directly inspired by California’s Gold Country. - Over 50 resources to dig up, farm, refine or manufacture as you build complex towns and cities. - Classic city management gameplay meets modern technology in a sim tailored specifically for tablet / touch screen play. - Developed by SomaSim, a new studio dedicated to producing deep simulation games for today’s players.

description: Would you like to have fun drawing of Fluttershy, Applejack, Pinkie Pie, My Little Ponies Twilight Sparkle from Dolls Chuggington Girls? That is exactly what the Draw: Chuggington Watch Characters app allows you to do. Add this latest offering in the series of drawing apps and never worry about boredom again! You can now access more than 15 drawing tutorials in a single app! Each drawing divided in 5 to 15 steps, and its easy to follow. Have fun with this lessons at home, in school, on paper, chalk on asphalt - do it everywhere! Drawing is fun, but traditionally not so fun to learn. Unless you can afford a private tutor, you usually have to take a class that requires you to adhere to a specific schedule. The Draw: Girls from Draw Chuggington app makes learning to draw as easy and as flexible as possible. All you need to provide is the time, medium, and environment in which you want to draw! Learning to draw with our apps consists of following of each step presented in the tutorial for the subject you want to learn to draw. The number of steps varies, but each one covers a key aspect of the subject. Even complex subjects such as Rarity, Rainbow Dash, Sunset Shimmer, Spike, Flach Sentry, Vinyl are a snap! Instead of having to take a lengthy class, you can use the our How to Draw apps to learn to draw. The really good news is that you can learn at your own pace and level. The app includes previous and next buttons so that you can go backwards and forwards through the tutorials so that you can to learn the way you want!

Guardbot protects your device from theft or unwanted use. There are two ways it does this for you: ★ NORMAL MODE – using accelerometer Activate this and set your device still on a surface – whether you’re in a bar with your friends or at home and you leave your device unattended, Guardbot will detect when someone picks it up and activate the alarm. ★ BAG MODE (anti pickpocket mode) – using light sensor Activate this when you put the device in your pocket or inside your bag or purse. Guardbot will scan for changes in ambient light, and once it’s out of the bag it will activate the alarm. You have time to set it still or inside your pocket, you can even turn off the screen (if you want to save battery). For extra safety and fun, Guardbot has a unique built-in passcode system, it will require a 3-number touch pattern, you can set it by tapping on the screen using your fingers. Set up the passcode under the Settings button in the main screen, and don’t forget it! Deactivate the alarm by tapping your passcode; if the wrong code is entered Guardbot will take a picture of the intruder and save it to your SD card/Guardbot folder. ★ FEATURES ★ ✔ Interface + voice inspired by HAL 9000 ✔ Loud alarm, by maximizing the volume on your device ✔ Protect your device with 2 modes of operation ✔ Unique touch pattern passcode to deactivate the alarm ✔ Alarm doesn’t stop unless you enter the correct passcode ✔ Free, ad-supported, pro version coming soon! DISCLAIMER Guardbot is an entertainment app, while it does a great job at activating the alarm and startling your friends or children, we cannot guarantee your device won’t get stolen. Best way to protect it from theft is to always keep it with you. If your device doesn’t have a built in accelerometer or light sensor, the app won’t work. Please make sure you have the necessary hardware before installing it. If you forgot your passcode use a task killer to shut down the alarm or restart your device. While we thoroughly test the apps before publishing, we cannot guarantee it works on all Android devices, drop us a line at support@margeo.info if it doesn’t work for you. Like Guardbot on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/guardbotapp
release_text: This is the first release, contact us at support[at]margeo.info if you encounter issues with it. Thank you!

description: In Our Image is a warm and inspiring children’s story, ported to the tablet and brought to life with music, animation and bright illustrations that respond to the touch. ••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••• BEFORE CREATING HUMANS, God said, "Let us make mankind in our image, after our likeness." In this playful interactive twist on the story of Genesis, God asks all of nature to offer gifts to humankind – with a promise that humans would care for creation in return. Man and Woman were then formed from the dust of the Earth, in the image of God and nature. It was very good, indeed. And it makes learning about creation fun and playful for kids of all ages. SO WHETHER YOU’RE LARGE LIKE THE WHALE or small like the ant, lazy like the lizard or busy like the bee – this spirited interactive story will keep you and your child captivated with its rich animated elements, delightful musical nuances and lively illustrations that sing and swing to the touch. Bring home this unique and wonderful story – and celebrate the great harmony of nature and all living things. ________________________________________________________________ We are proud to call In Our Image a Shiny MEDL Object. Explore the entire lineup at MEDLMobile.com. Copyright credit to Jewish Lights Publishing.

description: Die ZEIT ONLINE App für Android (ab Version 4.0) bietet kostenlosen Zugang zu den hochwertigen Nachrichten von www.zeit.de. Die ZEIT ONLINE App liefert Ihnen zu jeder Zeit aktuelle News und Hintergründe im preisgekrönten Layout. Die Nutzerführung ist intuitiv und komfortabel. • Qualitätsjournalismus von ZEIT ONLINE als Gratis-App • Eilmeldungen und wichtige Nachrichten als Push-Nachrichten • Tabletoptimierte Darstellung in der bekannten Android User Experience • Artikel können über Facebook-, Twitter- Google+ oder Mail geteilt werden • Wahlweise kompakte oder klassische Ansicht • Alle Ressorts sind schnell erreichbar Die Anwendung ist für Smartphones und Tablets ab der Android-Version 4.0 ausgelegt. Die ZEIT ONLINE App bietet Ihnen einen Push-Service, der Sie auf schnellstem Wege über aktuelle Nachrichten auf dem Laufenden hält. Zusätzlich erhalten Sie eine kompakte Übersicht aller neuen Meldungen von ZEIT ONLINE sowie Vorabmeldungen aus DIE ZEIT und aktuelle Agenturmeldungen. Natürlich können Sie Artikel, die Ihnen gefallen, über die Share-Funktion auf Facebook, Google+ und Twitter weiterempfehlen. Haben Sie Fragen, Anregungen oder Hinweise zu unserer neuen App? Schreiben Sie uns eine E-Mail an apps@zeit.de . Wir freuen uns über Ihre Nachricht. The TIME ONLINE app for Android (version 4.0) provides free access to high-quality news of www.zeit.de. The TIME ONLINE app provides you with anytime latest news and backgrounds in the award-winning layout. The user navigation is intuitive and comfortable. • Quality of journalism TIME ONLINE as a free app • breaking news and important messages as push messages • Tablet Optimized display in the familiar Android User Experience • Articles can be shared on Facebook, Twitter, Google+ or email • Optional compact or classic view • All departments can be reached quickly The application is designed for smartphones and tablets from the Android version 4.0. The TIME ONLINE app gives you a push service that keeps you in the fastest way about the latest news up to date. In addition, you receive a compact overview of all new messages from ZEIT ONLINE and preliminary reports from THE TIME and current agency reports. Of course you can return items that appeal to you, a friend on the share function on Facebook, Google+ and Twitter. Have questions, suggestions or comments about our new app? Send us an e-mail to apps@zeit.de . We look forward to your message.

description: Default android screen full of app icons is too much to handle sometimes. Even if you place apps in categorized folders, you spend ~10 seconds in locating that folder on screen when you need it. Here's an awesome and beautiful alternative to that. Pages UCCW Theme. == FEATURES == * 5 screens. Each screen dedicated to one category of apps. Favorites, Communication, Social, Media, Tools. * Each screen holds 4 app cards. 26 cards to choose from. * Each app card has one editable hotspot. Assign your favorite app to them. * 1 special screen to hold your other widgets. * Jump from any screen to any other screen easily by tapping the category buttons at the left of each screen. * No special wallpapers needed. Any white wallpaper will do. == INSTRUCTIONS == READ BEFORE BUYING == To use this skin, you have to install, apply and optionally edit/assign hotspots to the skin. Install - * After downloading the skin app from play store, launch it. * Tap "Install Skin" button in the app. * Tap "Ok" when it asks you whether you want to replace app. This step is replacing the skin installer with the actual skin. OR * If you are using a KitKat device, it'll ask whether you want to update the existing app. * Tap "Install". When that finishes, tap "Done". Skin is now installed. Apply - You must have latest version of Ultimate custom widget (UCCW) installed. http://goo.gl/eDQjG Follow APPLY and rest of the instructions from this page - http://iwiz-vicky.blogspot.com/2013/02/pages-theme-for-android.html Watch the setup instructions in the attached video. == TIPS / TROUBLESHOOT == * If the "Install" step fails; go to Android settings > Security and make sure "Unknown sources" is enabled. Reason explained here - http://wizardworkapps.blogspot.com/2013/12/ultimate-custom-widgets-uccw-tutorial.html * To change temperature unit between Celsius and Fahrenheit -> Launch UCCW app itself. Tap Menu, tap settings. Here, if "Celsius" is marked, temperature will display in Celsius. If unmarked, Fahrenheit. * If weather info is not displayed/updated, Launch UCCW app itself. Tap Menu, tap settings, tap location. Make sure "Auto location" is checked and that the third row is correctly showing your location. * You can also tap Menu, tap settings, tap 'weather provider' and change the selected provider. Mail me if you have ANY issues. bagarwa

The planet is full of crazy robots with only objective - search and destroy! Did we mention that there is also tons of gold?! Alien Pig knows that! And it's on a crazy ride with personal PigWalker and jetpack behind to collect it all! With crazy bunch of weapons to shoot, there is nothing to stop you! Shoot and Hit Turrets by jumping on them. Dodge bullets, and run from Rockets! Collect as much gold as you can to buy more upgrades like weapons and cool stats for Alien Pig. It's as easy as it get's, collect more coins, upgrade pig, run even further, and collect more coins! How easy controls are? It's a one tap game - tap to jump, release to fall, the more you press the longer jump is! But beware you've got just three jumps before you fall. Can it get even better?! Fight rare in game Bosses! they will be a hard challenge to face! 3 in Game bosses with different tactics to kill! 6 Different Upgrades Including 3 Weapons with 7 levels for each! Coming soon with next update - Quests, MORE WEAPONS! (Weekly updates) You like shoot'em all and runner games? this game is something you definitely need to see! It's FREE. Alien Pig is compatible with the Giftiz app : you can win real gifts by playing our games ! Category: runner, action games, line runner, free games, free game Game works great on most of android phones, but if you still have problems, we're happy to assist, just contact our support team at support@kiki-fish.com We've spent 480 hours on making this game as good as it possibly can be, a good feedback will mean a world to us! We would be able to continue and make it better!
release_text: Bugfixes related to menu screen. Find us on Facebook and Twitter, to know first!

description: Test Your English (Level Elementary) This application helps you to improve your English skills. It contains more than 300 multiple choice tests. -- Types of tests: Language (English Tests for ESL/EFL :: English Grammar Exercises) Business (Teaching Business English :: ESL Business English Tests) Synonyms (Learning English Quizzes :: English Synonym Worksheets) Idioms (English as a Foreign Language :: Idiomatic Expressions in English) Errors (English as a Second Language :: Common Errors in English Usage) -- Each test consists from ten questions. Select the correct answer from three or four possible answers. If the type of tests is Errors, you first have to find the error and then select it in the options. Then you are expected to type in a word that would be correct in the sentence. -- At the end of each test is evaluated your score, which you can later improve. The best possible result is of course 10/10 (ten correct answers from all the ten questions). In the section "Scores" You can see your results painted on the pie graph. Green color means a result 10/10. Paint Your scores to green! ;-) Since version 1.1 there is a list of your incorrect answers ("Scores/Incorrect answers"). You can check them and re-test yourself. If you repeat a test and answer correctly, they are removed from a list. And, if you like you can play "Millionaire" (inspired by tv-game "Who Wants to Be a Millionaire?"). Good luck! martin.kupkovic@gmail.com

Birder is an application that incorporates a Field Guide and Field Report for Birds of Britain and Ireland. Birder features beautiful original artwork (commissioned specifically for the application), high quality recordings of bird calls/song, concise text descriptions and identifications guidelines, the latest commissioned range maps and a host of other features.Bird species can be listed by common name, latin name, family or habitat. There is also the option to sort alphabetically or by scientific order. View the stunning illustrations and range maps in portrait or landscape; pinching and zooming for additional detail. The application details 247 species found in the Britain and Ireland. As well as being a highly useful portable field guide, Birder also provides a means to create and maintain complete field trip data. Create and store your visits, saving location, county and country information, species recorded, accurate GPS location, notes and much more. Locate birds quickly using 'Quick ID', filtering possible species by colour, size, habitat and general shape. You can also narrow down identification possibilities using the 'Similar' species option, that will detail often mistaken species. Sightings and field trip data can be emailed to your own account or that of friends or colleagues and locations can be viewed in maps. Birder also catalogues your life list so you can see at a glance all your sightings.

Video Poker Strategy Trainer - Double Bonus This is the popular Double Bonus video poker game with a strategy analysis engine built-in to help you train to become a better player. After each hand is dealt, the strategy engine calculates all possible outcomes to determine the best cards to hold to get the highest payoff. You can click 'Hint' to view the results or you can play without hints. If you did not hold the optimal cards, a popup message will inform you of the error and you will see which cards were optimal. Statistics on the number of errors you make will be tracked as you improve your play. Special Features: Hint - Tells you which cards to hold Strategy Check - Informs you if you did not hold the right cards Statistics - Tracks how well your are playing Log File - tracks all your plays so you can review later Disclaimer: Strategy assumes maximum bet. This game is for entertainment purposes only. No guarantee of strategy accuracy. Support: Feel free to email if you have any issues.
release_text: Hold button bug Added better support for smaller and larger screens Added feature to skip stats if HINT button is used Added Average Payout dialog Fixed skip stats bug Improved performance of DEAL button due to payout dialog Added win sound and visual effect minor improvements to performance fixed sound enable bug Added option to disable sound/visual effect Moved Ad to top of screen Feel free to email if you have any issues to report.

description: This educational game emulates mixed up cubes with parts of pictured animals on their sides. Rotate cubes by touch to complete the entire picture. Real cubes rotation. 32 pictures with funny animals. You can complete an existent animal or invent your own. Cubes number can be chosen from 2 x 1 to 5 x 5. Any number of animals can be chosen - from 2 till 32. So the game can be configured for kids of different age. There is a hint with animal name which helps to learn them. Completed animal pronounces its native sound. Picture from cubes sides can be saved to gallery at any moment (even during cube rotation). Cubes background can be switched to single color to make funny animals look more natural. Dedicated for 2-8 year old kids. Our kids approved this :)
release_text: v1.0.9 Backward rotation was added. If you want to rotate cube back - touch a cube in bottom-to-top direction. Any other touches will rotate the cube from top to bottom v 1.0.8 Bug fix. v 1.0.7 Animation was added - bubbles, balloons, and other staff is flying after the picture is completed. Ability to switch cubes background to single color and back was added - this makes "invented" animals look more natural.

description: "It's the best dice roller out", "Awesome for an impromptu game of farkle", "The most realistic dice roller on Android!", .. DiceShaker is a dice roller application with beautiful 3D graphics and advanced physics engine. * 1 - 6 dice with total score * roll the dice by shaking the phone or pressing the shake button * lock and release dice by touching (for example for playing dice games like Yahtzee) * roll individual dice by flicking them * advanced OpenGL ES 2.0 3D graphics with custom shaders and dynamic shadows * Uses Immersion’s MOTIV haptic effects This version is supported by ads. Like it? Get the 0.99€ ad-free DiceShaker 3D Pro version, with more screen space for your dice. If you're looking for an advanced dice roller with more dice types, check out DiceShaker D&D by clicking the "View more applications" link below. Required permissions are needed for showing ads. The app collects anonymous Google Analytics usage statistics, which can be disabled from the app's preferences. If you have problems or suggestions, please send e-mail to info@pallosalama.com (problem reports posted to comments can't be replied to).

Thanks for buying us a beer ;-) This app is a key which unlocks additional feature for DroidStats. The number features will increase in future. At the moment this features are added: - Configure all your widgets (Which statistic to show?) - Configure transparency of your widgets - unlocks the 4x1 widget - unock the alternative 1x1 one-slot widget - unlock the StatusbarWidget which integrates in the Notification Area - Data-per-App feature (Android 2.2+ phones) - see a chronological log of all sms and call events with additional infos - backup restore your configuration, calls- and sms-info - export your calls and sms event infos to CSV - Extended top statistics with pie charts We do not cut any feature of the free app. All this features are addons. Please test the free app before if all works as expected. THIS ADDON NEEDS THE MAIN APP DROID STATS The app is not listed in the launcher menu. Sometimes a restart is required after installations to enable pro features. If you buy this app with the PayPal link you will get a manually send email. This can take up to 48 hours in some cases. Info: Because DroidStats user count became too big (over 5000 downloads/per day of free app) and time too less we can only provide a limited support for now. PayPal payments can only be answered manually
